SA11sanssr_pu:200_1: vā saṃcodyamānaḥ saṃvedyamānaḥ samādāpyamāno 'nnuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau bodhicittam

SA11sanssr_pu:202: sa satvā ... naśaraṇān advīpān dṛṣṭvā kāruṇyacittam upasthāpya yāvad annuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau cittam utpādayatīdaṃ tṛtīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhicittotpādāya /

SA11sanssr_pu:214: ghoṣadatto nāma tathāgato yatra nakṣatrarājena tathāgatena prathamaṃ bodhicittam utpāditaṃ tāmbūlapatraṃ dattvā gopālakabhūtena /

SA11sanssr_pu:216: evam anantaprabho nāma tathāgato yatrārciṣmatā tathāgatena prathamaṃ bodhicittam utpāditaṃ tṛṇapradīpaṃ dattvā nagarāvalambakabhūtena /
SA11sanssr_pu:217: evaṃ dṛḍhavikramo nāma tathāgato yatra duṣpradharṣeṇa tathāgatena prathamaṃ bodhicittam utpāditaṃ dattakāṣṭhaṃ dattvā kāṣṭhahārakabhūtenety ādi //

SA11sanssr_pu:317: buddhānām anuśikṣiṣye śīlasaṃvarasaṃyame / nāhaṃ tvaritarūpeṇa bodhiṃ prāptum ihotsahe //
SA11sanssr_pu:318: parāntakoṭiṃ sthāsyāmi satvasyaikasya kāraṇāt / kṣetraṃ viśodhayiṣyāmi aprameyam acintiyam //
SA11sanssr_pu:319: nāmadheyaṃ kariṣyāmi daśa dikṣu ca viśrutaṃ / kāyavākkarmaṇī cāhaṃ śodhayiṣyāmi sarvaśaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:320: śodhayiṣye manaḥkarma karma karttāsmi nāśubham / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:321: na cātra sārvakālikāt saṃvaragrahaṇāj janmāntarāpattiśaṅkā kartavyātraiva sūtre 'kṣobhyapraṇidhānānujñānād evaṃ hy uktaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:322: yathā tenākṣobhyeṇa tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisatvabhūtenaivaṃ vāg bhāṣitā /
SA11sanssr_pu:323: visaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyur yadi sarvasyāṃ jātau na pravrajeyam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:325: anyās tu jātīr ābodheḥ saiva saṃśodhayiṣyatīty ukteḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:326: evaṃ śāriputra bodhisatvena akṣobhyasya tathāgatasya anuśikṣitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:327: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvasyāṃ jātau pravrajaty utpādād vā tathāgatānām annutpādād vāvaśyaṃ gṛhāvāsān niṣkrāmati /
SA11sanssr_pu:329: paramo hy ayaṃ śāriputra lābho yad uta gṛhāvāsān niṣkramaṇam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:332: yathā janmāntareṣv ayaṃ doṣo na bhavati tathātraiva vakṣyamāṇam ity āstāṃ tāvad etat //
SA11sanssr_pu:333: tad evaṃ samāttasaṃvarasya sāmānyam āpattilakṣaṇam ucyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:334: yenāpattilakṣaṇena yuktaṃ vastu svayam apy utprekṣya pariharen na cāpattipratirūpakeṣv annāpattipratirūpakeṣu ca saṃmuhyeta /
SA11sanssr_pu:335: bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ varttamānānāgatasarvaduṣkhadaurmanasyopaśamāya varttamānānāgatasukhasaumanasyotpādāya ca niḥśāṭhyataḥ kāyavāṅmanaḥparākramaiḥ prayatnaṃ karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:336: yadi tu tatpratyayasāmagrīṃ nānveṣate tadannantarāya pratikārāya na ghaṭate alpaduṣkhadaurmanasyaṃ bahuduṣkhadaurmanasyapratikārabhūtaṃ notpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:337: mahārthasiddhyarthaṃ cālpārthahāniṃ na karoti kṣaṇam apy upekṣate /
SA11sanssr_pu:339: saṃkṣepato 'nnāpattiḥ svaśaktyaviśayeṣu kāryeṣu tatra niṣphalatayā śikṣyāprajñaptyabhāvāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:341: yatra svaśaktyagocare 'pi tyāgasāmarthyād āpattiḥ syāt tan na cintyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:342: sāmānyapāpadeśanā na ... vāt tu tato muktiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:348: nirūpya yathārham atikrāmaty antaśaś caṇḍāladāsenāpi coditaḥ sāpattiko bhavati / kutaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:350: api tu maitreya caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ pratibhānaṃ sarvabuddhabhāṣi ... bhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:356: yasya kasyacin maitreya ebhiś caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ pratibhānaṃ pratibhāti pratibhāsyati vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:357: tatra śrāddhaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā buddhasaṃjñotpādayitavyā śāstṛsaṃjñāṃ kṛtvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:360: yat kiñcin maitreya subhāṣitaṃ sarvaṃ tad buddhabhāṣitaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:361: tatra maitreya ya imāni pratibhānāni pratikṣipen naitāni buddhabhāṣitānīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:362: teṣu cāgauravam utpādayet pudgalavidveṣeṇa tena sarvabuddhabhāṣitaṃ pratibhānaṃ pratikṣiptaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:364: yaḥ punar etad abhyāsārthaṃ vyutpāditam icchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:365: tenātra śikṣāsamuccaye tāvac caryāmukhamātraśikṣaṇārtham abhiyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ śikṣārambhasyaiva mahāphalatvāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:367_0: yaś ca mañjuśrīr bodhisatvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsamebhyo buddhebhyaḥ pratyekaṃ sarvebhyo
SA11sanssr_pu:367_2: evaṃ dadaṅ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān dānaṃ dadyād /
SA11sanssr_pu:368: yo vānyo mañjuśrīr bodhisatva imān evaṃrūpān dharmān śrutvā ekāntena gatvā cittenābhinirūpayed imeṣv evaṃrūpeṣu dharmeṣu śikṣiṣyāmīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:369: so 'śikṣito 'pi mañjuśrīr bodhisatvo 'syāṃ śikṣyāyāṃ chandiko vatataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:370: na tv eva tad dānam ayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastv iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:371: tasmād evam anuśaṃsadarśinā bodhisatvena na kathaṃcin nivarttitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:373: tatra mañjuśrīr ye trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāḥ satvas teṣām ekaikaḥ satvo rājā bhavej jambūdvīpādhipatis te sarvae evaṃ ghoṣayeyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:374_0: yo mahāyānam udgrahiṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravarttayiṣyati
SA11sanssr_pu:374_1: tasya nakhachedena māsaṃ pañcapalikena divasenāvatārayiṣyāmaḥ taṃ caitenāpakrameṇa
SA11sanssr_pu:375: sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisatva evam ucyamāno no trasyati na saṃtrāsam āpsyate 'ntaśa ekacittotpādenāpi na bibheti na viṣīdati na vicikitsate /
SA11sanssr_pu:376: uttari ca saddharmmaparigrahārtham abhiyujyate pāṭhasvādhyāyābhimukto viharati /
SA11sanssr_pu:377: ayaṃ mañjuśrīr bodhisatvaś cittaśūro dānaśūraḥ śīlaśūraḥ kṣāntiśūraḥ vīryaśūraḥ dhyānaśūraḥ prajñāśūraḥ samādhiśūraḥ iti vaktavyaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:378: sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisatvaḥ teṣāṃ vadhakapuruṣāṇāṃ na kupyati na ruṣyati na khila doṣacittam utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:379: sa mañjuśrīr bodhisatvo brahmasama indrasamo 'kampya iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:393: kathaṃ ca kulaputra bodhisatvā bodhisatvaśikṣāsaṃvarasaṃvṛtā bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:395: na prātimokṣasaṃvaramātrakeṇa mayā śakyam annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:396: kiṃ tarhi yānīmāni tathāgatena teṣu teṣu sūtrānteṣu bodhisatvasamudācārā /
SA11sanssr_pu:397: bodhisatvaśikṣāpadāni prajñaptāni teṣu teṣu mayā śikṣitavyam iti vistaraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:398: tasmād asmadvidhena mandabuddhinā durvijñeyo vistaroktatvād bodhisatvasya saṃvaraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:401: katamāni ca tāni marmasthānāni yāni hi sūtrānteṣu mahāyānābhiratānām arthāyoktāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:405: eṣa bodhisatvasaṃvarasaṃgrahaḥ / yatra bodhisatvānām abhyāsaviśrāme 'py āpattayo vyavasthāpyante //
SA11sanssr_pu:407: yo bodhisatvena mārgaḥ parigṛhītaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ kṛtena duṣkham upagāmī /
SA11sanssr_pu:408: saced bodhisatvasya taṃ mārgaṃ parigṛhyāvasthitasyāpi kalpakoṭer atyayenaikaṃ sukhacittam utpadyetāntaśo niṣadya cittam api /
SA11sanssr_pu:409: tatra bodhisatvenaivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ sarvasatvānām ātyayikaṃ parigṛhyaitad api me varjayan niṣīdāmīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:412: pañcemāni devaputrānantaryāṇi yair ānantaryaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisatvāḥ kṣipram annuttarāsamyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:414: yadā devaputra bodhisatvo 'dhyāśayaty annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādya nāntarā śravakapratyekabuddhabhūmau cittam utpādayatīdaṃ devaputra prathamam ānantaryaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:415: sarvasvaparityāgitāyāṃ cittam utpādya nāntarā mātsaryacittena sārddhaṃ sa nyasatīdaṃ devaputra dvitīyam ānantaryam /
SA11sanssr_pu:416: sarvasatvā mayā trātavyā ity evaṃ cittam utpādya nāntarā sīdatīdaṃ devaputra tṛtīyam ānantaryam /
SA11sanssr_pu:417: annutpannāniruddhān sarvadharmān avabhotsyae ity evaṃ cittam utpādya nāntarā dṛṣṭigateṣu prapatatīdaṃ devaputra caturtham ānantaryam /
SA11sanssr_pu:418: ekakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā sarvadharmān avabhotsyae ity evaṃ cittam utpādya nāntarā tiṣṭhati na viṣṭhīvati aprāptāyāṃ sarvajñatāyām idaṃ devaputra pañcamam ānantaryam iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:419: tasmād evam ātmabhāvabhogapuṇyānām aviratam utsargarakṣāśuddhivṛddhayo yathāyogaṃ bhāvanīyāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:420: tatra tāvad utsargārthaṃ parigrahadoṣabhāvanādvāreṇa vairāgyam utpādayet tyāgānuśaṃsāṃś ca bhāvayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:422: adhyavasitā ye bālāḥ kāye 'smin pūtike samyag /
SA11sanssr_pu:424: atiraudrāṇi karmāṇi kṛtvā mohavaśānugāḥ / te yānti narakān ghorān mṛtyuyānagatābudhā / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:426: ye kecit satvā na bhavanti vigrahāḥ parigrahas tatra nidānamūlam /
SA11sanssr_pu:430: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisatvaḥ sarvadharmeṣu parakīyasaṃjñām utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:435: yad dattaṃ tan na bhūyo rakṣitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:439: yad dattaṃ tad aparigrahaṃ yad gṛhe tat saparigrahaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:440: yad dattaṃ tad abhayaṃ yad gṛhe tat sabhayam /
SA11sanssr_pu:445: yad dattaṃ tataḥ sukham yad gṛhe tadārabhya duṣkhaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:456: yāvat sacet punar asya putre 'tiriktataraṃ premotpadyate tathānyeṣu satveṣu tena tisṛbhiḥ paribhāṣaṇābhiḥ svacittaṃ paribhāṣitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:458: samyakprayuktasya samacittasya bodhisatvasya bodhir na viṣamacittasya bodhir na mithyāprayuktasya /
SA11sanssr_pu:460: ābhis tisṛbhiḥ paribhāṣaṇābhiḥ svacittaṃ paribhāṣyānyatre 'mitrasaṃjñotpādayitavyāmitraṃ hy etan mama /
SA11sanssr_pu:462: yo 'ham asyārthāya buddhaprajñaptāśikṣāyā uddhuratād gatvāsmin putre 'tiriktataraṃ premotpādayāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:464: tena tathā tathā cittam utpādayitavyaṃ yathā yathāsya sarvasatveṣu putrapremānugatā maitry utpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:471: neha saṃvidyate kaścit kasyacit ... paro vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:473: gṛhiṇā bodhisatvena na kasmiṃścid vastuni mamatvaṃ parigraho vā kartavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:476: sacet punar gṛhapate gṛhiṇaṃ bodhisatvaṃ yācanaka upasaṃkramya kiñcid eva vastu yāceta /
SA11sanssr_pu:479: yady aham etad vastu parityajeyaṃ yadi vā na parityajeyam avaśyaṃ mamaitena vastunā vinābhāvo bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:481: etac ca vastu māṃ tyakṣyati ahaṃ cainaṃ tyakṣyāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:482: etac ca vastu parityajyāhaṃ āttasāraḥ kālaṃ kariṣyāmi etac ca parityaktaṃ na me maraṇakāle cittaṃ paryādāya sthāsyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:483: etac ca me maraṇakāle prītiṃ prāmodyam avipratisāritāṃ ca janayiṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:484: sacet punar evam api samanvāharan śaknuyāt tad vastu parityaktum /
SA11sanssr_pu:485: tena sa yācanakaś catasṛbhiḥ saṃjñaptibhiḥ saṃjñapayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:493: mā paritāpsīs tathāhaṃ kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye /
SA11sanssr_pu:495: yathainaṃ ca tavābhiprāyaṃ paripūrayiṣyāmi sarvasatvānāṃ ceti /
SA11sanssr_pu:499: mā bhūd bodhisatvasya tatra aprasādo bodhisatve vā yācanakasyeti /
SA11sanssr_pu:500: na tu mātsaryam evaṃ annavadyaṃ bhavati kutsitaṃ cedaṃ bhagavatā bodhisatvānāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:502: catvāra ime śāriputra dharmā bodhisatvānāṃ na saṃvidyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:509: yasyeme śāriputra catvāro dharmāḥ saṃvidyante sa paṇḍita.ir jñātavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:513: saṃkleśadharmo vatāyaṃ lokāmiṣaguruko vatāyaṃ bhaktacoḍakaparamo vatāyam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:514: tathā cittaśūrāḥ khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisatvā bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:531: na tad vastūpādātavyaṃ yasmin vastuni nāsya tyāgacittam utpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:533: na sa parigrahaḥ parigrahītavyo yasmin parigrahe notsarjanacittam utpādayen na sa parivāra upādātavyo yasmin yācanakair yācyamānasya parigrahabuddhir utpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:534: na tad rājyam upādātavyaṃ na te bhogā na tad ratnam upādātavyaṃ yāvan na tat kiñcid vastūpādātavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:536: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenaivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:538_0: prāg eva bāhyāni vastūni yasya yasya satvasya yena yena yad yat kāryaṃ bhaviṣyati
SA11sanssr_pu:538_1: tasmai tasmai tad dāsyāmi satsaṃvidyamānaṃ hastaṃ hastārthikebhyo dāsyāmi pādaṃ pādārthikebhyo
SA11sanssr_pu:539: māṃsaṃ māṃsārthikebhyaḥ śoṇitaṃ śoṇitārthikebhyo majjānaṃ majjārthikebhyo 'ṅgapratyaṅgāny aṅgapratyaṅgārthikebhyaḥ śiraḥ śirorthikebhyaḥ parityakṣyāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:540_0: kaḥ punar vādo bāhyeṣu vastuṣu yad uta dhanadhānyajātarūparajataratnābharaṇahayagajarathavāhanagrāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīpattanadāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaputraduhitṛparivāreṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:541: api tu khalu punar yasya yasya yena yena yad yat kāryaṃ bhaviṣyati tasmai tasmai satvāya tat tad deyaṃ saṃvidyamānaṃ dāsyāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:543: annapekṣo dāsyāmi satvānugrahāya satvakāruṇyena satvānukampayā teṣām eva satvānāṃ saṃgrahāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:544: yathā me 'mī satvāḥ saṃgṛhītā bodhiprāptasya dharmajānakāḥ syur iti / peyālaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:545_0: tad yathāpi nāma kulaputra bhaiṣajyavṛkṣasya mūlato vā hriyamāṇasya gaṇḍataḥ śākhātaḥ
SA11sanssr_pu:545_1: tvaktaḥ patrato vā hriyamāṇasya puṣpataḥ phalataḥ sārato vā hriyamāṇasya naivaṃ bhavati vikalpo /
SA11sanssr_pu:546: mūlato me hriyate yāvat sārato me hriyatae iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:547: api tu khalu punar avikalpa eva hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭānāṃ satvānāṃ vyādhīn apanayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:548_0: evam eva kulaputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenāsmiṃś cāturmahābhautike ātmabhāve bhaiṣajyasaṃjñotpādayitavyā
SA11sanssr_pu:548_1: yeṣāṃ yeṣāṃ satvānāṃ yena yenārthaḥ tat tad eva me harantu hastaṃ hastārthinaḥ pādaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:550: ayam eva mayā kāyaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ kiṃkaraṇīyeṣu kṣapayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:551_0: tad yathāpi nāmemāni bāhyāni catvāri mahābhūtāni pṛthivīdhātur abdhātus tejodhātur
SA11sanssr_pu:551_1: vāyudhātuś ca nānāsukhair nānāparyāyair nānārambaṇair nānopakaraṇair nānāparibhogaiḥ
SA11sanssr_pu:552: evam evāham imaṃ kāyaṃ caturmahābhūtasamucchrayaṃ nānāsukhair nānāparyāyair nānārambaṇair nānopakaraṇair nānāparibhogair vistareṇa sarvasatvānām upabhogyaṃ kariṣyāmīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:553: sa imam arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan kāyaduṣkhatāṃ ca pratyavekṣate kāyaduṣkhatayā ca na parikhidyate satvāvekṣayeti //
SA11sanssr_pu:555_0: iti hi bodhisatva ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu niryātayan sarvakuśalamūlopakāritvena sarvasatvānāṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:555_1: kuśalamūlaiḥ samanvāharan pradīpasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣūpanayan sukhasamam ātmānaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:556: dharmakukṣisamam ātmānaṃ sarvajagati saṃdhārayan ālokasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣv anugacchan jagatpratiṣṭhāpanasamam ātmānaṃ saṃpaśyan /
SA11sanssr_pu:558_0: mitrasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu niyojayamāno 'nnuttarasukhamārgasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu
SA11sanssr_pu:558_1: saṃdarśayamānaḥ annuttarasukhopadhānasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu pariśodhamānaḥ sūryasamam
SA11sanssr_pu:560: yathākāmakaraṇīyavaśyam ātmānaṃ sarvaloke saṃpaśyann agracaityā bhaviṣyāmaḥ ... sarvajagatsthityātmānaṃ saṃpaśyan /
SA11sanssr_pu:564: sarvajagato dānapatim ātmānam adhimucyamānaḥ sarvalokajñānasamam ātmānaṃ kurvāṇaḥ bodhisatvacaryāprayuktam ātmānaṃ saṃjanayamānaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:568: pratipattau cātmānaṃ sthāpayamāno bodhisatvatyāgacittatāṃ manasi kurvāṇa udyānabhūtam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu saṃpaśyan /
SA11sanssr_pu:569: dharmaratibhūtam ātmānaṃ sarvalokeṣv ādarśayamānaḥ saumanasyadātāram ātmānaṃ sarvasatvānām adhitiṣṭhan /
SA11sanssr_pu:570: annantaprītisaṃjananam ātmānaṃ sarvajagato niryātayamānaḥ sarvaśukladharmāya dvārabhūtam ātmānaṃ sarvaloke saṃdhārayamānaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:574_0: iti hi bodhisatva ātmānam upasthāyakatvāya dadānaḥ yācanakeṣu nīcamanasikāracitto
SA11sanssr_pu:574_6: sārādānābhiprāya iti hi bodhisatvo jihvāṃ yācitaḥ samāno ma ... vātā premaṇīyayā
SA11sanssr_pu:574_7: maitryopacāravitatayā bhadre siṃhāsane rājārhe niṣādya taṃ yācanakam abhibhāṣate dṛṣṭaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:575_0: ariṣṭacitto bhūtvākṣatacitto 'nnupahatacitto mahātman salā ... citto buddhavaṃśasaṃbhūtacitto
SA11sanssr_pu:575_2: jānumaṇḍalapraṣṭhitakāyo bhūtvā svakān mukhāj jihvā ... yācanakasya sarvaśarīram

SA11sanssr_pu:635: yathā tāvat prathamāyām eva pariṇāmanāyāṃ sarvakuśalamūlaprastāveṣūpadiṣṭaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:637: katham etāni kuśalamūlāni sarvajagadupajīvyāny upakāribhūtāni bhaveyur viśuddhadharmaparyavasānāni yena sarvasatvānām etaiḥ kuśalamūlair narakāpāyapratiprasrabdhir bhavati /

SA11sanssr_pu:667: anena me kuśalamūlena te sarvasatvāḥ sarvabuddhān ārāgayeyur ārāgayitvā ca mā virāgayeyuḥ /

SA11sanssr_pu:676_1: sapta dhanapratilambhāṃś ca paripūrayeyuḥ sarvabuddhānāṃ cānuśikṣayeyuḥ kalyāṇendriyapratilambhaṃ cādhigaccheyuḥ /

SA11sanssr_pu:825: yan nv aham imam ātmabhāvaṃ vikrīyānena mūlyena dharmodgatasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya satkāraṃ kuryāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:826_0: dīrgharātraṃ hi mamātmabhāvasahasrāṇi bhagnāni kṣīṇāni vikrītāni punar aparimāṇe

SA11sanssr_pu:827: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'ntarāyaṇamadhyagataḥ śabdam udīrayām āsa ghoṣam anuśrāvayām āsa /
SA11sanssr_pu:828: kaḥ puruṣeṇārthikaḥ kaḥ puruṣeṇārthika iti peyālaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:829: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyān brāhmaṇagṛhapatikāṃs tathā samupasthāpayām āsa yathā taṃ ghoṣaṃ nāśrauṣuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:830: yadātmanaḥ krāyakaṃ na labhate tadaikāntaṃ gatvā prārodīd aśrūṇi ca prāvarttayad evaṃ cāvadad /
SA11sanssr_pu:831: aho vatāsmākaṃ durlabhā lābhā ye vayam ātmabhāvasyāpi kretāraṃ na labhāmahe /
SA11sanssr_pu:832: atha khalu śakro devānām indro māṇavakarūpeṇa yāvat sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam etad avocat /
SA11sanssr_pu:833: kiṃ tvaṃ kulaputra dīnamanā utkaṇṭhitamānaso 'śrūṇi pravarttayamānaḥ sthitaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:835: ahaṃ māṇavaka dharmakāmatayā imam ātmabhāvaṃ vikrīya dharmapūjāṃ karttukāmaḥ so 'ham asya krāyakaṃ na labhe / peyālaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:836: atha khalu sa māṇavakaḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam etad avocat /
SA11sanssr_pu:837: na mama kulaputra puruṣeṇa kṛtyam api tu khalu punaḥ pitur me yajño yaṣṭavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:838: tatra me puruṣasya hṛdayena kṛtyaṃ lohitena ca asthimajjayā ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:841: lābhā me sulabdhāḥ pariniṣpannaṃ cātmānaṃ jāne prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyeṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:842: yan mayātmanaḥ krāyako labdho hṛdaysya rudhirasya cāsthimajjāyāś ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:843: sa hṛṣṭacittaḥ kalyacittaḥ pramuditacittas taṃ māṇavakam etad avocat /
SA11sanssr_pu:844: dāsyāmi māṇavaka yena te ita ātmabhāvād arthaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:845_0: yāvat sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvas tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:845_1: viddhvā lohitaṃ nisrāvayati sma dakṣiṇaṃ coruṃ viddhvā nirmāṃsaṃ ca kṛtvāsthi bhettuṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:846: atha khalv anyatarā śreṣṭhidārikopariprāsādatalagatādrākṣīt sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisatvaṃ yāvat sā śreṣṭhidārikā yena sadāprarudito bodhisatvas tenopasaṃkramyaitad avocat /
SA11sanssr_pu:847: kiṃ nu khalu tvaṃ kulaputraivaṃrūpām ātmanaḥ kāraṇāṃ kārayāsīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:848: yāvat sā dārikā pūjāprayojanaṃ śrutvā punar āha /
SA11sanssr_pu:849: kā punas te kulaputra tato guṇajātir niṣpatsyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:851: sa dārike kulaputro mama prajñāpāramitām upāyakauśalyaṃ copadekṣayti /
SA11sanssr_pu:852: tatra vayaṃ śikṣiṣyāmas tatra vayaṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ sarvasatvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyāmaḥ / peyālaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:853: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisatvam etad avocat /
SA11sanssr_pu:855: yāvad udārāḥ praṇītāś cāmī tvayā dharmāḥ parikīrttitāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:856: ekaikasyāpi kulaputraivaṃrūpasya dharmasyārthāya gaṅgānadīvālikopamān api kalpān evam ātmabhāvāḥ parityaktavyā bhaveyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:857: tathodārāḥ praṇītāś cāmī tvayā dharmāḥ parikīrttitāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:858: api tu khalu kulaputra yena yena kṛtyaṃ tat te dāsyāmi suvarṇaṃ vā maṇiṃ vā muktāṃ vā vaiḍūryaṃ vā yāvad yena tvaṃ taṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisatvaṃ satkariṣyasi /
SA11sanssr_pu:859: yāvad vistareṇa tayā dārikayā pañcaśataparivārayā sārddhaṃ tasya dharmodgatasya saṃkramaṇaṃ kartavyaṃ //

SA11sanssr_pu:994: vāramukhyān na seveta ye cānye bhogavṛttinaḥ / pratisaṃmodanaṃ tebhiḥ sarvaśaḥ parivarjayet //
SA11sanssr_pu:995: yadā ca dharmaṃ deśeyā mātṛgrāmasya paṇḍito /
SA11sanssr_pu:996: na caikaḥ praviśet tatra nāpi hāsyasthito bhaved iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:997: ayaṃ cāparo 'nnartho bhaved yad idaṃ mārakarmoktaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:998: māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tasya bodhisatvasyāciraṃ yānasaṃprasthitasyāntike balavattaram udyogam āpatsyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1000: punar aparam ānanda yasmin samaye bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate tasmin samaye mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso bodhisatvasya viheṭhanam upasaṃharanti bhayaṃ saṃjanayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1002: apy eva nāmāyaṃ bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'vanīyeta vā romaharṣo vāsya bhaved iti /

SA11sanssr_pu:1005: na vayam atrāsvādaṃ labhāmahe ity utthāyāsanāt prakramiṣyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1006: evaṃ vijṛmbhamāṇā uccagghanto yāvat paryavāpsyantīti mārakarma /
SA11sanssr_pu:1011: punar aparaṃ dharmabhāṇakaś chandiko bhaviṣyati imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lekhayituṃ yāvad vācayitu.ṃ dharmaśravaṇikaś ca kilāsī bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1013: dharmabhāṇakaś ca deśāntaraṃ gantukāmo bhaviṣyati dhārmaśravaṇikāś ca neti neyaṃ /

SA11sanssr_pu:1015: saṃkṣepād dharmabhāṇakadhārmaśravaṇikayor yā kācid vidhuratā sarvaṃ tan mārakarmety uktaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1020: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisatva āraṇyako bhavati prāntaśayyāsanābhirato 'lpecchuḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ pravivikto 'saṃsṛṣṭo gṛhasthapravrajitaiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1021_0: so 'lpārthatayālpakṛtyatayā ca sukhaṃ viharati na ca bāhaśrutyaparyeṣṭāv abhiyukto
SA11sanssr_pu:1021_1: bhavati na satvaparipākāya na ca dharmaśravaṇe vā dharmasāṃkathhye vārthaviniścayakathāyāṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:1024: tasyāraṇyavāsena caikārāmaratitayā ca kleśā na samudācaranti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1027: sa tatra nātmārthāya pratipanno bhavati na parārthāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:1028: ayaṃ bhagavan bodhisatvasyāraṇyavāsapratisaṃyuktaḥ saptamo mārāṅkuśa iti // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:1029: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisatvaḥ kalyāṇamitrapratirūpakāṇi pāpamitrāṇi sevate bhajate paryupāste /
SA11sanssr_pu:1030: ye hy enaṃ saṃgrahavastubhyo vicchandya puṇyasaṃbhārāt saddharmaparigrahād vicchandya praviveke niyojayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1033: yasmiṃś ca samaye bodhisatvo vivekavāsena mahāyāne 'bhyudgacchet tasmin samaye taṃ bodhisatvaṃ vaiyāvṛtyapalibodhe niyojayanti vaiyāvṛtyaṃ bodhisatvenāvaśyaṃ karaṇīyaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1034: yasmiṃś ca samaye bodhisatvo vaiyāvṛtye saṃniyojayitavyas tasmin samaye viveke niyojayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1037: sacet tvam aṣṭābhir navabhir vā kalpair annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ nābhisaṃbhotsyase /
SA11sanssr_pu:1038: na bhūyaḥ śakyasy annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhum /
SA11sanssr_pu:1040: bodhisatvo 'tyārabdhena vīryeṇa sthānaṃ khalu punar etad vidyate yan nirvāṇaphalaṃ prāpnuyād /
SA11sanssr_pu:1043: ye 'pi tato 'nye bodhisatvayānīyāḥ pudgalā mārāṅkuśāviddhāḥ pratyaveteṣu dharmeṣu caranti taiḥ sārddhaṃ ratiṃ vindati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1044: tathā hi tadanuvarttakā bhavanti sa hīnasevī viśeṣam annadhigato hīnagatiṃ gacchati yad uta dhanvagatiṃ jaḍaiḍamūkagatiṃ yāvad ekādaśo mārāṅkuśa iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:1045: yena caivaṃ saṃtatyārabdhavīryasya nirvedāt sarvathā bodhisatvabhāva eva bhavaty ata eva ratnameghe 'bhihitaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1047: tathā cārabhate yathā na kāyakhedaṃ saṃjanayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1052: yad idam alpabalasya gurukarmārambho 'tivelāyāṃ vāparipakvādhimukter vā duṣkarakarmārambhas tad yathā svamāṃsadānādiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1055: anyathā hi teṣām eva satvānāṃ bodhisatvakhedena bodhicittavījanāśān mahataḥ phalarāśer nāśaḥ syāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:1058: nāpy akāla ity ātmabhāvatyāgacittam eva notpādyābhyāsānārambhād dhi na kadācid dadyāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1059: tasmād evaṃ smṛtim upāsthāpya bodhicittaparipācanavirodhibhyo mohāt svārthaghātibhyaḥ piśitāśanebhyaḥ karmakāribhyaś cātmabhāvo rakṣitavyaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1064: kathaṃ ca kulaputrātra bodhisatvo mārakarmaparihāropāyakuśalo bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1066: apratirūpadeśavāsaṃ lokāyatamantrasevanabhāvanāṃ lābhasatkārapūjopasthānabahumānaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ parivarjayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1067: ye cānye upakleśā bodhipakṣyamārgāntarāyikās tān sarveṇa sarvaṃ parivarjayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1077: tena ca kulaputraitāni sthānāni parivarjayatā na teṣāṃ pudgalānām antike duṣṭacittam utpādayitavyaṃ na pratighacittaṃ nāvamanyanācittam utpādayitavyam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1079: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā dhātuśaḥ satvāḥ kāmādidhātuṃ āsravanti jāyante saṃsyandante saṃsargāc ca vinaśyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1081: bodhicittasaṃpramoṣo 'py annarthaḥ tasya ca hetur ukto ratnakūṭe /
SA11sanssr_pu:1082: caturbhiḥ kāśyapa dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya bodhisatvasya bodhicittaṃ muhyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1085: mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ ca satvānām avarṇāyaśo 'kīrtyalokaniścāraṇatayā māyāśāṭhyena ca param upacarati nādhyāyāśayeneti asya vivarjanam atroktaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1086: caturbhiḥ kāśyapa dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya bodhisatvasya sarvāsu jātiṣu jātamātrasya bodhicittam āmukhībhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1089: yad uta jīvitahetor api saṃprajānan mṛṣāvādaṃ na prabhāṣate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1091: adhyāśayena ca sarvasatvānām antike tiṣṭhaty apagatamāyāśāṭhyatayā sarvabodhisatveṣu ca śāstṛsaṃjñām utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1093: yāṃś ca satvān paripācayati tān sarvān annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1097: na jātu dharmadānasya antarāyaṃ karoti yaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1101: bodhicittaṃ na riñcati tena sarvāsu jātiṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1102: svapnāntare 'pi taccittaṃ kiṃ punar yadi jāgrataḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1103: āha / yeṣu viratisthāneṣu grāmeṣu nagareṣu vā / samādāyeti bodhāya tena cittaṃ na riñcati //
SA11sanssr_pu:1105: caturbhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatvaḥ praṇidhānān na calati // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:1106: nihatamānaś ca bhavatīrṣyamātsaryaparivarjakaś ca bhavati parasaṃpadaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā āttamanā bhavatīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1107: idam eva pātrabodhicittasya sphuṭataram asaṃpramoṣakāraṇaṃ yat tatraiva ratnakūṭe 'bhihitam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1111: ārocayāmi prativedayāmi vo yathā yathā bahulu vitarkayen naraḥ tathā tathā bhavati tannimnacittaḥ tehī vitarkehi tanniśritehīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:1112: avasādo 'py annartha etadvarjanaṃ ca ratnameghe dṛṣṭaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1115: idaṃ ca me vīryaṃ parīttaṃ ca kusīdo 'haṃ bodhiś cādīptaśiraścailopamena bahūn kalpān /
SA11sanssr_pu:1117: tan nāham utsahae īdṛśaṃ bhāram udvoḍhuṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1119: ye 'pi te 'bhisaṃbuddhās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā ye cābhisaṃbuddhyante ye vābhisaṃbhotsyante 'pīdṛśenaiva nayena īdṛśyā pratipadā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1122: aham api tathā tathā ghaṭiṣye tathā tathā vyāyaṃsye sarvasatvasādhāraṇena vīryeṇa sarvasatvārambaṇena vīryeṇa yathāham annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyae iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:1124: aparipāciteṣu satveṣu viśvāso bodhisatvasya skhalitaṃ abhājanībhūteṣu satveṣūdārabuddhadharmasaṃprakāśanāt bodhisatvasya skhalitaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1125: udārādhimuktikeṣu satveṣu hīnayānasaṃprakāśanād bodhisatvasya skhalitam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1126: samyaksmṛtyupasthiteṣu śīlavatsu kalyāṇadharmeṣu prativimānanā duḥśīlapāpadharmasaṃgrahā bodhisatvasya skhalitam iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:1129: yasya adhimukti na vidyati buddhadharmagaṇe ca na tasya dhimuktiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1130: śikṣavrateṣu na tasya dhimuktiḥ pāpamates tirapāyamukhasya //
SA11sanssr_pu:1131: sa itaś cyuto manujeṣu karmavaśād abudho hi vimūḍhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1132: narakeṣv atha tiryagatīṣu pretagatīṣu ca vindati duṣkham //
SA11sanssr_pu:1135: tatra tathāgata eva sākṣīti kṛtvā na pratikṣipati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1138: annantā buddhabodhir nānādhimuktikatayā tathāgatānāṃ satveṣu dharmadeśanā pravarttatae iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:1141: tathāgatapūjāyāṃ ca vaiyāvṛtyam upadiṣṭaṃ tatra yā vṛttiḥ sā ratnarāśisūtrād āgatā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1142: tatra vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇā sarvabhikṣusaṃghasya cittam abhirādhayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1143: tatra ye bhikṣava āraṇyakāḥ prāntaśayyāsanikās teṣāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1144: vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇā sarveṇa sarvaṃ na karmasamutthānaṃ dātavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1145: yadi punar āraṇyakasya bhikṣoḥ saṃghaparyāpannaṃ śaikṣakaṃ karma prāpnuyāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1147_0: anyataro vā bhikṣur adhyeṣyo na punaḥ sa āraṇyako bhikṣur utpīḍayitavyas tatra yo
SA11sanssr_pu:1147_1: bhikṣuḥ piṇḍacāriko bhavati tasya tena vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇā praṇītabhojaneṣu
SA11sanssr_pu:1148: tatra kāśyapa yo bhikṣur yogācārī bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1149: tasya tena vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇānulomikāny upakaraṇāny upasaṃhartavyāni glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1150: yasmiṃś ca pradeśe sa yogācārī bhikṣuḥ prativasati tasmin pradeśe na uccaśabdaḥ kartavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1153: praṇītāni ca saṃpriyāṇi yogācārabhūmyanukūlāni khādanīyabhojanīyāny upanāmayitavyāni // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:1154: ye bhikṣavo bāhuśrutye 'bhiyuktā bhavanti teṣām utsāho dātavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1159: sāṃkathyamaṇḍalaṃ viśodhayitavyaṃ yāvat sādhukārabahulena cāsya bhavitavyaṃ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:1161: kiyat parīttam api kāryaṃ saṃghamatena kartavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1162: na svamatena yāvan na sāṃghikaś cāturdiśasāṃghikena saṃsṛṣṭaḥ kartavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1164: yadi cāturdiśe saṃghe vaikalyaṃ bhavet sāṃghikaś ca lābha utsado bhavet tena vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇā bhikṣusaṃgham ekamānasaṃ kṛtvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1166: evaṃ stūpe 'pi pralugne 'yam eva vidhir dāyakān dānapatīn vā samādāpya pratisaṃskartavya ity ājñā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1167: yadi punaḥ kāśyapa kiyad bahur api staupiko lābho bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:1168: sa vaiyākṛtyakareṇa na saṃghena cāturdiśasaṃghe upanāmayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1170: yā staupikā antaśa ekadaśāpi śrāddhaiḥ prasādabahulair niryātitā bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1172: kaḥ punar vādo ratnaṃ vā ratnasaṃmataṃ vā yac ca stūpe cīvaraṃ niryātitaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1173: tat tatraiva tathāgatacaitye vātātapavṛṣṭibhiḥ parikṣayaṃ gacchatu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1174: na punaḥ staupikaṃ cīvaraṃ hiraṇyamūlyena parivartayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1175_0: na hi staupikasya kaścid argho nāpi stūpasya kenacid vaikalyaṃ yo hi kaścit kāśyapa
SA11sanssr_pu:1175_1: vaiyāvṛtyakaro bhikṣū ruṣṭacittaḥ śīlavatāṃ dakṣiṇīyānām [doubtful] aiśvaryād ājñaptiṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:1175_2: dadāti sa tenākuśalena karmaṇā narakagāmī bhavatīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1176: yadi manuṣyalokam āgacchati dāso bhavati parakarmakaro lābhī ca bhavati khaṭacapeṭapracaṇḍaprahārāṇāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1178: daṇḍakarmabhayatarjitaṃ bhikṣuṃ karoty akālapreṣaṇam akālajñaptiṃ dadāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1179: sa tenākuśalena karmaṇā bahuśaṅkur nāma pratyekanarakas tatrāsyopapattir bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1185: tasya tatra jihvendriye bahūni śaṅkuśatasahasrāṇi ādīptāni ayomayāni nikhātāni bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1186: yo hi kaścit kāśyapa vaiyavṛtyakaro bhikṣur āgatāgataṃ sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ sannidhiṃ karoti na kālānukālaṃ dadāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1189: sa tenākuśalamūlena jaṅghā nāma gūthamṛtikāpretayonis tatrāsyopapattir bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1191: sa udvaśyamānas tadbhojanam animiṣābhyāṃ netrābhyāṃ paśyamānaḥ kṣutpipāsāparigato duṣkhāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1192: vedanāṃ vetti na ca varṣasahasreṇāpi tasya bhojanasya lābhī bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1193: yad api kadācit karhicid bhojanaṃ labdhaṃ bhavati tad uccāraṃ bhavati pūyaśoṇitaṃ veti //
SA11sanssr_pu:1195: yāṃs tvaṃ saṃgharakṣita satvān adrākṣīḥ kuḍyākārāṃs te bhikṣava āsan /
SA11sanssr_pu:1198: yāṃs tvaṃ saṃgharakṣita satvān adrākṣīḥ stambhākārāṃs te bhikṣava āsan /
SA11sanssr_pu:1201: yāṃs tvaṃ satvān adrākṣīr vṛkṣākārān patrākārān phalākārān te 'pi bhikṣava āsan /
SA11sanssr_pu:1202: tair api sāṃghikāni vṛkṣapatrapus.paphalāni paudgalikaparibhogena paribhuktāni tena te vṛkṣapatrapuṣpaphalākārāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1203: yāṃs tvaṃ satvān adrākṣī rajjvākārān saṃmārjanyākārāṃs te bhikṣava āsan /
SA11sanssr_pu:1204: taiḥ sāṃghikā rajjusammārjanyaḥ paudgalikaparibhogena paribhuktās tena rajjvākārāḥ sammārjanyākārāś ca saṃvṛttāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205: yaṃ tvaṃ satvam adrākṣīs taṭṭākāraṃ sa śrāmaṇeraka āsīt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1208: tair asau dṛṣṭaś ca pṛṣṭaś ca śrāmaṇeraka kim ayaṃ saṃghasya pānakaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1210: kiṃ na paśyatha taṭṭukaṃ nirmāditaṃ pītaṃ pānakam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1211: te vṛttā veleti nairāśyam āpannā hīnadīnavadanāḥ prakrāntāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1212: sa tasya karmaṇo vipākena taṭṭukākāraḥ saṃvṛttāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1213: yaṃ tvam satvam adrākṣīr udūkhalākāraṃ so 'pi bhikṣur āsīt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1216: sa tenoktaḥ śrāmaṇeraka dadasva me khalistākaṃ kuṭṭayitveti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1218: sthavira tiṣṭha tāvan muhūrtaṃ vyagro 'smi paścāt kuṭṭayitvā dāsyāmīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1220: śrāmaṇeraka yadi mama kalpate udūkhalaṃ spraṣṭuṃ tvām evāham udūkhale prakṣipya kuṭṭayeyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1224: yady aham asmai prativacanaṃ dāsyāmi bhūyasyā mātrayā prakopam āpatsyatīti tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1228: jāne tvāṃ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravrajitaṃ śrāmaṇerakaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1231: yady apy evaṃ tathāpi tu yan mayā pravrajitena karaṇīyaṃ tat kṛtaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1235: apy eva nāma etat karmaparikṣayaṃ tanutvaṃ paryādānaṃ gacched iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1236: tenātyayam atyayato na deśitaṃ tena karmaṇodūkhalākāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1239: te bhaiṣajyāni kvāthayanto bhikṣubhir apriyam uktāḥ taiś cittaṃ pradūṣya sthālyo bhinnāḥ tena sthālyākārāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1240: yaṃ tvaṃ satvam adrākṣīr madhye chinnaṃ tantunā dhāryamāṇaṃ so 'pi bhikṣur āsīl lābhī grāhikaḥ tena mātsaryābhibhūtena lābhaḥ saṃparivartitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1242: yas tu haimantikaḥ sa vārṣikaḥ pariṇāmitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1243: tasya karmaṇo vipākena madhye chinnas tantunā dhāryamāṇo gacchati //
SA11sanssr_pu:1249: yābhir mūlāpattibhiḥ kṣatriyo mūrddhābhiṣiktaḥ sarvāṇi pūrvāvaropitāni kuśalamūlāni jhāṣayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1252: yaḥ kulaputra mūrddhābhiṣiktaṃ staupikaṃ vastv apaharati sāṃghikaṃ vā cāturdiśasāṃghikaṃ vā niryātitaṃ vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1255: yaḥ punar dharmaṃ pratikṣipati śrāvakaniryāṇabhāṣitaṃ vā pratyekabuddhaniryāṇabhāṣitaṃ vā mahāyānaniryāṇabhāṣitaṃ vā pratikṣipati pratiṣedhayatīyaṃ dvitīyā mūlāpattiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1256: yaḥ punar mām uddiśya śirastuṇḍamuṇḍakāṣāyavastraprāvṛtaḥ śikṣādhārī vā śikṣādhārī vā tasya duḥśīlasya vā śīlavato vā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy apaharati apaharāyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1257: gṛhasthaṃ vā karoti kāye daṇḍaiḥ praharati cārake vā prakṣipati jīvitena vā viyojayatīyaṃ tṛtīyā mūlāpattiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1258_0: yaḥ punaḥ kṣatriyaḥ saṃcintya mātaraṃ jīvitād vyaparopayati pitaram arhantaṃ bhagavacchrāvakaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:1258_1: vā jīvitād vyaparopayati samagraṃ vā saṃghaṃ bhinatti tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya
SA11sanssr_pu:1259: ebhiḥ pañcabhir ānantaryair karmabhir anyatarānyataraṃ karmotpādayatīyaṃ caturthī mūlāpattiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1261: daśākuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate 'nyāṃś ca bahūn satvān daśasv akuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayatīyaṃ pañcamī mūlāpattiḥ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:1262: yaḥ punar grāmabhedaṃ janapadabhedaṃ nagarabhedaṃ rāṣṭrabhedaṃ karotīyaṃ mūlāpattiḥ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:1263: ādikarmiṇāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vāṣṭau mūlāpattayo /
SA11sanssr_pu:1264: yābhir mūlāpattibhiḥ skhalitā ādikarmikā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ sarvāṇi pūrvāvaropitāni kuśalamūlāni jhāṣayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1265: vastupatitāḥ parājitā devamanuṣyamahāyānamukhād apāyagāmino bhavanti ciraṃ ca saṃsāre sīdanti kalyāṇamitravirahitāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1267: ye satvāḥ pūrvaduścaritahetunāsmin kliṣṭe pañcakaṣāye loke upapannās tae itvarakuśalamūlāḥ kalyāṇamitraṃ saṃniḥśrityedaṃ paramaṃ gambhīraṃ mahāyānaṃ śṛṇvanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1268: te ca parīttabuddhayo 'pi kulaputrā annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1269: teṣāṃ ādikarmikā ye ca bodhisatvā idaṃ paramagambhīraṃ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktaṃ sūtrāntaṃ śṛṇvanti uddiśanti paṭhanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1270: te yathāśrutaṃ yathāparyavāptaṃ pareṣāṃ pūrvabuddhisadṛśānāṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ vistareṇāgrataḥ smārayanti prakāśayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1271: te hy akṛtaśamā bālāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ śṛṇvanta uttrasyanti saṃtrasyanti saṃtrāsam āpadyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:1272: te saṃtrāsena vivarttayanty annuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheś cittaṃ śrāvakayāne cittaṃ praṇidadhati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1274: yayā mūlāpattyā sa kulaputraḥ sarvaṃ pūrvāvaropitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ jhāṣayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1277: tasmād bodhisatvena mahāsatvena parapudgalānām āśayānuśayaṃ prathamaṃ jñātvā yathāśayānāṃ satvānām anupūrveṇa dharmadeśanā kartavyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1279: punar aparam ādikarmiko bodhisatvaḥ kasyacid eva vakṣyati //
SA11sanssr_pu:1280: na tvaṃ śakyasi ṣaṭpāramitāsu caryāṃ cartuṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1281: na tvaṃ śakyasy annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1282: śīghraṃ tvaṃ śrāvakayāne pratyekabuddhayāne vā cittam utpādaya /
SA11sanssr_pu:1284: yāvad yathāpūrvoktam iyam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya dvidyā mūlāpattiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1285: punar aparam ādikarmiko bodhisatvaḥ kasyacid evaṃ vakṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1287: śīlena surakṣitena śīghraṃ tvam annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayasva /
SA11sanssr_pu:1289: yat te kiñcit kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ kleśapratyayād akuśalaṃ karma samudānītaṃ tena pāṭhena śuddhir bhavaty avipākaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1290: yāvad yathāpūrvoktam ayam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya tṛtīyā mūlāpattiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1291: punar aparaṃ kulaputra keṣāñcid ādikarmiko bodhisatva evaṃ vakṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1293: mā śṛṇuta mā paṭhata mā pareṣām upadiśata /
SA11sanssr_pu:1295: na yūyaṃ tasmāt mahat phalaṃ prāpsyatha /
SA11sanssr_pu:1296: na yūyaṃ tato nidānāc chaktāḥ kleśāntaṃ kartuṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1298: śṛṇuta mahāyānaṃ paṭhata mahāyānaṃ pareṣāṃ copadiśata /
SA11sanssr_pu:1301: yadi te tasya vacanakāriṇo bhavantīdṛśaṃ dṛṣṭigatam upagṛhṇīyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1302: ubhayor api mūlāpatir bhavatīyam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya caturthī mūlāpattiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1303: punar aparam ādikarmikā bodhisatvā dvijihvikā bhavanti anyathā nidarśayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1304: idaṃ ca mahāyānaṃ kīrtiśabdaślokārthaṃ lābhasatkārahetoḥ paṭhanti svādhyāyanti dhārayanti vācayanti deśayanti pareṣāṃ ca śrutamātram upadiśanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1307: te pareṣām īrṣyāyanti lābhasatkārahetor yatas te labhante upabhogaparibhogān parebhyas tatpratyayāt te prakupyanti teṣāṃ cāvarṇaṃ niścārayanti kutsanti paṃsayanti vijugupsanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1309: atas te īrṣyahetunā cottarimanuṣyadharmair ātmānaṃ vijñapayanti /

SA11sanssr_pu:1520: bhukto bhuktaḥ punar api saṃjāyate sukumārataraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1525: sa eṣa duṣkṛtakarmāntacārī ālātacakranirmāṇagandharvanagaramṛgatṛṣṇikāsadṛśaṃ mahad arthajātaṃ paśyati ratnavastradhanadhānyanikarabhūtaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1528: sa evaṃ mohitaḥ pāpakārī prajvalitāṅgārakarṣūr laṅghayitvā taddraviṇam anudhāvati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1529: sa karmakṛtair yamapuruṣair gṛhyate śastrajālamadhyagataḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgaśaḥ pāṭyate viśasyate dahyate 'sthyavaśeṣaḥ kriyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1530: na cāsyānnādikālapravṛttaḥ sa lobhas tām apy avasthāṃ gatasya parihīyatae iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:1532: eṣa sa pāpakartā tasmāc chastrasaṅkaṭān muktaḥ kathamapy aṅgārakarṣūr laṅghayitvā karmaṇā bhrāmitaḥ pradeśam anyaṃ prapadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1533: vitathadarśanaṃ nāma tatra karmakṛtāṃ striyaṃ paśyati yā tena pūrvaṃ naṣṭasmṛtinā dṛṣṭā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1535: sa tena dhāvati yena tā striyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1538: gṛhītvā cauṣṭhāt prabhṛti tathā bhujyate yathāsya sarṣapaphalamātrapramāṇam api nāvaśiṣṭaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1542: sa kaṭukāṃ kharāṃ vedanām anubhavaṃs tasmād rāgāgner na nivartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1543: yena tā striyas tena bhūyaḥ saḥ saṃdhāvati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1544: na cāsya tatpīḍā tathā bādhate yathā rāgāgniḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1545: atha tā striyo bhūyo vajramayāyomayaprajvalitagātrās taṃ manuṣyam ādāya jvālāmālākulasarvaśarīrās taṃ nārakeyaṃ siktāmuṣṭivad bhindanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1548: strīvidheyā narā ye tu kutas teṣāṃ bhavet sukham // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:1550: strī vināśo vināśānām iha loke paratra ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1551: tasmāt striyo vivarjyāḥ syur yadīcchet sukham ātmana iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:1553: sa tair yamapuruṣair gṛhyate gṛhītvā ca tanmukhaṃ vidārayanti tasmāj jihvām apakarṣayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1554: sā ca jihvā karmavaśāt pañcayojanaśatapramāṇā bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1555: tasya mṛṣāvādasya balena tasyāś ca sahanirgamanakāle te yamapuruṣā bhūmāv ānāhayanti pradīptāyomayyāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1556: karmakṛtaṃ ca halasahasraṃ prādurbhavati pradīptāgrasaṃyuktaṃ balavadbhir balīvardais tad asyāntargataṃ jihvāyāṃ vahati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1558: sā ca jihvā tathā sukumārā yathā devānām akṣi //
SA11sanssr_pu:1559: yāvat sa vedanātas tanati krandati vikrośati na cāsya tadduḥkhaṃ kaścid apanayatīti vistaraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1560: tasyaivaṃ pracaṇḍām vedanām anubhavato 'nnekāni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi sā ca jihvā kṛṣyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1561: sā kathañcit tasya nārakasya mukhe praviśati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1562: sa bhayavihvalavadano yena vā tena vā niḥpalāyate 'ṅgārakarṣūṣu dahyamāno nimajjan /
SA11sanssr_pu:1563: tasyaivaṃ duḥkhārttasyāśaraṇasyāparāyaṇasya punar api yamapuruṣāḥ prādurbhavanti mudgarāsipāṇayaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1564: te taṃ puruṣaṃ mastakāt prabhṛti yāvat pādau cūrṇayantīty ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:1565: paiśunyavipākas tu yathaiva mṛṣāvādasya trīṇi yojanaśatāni jihveti viśeṣas tu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1566: tāṃ yamapuruṣā nistriṃśān ādāya pradīptadhārān jihvāṃ nikṛntanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1568: paramakaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ prativedayate sa krandati vikrośaty avyaktākṣaraṃ jihvāvirahita ity ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:1570: te tāṃ jihvām āsyaṃ vidārya gṛhṇanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1571: gṛhītvā niśitadhāraiḥ śastraiś chittvā tasya bhūya eva khādanīyārthena mukhe prakṣipanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1572: sa ca jighansārditaḥ kṣutkṣāmavadanaḥ svarudhiralālāparisrutāṃ tām eva svajihvāṃ bhakṣayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1573: sā ca jihvā chinnā punar api saṃjāyate karmavaśāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1574: atha sa bhūmau vedanārttaḥ parivartate viceṣṭate krandate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1575: tasyaivaṃ vedanārttasya parivṛttanayanatārakasya duṣkhārttasya dīnasyāsahāyasyaikākinaḥ svakṛtam upabhuñjānasya yamapuruṣā anuśāsanīgāthāṃ bhāṣante //
SA11sanssr_pu:1576: jihvādhanor vinirmuktas tīkṣṇo vāg viśikhas tvayā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1577: pāruṣyam iti yad dṛṣṭaṃ tasyaitat phalam āgatam //
SA11sanssr_pu:1580: tasya tat prajvalitaṃ tāmradravalohitaṃ jihvāṃ dahati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1582: kaṇṭhaṃ dagdhvā hṛdayaṃ dahati hṛdayaṃ dagdhvāntrāṇi dahati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1587: abaddhaṃ yat tvayā proktaṃ tasyaitat phalam āgataṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1588: yā na [doubtful] satyavatī nityaṃ na cādhyayanatatparā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1589: na sā jihvā budhair dṛṣṭā kevalaṃ māṃsakhaṇḍikā / iti vistaraḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1591: atha paśyati riktaṃ tuccham asārakaṃ karmakṛtaṃ bahudraviṇaṃ paraparigṛhītaṃ tasya karmacoditavyāmohitasyaivaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1593: tataḥ sa nārakas tenaiva dhāvati yena tad dravyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1594: tasyābhidhyākhyamānasasyākuśalasyāsevitabhāvitabahulīkṛtasya tatphalaṃ yad asau narake viparītaṃ paśyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1595: tasyaivaṃ paśyato 'bhidhyābahulasya haste śastraṃ prādurbhavati sa tena dhāvati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1596: teṣām apy anyeṣāṃ nārakāṇāṃ haste śastrāṇi prādurbhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1597: sa taiḥ saha śastreṇa yudhyate yāvat tathā kartyate yathā sarṣapaphalamātram api na bhavati māṃsam asya śarīre tathāsthikaṅkālāvaśeṣaḥ kriyate // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:1598: pareṣāṃ sampa ... mama syād iti cintitaṃ / tasyābhidhyāsamutthasya viṣasya phalam āgatam iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:1601: etebhyo bhayabhīto yena vā tena vā niḥpalāyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1602: sa kathaṃ śaknoti palāyitum aśubhasya karmaṇaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1604: gṛhītvā ca pūrvaṃ tāvan mastakād bhujyate yāvat pārśvataḥ sarpair viṣadaṃṣṭraiḥ saṃdaśya saṃdaśya bhakṣyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1606: pādāv api vahninā dāhyete sa yamapuruṣair dūrād iṣubhir vidhyatae iti vistaraḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1610: ekādaśabhir arcciskandhaiḥ kṣutpipāsāgninā ca sukhanirgatena nirantaraṃ dahyatae iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:1611: kāmamūlāś ca sarvānarthā iti tebhya evodvejitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1615: yena aśramaṇena śramaṇapratijñena mātṛgrāmasya nṛttagītasyābharaṇānāṃ vā śabdaṃ śrutvāyoniśena manaḥkāreṇākṣiptabuddhinā tac chrutvā hasitalaḍitakrīḍitāny aśucim uktaṃ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:1616: tatra te nārakā ayovarṣeṇa sarvāṅgapratyaṅgaśaś cūrṇyante 'ṅgāravarṣeṇa ca pacyante dahyantae ity ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1617: evaṃ paurāṇakāmāsvādanasmaraṇāt padumo nāma narakaḥ paṭhyate svapnāntabhūtasmaraṇāc ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1619: te droṇiṣv ayomayair muṣalair hanyantae iti vistaraḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1620: evam apsarasaḥ prārthanayā brahmacaryapariṇāmanān mahāpadumo nāma naraka uktaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1622: tasyāṃ nadyāṃ yāny asthīni te pāṣāṇāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1626: ye matsyās te nārakā ity ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:1627: evaṃ puruṣasya puruṣeṇa saha maithunavipratipatteḥ aprameyā akāraṇā viśeṣāḥ paṭhyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:1628: evaṃ śiśubhiḥ saha vipratipatteḥ kṣāranadyām uhyamānān dārakān paśyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1632: evaṃ govaḍavājaiḍakādiṣu prakṛtisāvadyaḥ kāmamithyācāraḥ kharataravipākaḥ paṭhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1633: tāsām eva govaḍavādīnāṃ taptāyomayīnāṃ akuśalanirmitānāṃ yonimārgeṇa sa tiryakkāmasevī praviśati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1634: sa tāsām udare pradīptāṅgāranikaraparipūrṇe svidyate pacyate bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇīti vistareṇa draṣṭavyaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1635: evam anyanāśitāsv api bhikṣuṇīṣu vipratipannānāṃ mahānarakapātanāḥ paṭhyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:1637: evaṃ prasahyānītāsv api parastrīṣu labdhāsu ca kanyāsu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1638: evam upavāsasthāsu evaṃ gurūṇāṃ patnīṣu jñātiśabdamānitāsu ca vipratipatteḥ tīvrāś cāparimāṇāś ca mahānarakapātanāḥ paṭhyante //
SA11sanssr_pu:1640: iha brāhmaṇa ekatyo brahmacāriṇam ātmānaṃ pratijāṇīte /
SA11sanssr_pu:1641: sa nehaiva mātṛgrāmeṇa sārddhaṃ dvayaṃ samāpadyate 'pi tu mātṛgrāmaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ nidhyāyan paśyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1642: sa tadā svādayati adhyavasyati adhyavasāya tiṣṭhati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1643: ayam ucyate brāhmaṇa brahmacārī saṃyukto maithunena dharmeṇa na visaṃyuktaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1645: evaṃ mātṛgrāmeṇa sārddhaṃ saṃkrīḍataḥ saṃkilikilāyamānasya āsvādayataḥ apariśuddhaṃ brahmacaryam uktaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1647: evaṃ tiraḥkuḍyagatasya tiroduṣyagatasya vā mātṛgrāmasya nṛttagītādiśabdam āsvādayato maithunasaṃyogam ity uktam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1649: evaṃ devādisthāneṣu brahmacaryapariṇāmanāt saṃyukto maithunena dharmeṇa na visaṃyukta iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:1650: yataś caite kāmā evaṃ smaraṇaprārthanāviṣayam api gatā evam annarthakarās tenaiva kāmāpavādakasūtre 'bhihitam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1652: sabhayaś caiṣa mārgaḥ sapratibhayaḥ sakaṇṭakaḥ sagahanaḥ unmārgaḥ kumārgo vedanāpathaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1659: rogo bhikṣavaḥ kāmā gaṇḍaḥ śalyamadyamadyamūlam āmiṣavaḍisaṃ mṛtyur anityāḥ kāmās tucchāḥ mṛṣāmoṣadharmiṇaḥ svapnopamāḥ kāmāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1661: yathā mṛgāṇāṃ bandhanāya kūṭaṃ dvijānāṃ bandhanāya jālaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1665: kāmaparyeṣaṇāṃ carato dīrgharātraṃ siṃhānāṃ mukhe parivartitasyānto na prajñāyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1666: yāvad goghātakānāṃ gavāsanānāṃ mukhe parivartitasyānto na prajñāyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1667: yāvan maṇḍūkānāṃ satāṃ sarpāṇāṃ mukhe parivartitasyānto na prajñāyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1668: dīrgharātraṃ kāmān pratisevamānānāṃ corā iti kṛtvā gṛhītānāṃ śiraśchinnānām anto na prajñāyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1669: pāradārikāḥ pāripanthikā grāmaghātakā janapadaghātakā yāvad granthimocakā iti kṛtvā gṛhītānāṃ śiraśchinnānām anto na prajñāyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1670: duṣkhaṃ tīvraṃ kharaṃ kaṭukam anubhūtaṃ rudhiraṃ prasyanditaṃ pragharitaṃ yac caturṣu mahāsamudreṣūdakāt prabhūtataraṃ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:1672: asthisaṃghātaḥ snāyusaṃbaddho māṃsenānuliptaḥ carmaṇā paryavanaddhaḥ chavyā praticchannaḥ chidravicchidraḥ kṛmisaṃghaniṣevitaḥ satvānām annarthakaḥ kleśakarmaṇāṃ vastu //
SA11sanssr_pu:1674: tad yathā cakṣūrogaḥ śrotrarogo yāvad arśāṃsi piṭako bhagandaraḥ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:1678: indriyāṇāṃ pāripākaḥ paribhedaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ purāṇībhāvo jarjarībhāvaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1679: yāvan nārhasy evam udgharantaṃ pragharantaṃ jugupsanīyaṃ kāyaṃ pratiṣevituṃ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:1682: kathaṃ ca tvaṃ prāhito mūrchito 'dhyavasito 'dhyavasānam āpannaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1685: tvaṃ ca kāmān pratisevya vinipātagato bhaviṣyasi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1691: tena kāmamithyācārāt prativiratena bhavitavyaṃ svadārasaṃtuṣṭena paradārānabhilāṣiṇāraktanetraprekṣiṇā nirviṇṇamanasā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1699: tathāhaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā saṃkalpair api kāmān na paribhokṣye /
SA11sanssr_pu:1700: kaḥ punar vādo dvīndriyasamāpattyā vānaṅgavijñaptyā veti //
SA11sanssr_pu:1702: bodhisatvena svabhāryāyā antike tisraḥ saṃjñā utpādayitavyāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1707: yāvad aparās tisraḥ / śīlāntarāyasaṃjñā dhyānāntarāyasaṃjñā prajñāntarāyasaṃjñā //
SA11sanssr_pu:1708: aparās tisraḥ / corasaṃjñā badhakasaṃjñā narakapālasaṃjñā iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:1710_0: atha candrottarādārikā samanantaraṃ pradhāvantaṃ taṃ mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyāṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:1710_1: velāyāṃ vihāyasāntarīkṣe tālamātram abhyudgamya sthitvā ca taṃ mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:1711: kāyaṃ mamekṣadhvam imaṃ manojñaṃ suvarṇavarṇaṃ jvalanaprakāśam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1712: na raktacittasya hi mānuṣasya prajñāyate śobhanakaṃ śarīram //
SA11sanssr_pu:1713: ye etv agnikarṣūpamasaṃpradīptān tyajanti kāmān viṣayeṣv agṛddhāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1714: ṣaḍindriyaiḥ saṃvarasaṃvṛtāś ca ye brahmacaryaṃ ca caranti śubham //
SA11sanssr_pu:1715: dṛṣṭvā ca dārān hi parasya ye vai kurvanti mātābhaginīti saṃjñāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1716: prāsādikās te hi sudarśanīyā bhavanti nityaṃ paramaṃ manojñāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1717: sphuṭām imāṃ vettha purīṃ samantād yo romakūpān mama cātigandhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1718: na rāgacittena mayārjito 'yam phalaṃ tu dānasya damasya cedam //
SA11sanssr_pu:1719: na me samutpadyati rāgacittaṃ mā vītarāgāsu janīṣva rāgaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1720: sākṣī mamāyaṃ purato munīndraḥ satyaṃ yathā vedmi na jātu mithyā //
SA11sanssr_pu:1723: bhrātā svasā cāpi pitā babhūva ko rāgacittaṃ janayej jananyāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1730: na nirvṛtiṃ yānti ca raktacittā rāgo hi tasmāt parivarjanīyaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1733: kumbhāṇḍayakṣā asurāḥ piśācā bhavanti ye rāgaparīttacittāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1734: kāṇāś ca khañjāś ca vijihvakāś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1736: bhavanti nānāvidhadoṣabhājāś caranti ye kāmacarīṃ jaghanyām //
SA11sanssr_pu:1739: brahmāṇa īśā [doubtful] vaśavarttinaś ca tad brahmacaryaṃ vipulaṃ caritvā //
SA11sanssr_pu:1743: kṣitīśvarāś caiva bhavanty udagrāḥ suśreṣṭhino vai gṛhapatyamātyāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1744: sukhasaumanasyena ca yānti vṛddhiṃ ye brahmacaryaṃ vipulaṃ caranti //
SA11sanssr_pu:1745: kabhallitāpān atha dhūmagārān bandhāṃs tathā tāḍanatarjjanāṃś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1753: avidyāpidhitā bālās tamaḥskandhane āvṛtāḥ / strīṣu saktās tathā mūḍhā amedhya iva vāyasāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1754: mārasya gocaro hy eṣa prasthitā yena durgatiḥ / āsvādasaṃjñino gṛddhā mīṭasthāne yathā krimiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1755: kīṭakumbho yathā citro yatra yatraiva dṛśyate / pūrṇo mūtrapurīṣeṇa dṛtir vā vātapūritā //
SA11sanssr_pu:1757: daurgandhyaṃ sravate kāyād bālānāṃ tad yathā madhu //
SA11sanssr_pu:1759: gaṇḍabhūto hy ayaṃ kāyaḥ kutsito hy āmagandhikaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1760: nānāprāṇibhiḥ saṃpūrṇo mukhagaṇḍo yathā bhavet / evam eva hy ayaṃ kāyo viṣṭhādyaśucibhājanam //
SA11sanssr_pu:1761: antyāntrākulaṃ hy udaraṃ sayakṛtphupphuṣākulam / vṛkkau vilohitaṃ pittaṃ mastaluṅgāsthimajjakam //
SA11sanssr_pu:1762: aśītiṃ krimikulasahasrāṇi yāni tiṣṭhanti antare / aha bālā na paśyanti mohajālena āvṛtāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1763: navavraṇamukhaiḥ prasravanty aśuciṃ pūtigandhikam / bālā nimittaṃ gṛhṇanti vacane darśane 'pi ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:1764: uktāḥ paścān na jānanti yo deśaḥ sarvakutsitaḥ / uccāragocarā bālāḥ kheṭasiṅghāṇabhojinaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1765: jugupsanīye rajyante vraṇaṃ dṛṣṭveva makṣikāḥ / kakṣāsv āgharate svedo gandho vāyati kutsitaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1766: kurvanti duṣkṛtaṃ karma yena gacchanti durgatim / hīnān kāmān niṣevanto hīnān dharmān niṣevya ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:1767: gatvā avīciṃ duṣprajñāḥ duṣkhāṃ vindanti vedanāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1768: uccāra iva durgandhāḥ striyo buddhaiḥ prakīrtitāḥ //
