SA11sanssr_pu:2811: lūho me piṇḍapāto rukṣo me piṇḍapāta āsīn na ca me yāvadarthaṃ bhuktaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:2816: sarvam etat piṇḍacārikeṇa bhikṣuṇā na kartavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:2818: yat pātre patitaṃ lūhaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā śubhaṃ vāśubhaṃ vā tat paribhoktavyam aparitapyamānenāśayaśuddhena dharmanidhyaptibahulena /
SA11sanssr_pu:2819: kāyajāpanārtham āryamārgasyopastambhārthaṃ sa piṇḍapātaḥ paribhoktavya iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:2821: yasyāś cāntike piṇḍapātaṃ paribhujya na śaknoty ātmanaḥ parasya cārthaṃ paripūrayitum anujānāmy ahaṃ tasya piṇḍacārikasya bodhisatvasya nimantraṇam iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:2824: tathā hy uktaṃ / māṃsaṃ sarvam abhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmāno bodhisatvasyeti vadāmi // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:2825: svājanyād vyabhicārāc ca śukraśoṇitasaṃbhavāt / udvejanīyaṃ bhūtānāṃ yogī māṃsaṃ vivarjayet //
SA11sanssr_pu:2826: māṃsāni ca palāṇḍūṃś ca madyāni vividhāni ca / gṛñjanaṃ laśunaṃ caiva yogī nityaṃ vivarjayet //
SA11sanssr_pu:2827: mrakṣaṇaṃ varjayet tailaṃ śalyaviddheṣu na svapet /
SA11sanssr_pu:2828: chidrāchidreṣu satvānāṃ yac ca sthānaṃ mahābhayam // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:2829: lābhārthaṃ hanyate prāṇī māṃsārthaṃ dīyate dhanaṃ / ubhau tau pāpakarmāṇau pacyete rauravādiṣu //
SA11sanssr_pu:2831: yo 'tikramya muner vākyaṃ māṃsaṃ bhakṣeta durmatiḥ / lokadvayavināśārthaṃ dīkṣitaḥ śākyaśāsane //
SA11sanssr_pu:2832: te yānti paramaṃ ghoraṃ narakaṃ pāpakaṝiṇaḥ / rauravādiṣu raudreṣu pacyante māṃsakhādakāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:2833: trikoṭikṣuddhaṃ māṃsaṃ vai akalpitam ayācitaṃ / acoditaṃ ca naivāsti tasmān māṃsaṃ na bhakṣyayet //
SA11sanssr_pu:2834: māṃsaṃ na bhakṣyayed yogī mayā buddhaiś ca garhitaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:2837: durgandhaḥ kutsanīyaś ca utmattaś cāpi jāyate / caṇḍālapukkasakule ḍombeṣu ca punaḥ punaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:2838: ḍākinījātiyonau ca māṃsāde jāyate kule / ṛkṣamārjarayonau ca jāyate 'sau narādhamaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:2839: hastikakṣye mahāmeghe nirvāṇāṅgulimālike / laṅkāvatārasūtre ca mayā māṃsaṃ vigarhitaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:2840: buddhaiś ca bodhisatvaiś ca śrāvakaiś ca vigarhitaṃ / khādate yadi nirlajja unmatto jāyate sadā //
SA11sanssr_pu:2841: brāhmaṇeṣu ca jāyante atha vā yogināṃ kule / prajñāvān dhanavāṃś caiva māṃsādyānāṃ vivarjanāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:2842: dṛṣṭaśrutaviśaṅkābhiḥ sarvaṃ māṃsaṃ vivarjayet / tārkikā nāvabudhyante kravyādakulasaṃbhavāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:2843: yathaiṣa rāgo mokṣasya antarāyakaro bhavet / tathaiva māṃsamadyādi antarāyakaraṃ bhavet //
SA11sanssr_pu:2844: vakṣanty annāgate kāle māṃsādā mohavādinaḥ / kalpikaṃ niravadyaṃ ca māṃsaṃ buddhānuvarṇitaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:2845: bheṣajyam iva āhāraṃ putramāṃsopamaṃ punaḥ / mātrayā pratikūlaṃ ca yogī piṇḍaṃ samācaret //
SA11sanssr_pu:2846: maitrīvihāriṇā nityaṃ sarvathā garhitaṃ mayā / siṃhavyāghramṛgādyaiś ca saha ekatra saṃbhavet //
SA11sanssr_pu:2847: tasmān na bhakṣayen māṃsam udvejajanakaṃ nṛṇāṃ / mokṣadharmaniruddhatvād āryāṇām eṣa vai dhvajaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:2848: yat tu jñānavatīparivarte māṃsabhakṣaṇaṃ paṭhyate tan mahārthasādhakatvān nirdoṣam //
SA11sanssr_pu:2854: na ca mahākaruṇābhiyuktam / tena asmin na maitrī śaṅkāpi nāstīty adoṣaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:2855: yady apy āryaratnameghe 'bhihitaṃ / śmāśānikena nirāmiṣeṇa bhavitavyam iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:2857: vinaye 'pi yad anujñātaṃ tat tu trikoṭipariśuddhabhakṣaṇe na prahāṇāntarāya iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:2861: tatra tatra deśanā pāṭhe śikṣāpadānām ānupūrvīṃ bandhan niśreṇīpadavinyāsayogena /
SA11sanssr_pu:2863: tatra uddiṣya krṭāni pratiṣiddhāni tato 'ntaśaḥ prakṛtimṛtāny api pratiṣiddhānīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:2864: uktaṃ satatabhaiṣajyaṃ / glānapratyayabhaiṣajyaṃ tat sevyam eva //
SA11sanssr_pu:2865: śrāvakavinaye 'pi tāvad ātmārthaṃ brahmacaryavāsārthaṃ pātracīvaram api vikrīya /
SA11sanssr_pu:2867: kiṃ punar aparimitajanaparitrāṇahetor bodhisatvaśarīrasya durlabhā cedṛśī kṣaṇapratilābhotsavasampad /
SA11sanssr_pu:2868: iti tatpradarśanārthaṃ ca bhagavatā tatra svayaṃ bhaiṣajyopayogaḥ pradarśitaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:2870: tair yadā pracāritaṃ bhavati tadā satyāṃ velāyām asatyāṃ vā teṣām imāny evaṃrūpāṇi kāyopastambhanāny upakaraṇāni na labhyante 'bhyavahartuṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:2871: yad uta sarpir vā tailaṃ vā mūlaraso vā gaṇḍaraso vā phalaraso vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:2872: na cānyān abhyavaharato dṛṣṭvā pratighacittam utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:2873: yadi punaḥ khalu paścādbhaktiko bodhisatvo vā glāno bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:2874: yathārūpeṇāsya glānyena jīvitāntarāyo bhavati kuśalapakṣāntarāyo vā tena niṣkaukṛtyena bhūtvā nirvicikitsakena bhaiṣajyacittam upasthāpya pratinisevyānīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:2876: hrīrapatrāpyakāpair niḥ... [doubtful] pracchādanārthaṃ tu śramaṇaliṅgasaṃdarśanārtham imāni ca kāṣāyāṇi devamānuṣāsurasya lokasya caityam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:2884: etāni ca kāṣāyāṇy āryamārgasaṃbhārānukūlānīti kṛtvā tathā kariṣyāmo yathā naikakṣaṇam api sakaṣāyāḥ kāye kāṣāyāṇi dhārayiṣyāma iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:2886: ye punas te kāśyapa vaidaryā asaṃyatā itaḥ śramaṇaguṇadharmād uddhurāḥ kāye kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dhārayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:2889: tatra kāśyapa pratyekanarake śramaṇarūpapratirūpeṇa tāḥ kāraṇāḥ kāryante ādīptacailā ādīptaśīrṣā ādīptapātrā ādīptāsanā ādīptaśayanāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:2890: yaḥ kaścit tatra teṣām upabhogaparibhogaḥ sa sarva ādīptaḥ saṃprajvalita ekajvālībhūtaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:2891: tatra taiḥ śramaṇavarṇarūpeṇa duṣkhāṃ vedanām anubhavantīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:2893: yadi bhaved abhyavakāśiko bodhisatvo glānakāyo 'pratibalakāyas tena vihārakṣitenaivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:2895: tathāhaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā vihārasya eva kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya ghaṭiṣyāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:2896: tatra ca vihāre na gṛddhim utpādayāmi nādhyavasānaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:2898: kartavyo dānapatīnām anugraho nāsmābhir ātmambharibhir bhavitavyam iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:2900: te śayyāṃ kalpayanto dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:2901: pādasyopari pādam ādhāya cīvaraiḥ asaṃvṛtakāyāḥ smṛtāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:2904: na pārśvasukham anytra yāvad evaiṣāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ sthitaye jāpanāyai /
SA11sanssr_pu:2905: ity anayā diśā sarvaparibhogāḥ satvārtham adhiṣṭhātavyāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:2914: atha tasyām eva parṣadi yogācārāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ dve śate imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā prarudite /
SA11sanssr_pu:2917: na punar aprāptaphalā ekapiṇḍapātam api śraddhādeyasya paribhokṣyāmaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:2919: sādhu sādhu kulaputrā evaṃrūpair lajjābhiḥ kaukṛtyasaṃpannaiḥ paralokāvadyabhayadarśibhir idaṃ pravacanaṃ śobhate //
SA11sanssr_pu:2924: yadi bhikṣavo bhikṣur yukto yogācāro mama śikṣāyāṃ pratipannaḥ sarvasaṃskāreṣv anityadarśī /
SA11sanssr_pu:2925: sarvasaṃskāraduḥkhaviditaḥ sarvadharmeṣv annātmādhimuktiḥ śāntanirvāṇābhikāṅkṣī sumerumātrair ālopaiḥ śraddhādeyaṃ bhuñjīta /
SA11sanssr_pu:2927: yeṣāṃ ca dāyakānāṃ dānapatīnāṃ sakāśāc chraddhādeyaṃ paribhuktaṃ tatas teṣāṃ dāyakadānapatīnāṃ maharddhikaḥ puṇyavipāko bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:2930: agram idam aupadhikānāṃ puṇyakriyāvastūnāṃ yeyaṃ maitracittasamāpattiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:2931_0: tatra kāśyapa yo bhikṣur dāyakasya dānapater antikāc cīvarapiṇḍapātaṃ paribhujyāpramāṇaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:2931_1: cetaḥsamādhiṃ samāpadyate 'pramāṇas tasya dāyakasya dānapateḥ puṇyakriyāvipākaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:2932: syāt kāśyapa trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau mahāsamudrāṇāṃ kṣayo na tv eva tasya puṇyaniṣyandanasya kaścit kṣaya iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:2933: tad evaṃ piṇḍapātagamanaārambhe bhojanārambhe vā triṣu sthāneṣu smṛtir upasthāpyā dāyakānugrahe /
SA11sanssr_pu:2936: tathāgatājñāsaṃpādane tu sarvakāryeṣu smṛtiḥ kāryā / ādiśabdān mantrair api rakṣā kāryā //
SA11sanssr_pu:2937: tatrāpi tāvad imāṃ trisamayarājoktāṃ vidyāṃ maṇḍalasamayārtham uccārayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:2945: athavā tathāgatahṛdayam aṣṭasahastraṃ japet salaukikalokottaramaṇḍalapraviṣṭo bhavati / katamac ca tat //
SA11sanssr_pu:2957: anenādikarmikā api satveṣv anantaṃ buddhakṛtyaṃ kurvanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:2958: ayam eva paramāṃ rakṣāṃ mārādibhyaḥ sarvaduṣṭebhyaḥ karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:2959: hastatāḍena bhasmanā sarṣapair udakena dṛṣṭyā manasā vā sīmābandhaṃ karoti //
SA11sanssr_pu:2961: vanakusumāni vā caitye pratimāyāṃ saddharmapustake vā samāhito nivedayet //
SA11sanssr_pu:2963: buddhabodhisatvālambanena sarvasatvārthābhilāṣiṇā ca cittena bhadracarividhipūrvakaṃ ca japtavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:2970: adhimukticaryā śikṣāpadeṣv acalasya nirvicikitsasya duḥśīlapūrvasyāpi sidhyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:2973: bodhicittaṃ dṛḍhaṃ yasya niḥsaṃgā ca matir bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:2974: vicikitsā naiva kartavyā tasyedaṃ sidhyati dhruvam / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:2975: bodhicittadṛḍhatā cātra pṛthagjanacalacittatāyā niyamārtham uktā na tu bhūmipraviṣṭam adhikṛtya //
SA11sanssr_pu:2980: tathā kuto mamālpapuṇyasya siddhir iti nīcacittapratiṣedhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:2981: na cātikrāntadurgater utsāhormibahulasyopacitāprameyapuṇyaskandhasya bhūmipraviṣṭasyāyaṃ pūrvokto doṣaḥ saṃbhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:2982: atra ca mantrāṇām ajñānān nādhikākṣarapāṭhe doṣo 'sti /
SA11sanssr_pu:2985: kiṃtu śraddhāvegaṃ bodhicittavegaṃ sarvotsargavegaṃ ca pramāṇīkṛtyāvicārataḥ pravartitavyam avaśyaṃ buddhabodhisatvam ihaiva yatheṣṭasiddhiś ca bhavati //
SA11sanssr_pu:2997: namo 'stu te agrograśāsānānāṃ raṇa haṃ phula sphāṭa vajrottame svāhā //
SA11sanssr_pu:3000: bhojanapānaśayanāsanavasanapūjopakaraṇāni cābhimantritena jalena dṛṣṭyā manasā vā rakṣeta /
SA11sanssr_pu:3009: anena prathamaṃ piṇḍam aṣṭābhimantritaṃ bhuñjīta bhaiṣajyarājatāṃ buddhabodhisatvānām anusmṛtya //
SA11sanssr_pu:3032: ya imāṃ vidyāṃ sakṛc chṛṇoti sa sapta varṣāṇy ahinā na daśyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3034: yaś cainaṃ ahir daśati saptadhāsya sphuṭen mūrddhā arjakasyeva mañjarī //
SA11sanssr_pu:3035: ya imāṃ vidyāṃ dhārayati sa yāvajjīvam ahinā na daśyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3037: imāni ca mantrapadāni sarpasya purato na vaktavyāni yatkāraṇaṃ sarpo mriyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:3065: iti hi bhikṣavo jāṅgulyāṃ vidyāyāṃ udāhṛtāyāṃ sarvabhūtasamāgate sarvaṃ tathāvitathānanyathābhūtaṃ satyam aviparītam aviparyastaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3094: rakṣa māṃ sarvasatvāṃś ca sarvabhayebhyaḥ sarvopāye sopasargebhyaḥ svāhā //
SA11sanssr_pu:3096: namo ratnatrayāya / namo mārīcyai devatāyai / mārīcyā devatāyā hṛdayam āvartayiṣyāmi //
SA11sanssr_pu:3105: imām api vidyām annantajātismarahetuṃ mahāprabhāvāṃ saptapañcāśadakṣarāṃ vidyādharapiṭakopanibaddhāṃ sarvabhayarakṣārthaṃ prayuñjīta //
SA11sanssr_pu:3119: namo sabbasammasaṃbuddhāṇaṃ sijjhantu me mantapadāḥ svāhā //
SA11sanssr_pu:3120: eṣā rakṣātmabhāvasya bhaiṣajyavasanādibhiḥ / satvārthasmṛtipūrvakam eva vaktavyā //
SA11sanssr_pu:3123: tatra yadi vismṛtya paradravyam ātmabharaṇatṛṣṇayā paribhuṅkte kliṣṭāpattim āpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3124: atha vitṛṣṇo 'nyāsakto vā satvakāryam anusmṛtya bhuṅkte na kliṣṭām āpattim āpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3127: satvasvāmikais tu bhogaiḥ satvasvāmika evātmabhāvaḥ saṃrakṣata ity adoṣaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3128: na hi dāsasya nityaṃ svāmikarmavyāpṛtasya svadravyam asti yena varteta //
SA11sanssr_pu:3131: na caikāntasvāmyarthaparasya dāsasya vyādhyādiviklavamateḥ svāminam annanujñāpyāpi bhuñjānasya kaścid doṣaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3132: nāpy evaṃ kurvāṇasya bodhisatvasyāntike kasyacid viditavṛttāntasyāpy aprasādo yujyate mātsaryatyāgacittāparijñānāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:3133: na cātra nyāye kaścit saṃdeho yuktaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3134: sarvotsargo hi pūrvam eva bhagavatkaṇṭhoktyā pratipāditaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3136: tasya spaṣṭāvabodhārtham ayaṃ nyāyo 'bhiyukto na tu svārthāpekṣayeti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3139: bhogapuṇyarakṣā saptamaḥ paricchedaḥ evaṃ tāvad ātmabhāvarakṣā veditavyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:3141: tatra sukṛtārambhiṇā bhāvyaṃ mātrajñena ca sarvata iti śikṣāpadād asya bhogarakṣā na duṣkarā //
SA11sanssr_pu:3149: alpādhamabhogenāpi kāryasiddhau satyāṃ svayam anyair vā bahūttamabhoganāśanopekṣā na kāryeti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3153: adhikasatvārthaśaktes tulyaśakter vā bodhisatvasyādhikatulyakuśalāntarāyakarau tyāgātyāgau na kāryāv iti siddhaṃ bhavatīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3155: yas tu khalu punaḥ śāriputrābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisatvo bodhyaṅgair abhiyuktas tena kathaṃ dānaṃ dātavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3159: yaś ca śāriputra gṛhī bodhisatvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi saptaratnapratipūrṇāni kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyād /
SA11sanssr_pu:3160: yaś ca śāriputra pravrajyāparyāpanno bodhisatva ekāṃ catuṣpadikāṃ gāthāṃ prakāśayed ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3161: na śāriputra tathāgatena pravrajitasyāmiṣadānam anujñātaṃ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:3162: yasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra pātrāgataḥ pātraparyāpanno lābho bhaved dhārmiko dharmalabdhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3164: sacet punaḥ kaścid evāgatya pātraṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā yāceta /
SA11sanssr_pu:3167: sacet punas tasyonaṃ cīvaraṃ bhaved yan niśritya brahmacaryavāsaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3171: sacet punaḥ śāriputra bodhisatvaḥ tricīvaraṃ parityajya yācanakaguruko bhaven na tenālpecchatā āsevitā bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:3172: yas tu khalu punaḥ śāriputrābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisatvas tena dharma āsevitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3174: anyathā hy ekasaṃgrahārthaṃ mahataḥ satvarāśes tasya ca satvasya bodhisatvāśayaparikarmāntarāyān mahato 'rthasya hāniḥ kṛtā syād /
SA11sanssr_pu:3179: yo 'yaṃ vidhir ātmany uktaḥ so 'nyasminn api bodhisatve pratipādya iti kuto gamyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3194: tathā ca dharmasaṅgītau sārthavāho bodhisatva āha /
SA11sanssr_pu:3195: yo bhagavan bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ prathamataraṃ bodhim icchati nātmanaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3198: kiṃ tu satvārthahānibhayād ayogye satve subharaṃ nāropayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3199: yatra tu satvārthahāniṃ na paśyati tatra svayaṃ kṛtam anyena vā jagad dhitam ācaritam iti ko viśeṣo /
SA11sanssr_pu:3200: yad ayam aparabodhisatvakuśalasiddhaye na svakuśalam utsṛjati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3203: atha tadduṣkhena me bādhā nāstīty upekṣate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3206: catvāra ime kāśyapa bodhisatvapratirūpakā ity ārabhyoktaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3208: tasmād ugraparipṛcchāvidhinā pūrvavad ātmā garhaṇīyaḥ eṣā tu bodhisatvaśikṣā yathāryanirārambheṇa dharmasaṅgītisūtre nirdiṣṭā /
SA11sanssr_pu:3215: yan maitrīṃ ca mahākaruṇāṃ ca na tyajanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3219: yat kāyajīvitaṃ ca sarvakuśalamūlaṃ ca sarvasatvānāṃ niryātayanti na ca pratikāraṃ kāṅkṣanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3222: yat pūrvataraṃ satvānāṃ bodhim icchanti nātmana iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3227: yena dātur mahādakṣiṇīye mahārthadānān mahāpuṇyasāgaravistaro dṛśyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3228: anyathā tu kevalam eva vighātino maraṇaṃ syāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:3230: ya eṣa te mahārāja varṣaśatasahasreṇa parivyayo 'tra praviṣṭaḥ sa sarvaḥ piṇḍīkṛtyaikasya bhikṣor yātrā bhaved evaṃ pratyekaṃ sarvabhikṣūṇāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3231: yaś coddeśasvādhyāyābhiyukto bodhisatvaḥ sagauravo dharmakamaḥ śraddhādeyam āhāraṃ parigṛhyaivaṃ cittam utpādayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:3233: asya kuśalasyaiṣa deyadharmaparityāgaḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaitīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3234: tad gṛhasukhapaliśuddham adhikṛtyoktaṃ / na tu pūrvoktavidhinā kaścid doṣaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:3244: na rūpahetor na varṇahetor na yaśohetoḥ / pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:3249: sa evaṃrūpeṇa śīlaskandhena samanvāgato bodhisatvo daśabhir dharmair na hīyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3252: tatra ca bhavaty apramatto bodhipratikāṅkṣī buddhadarśanam abhikāṅkṣate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3253: evaṃ brahmatvād buddhadarśanābhedyapratilambhād dharmaśravaṇān na parihīyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3256: evaṃ śīlaskandhapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sadā namaḥkṛto bhavati devaiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3259: sadā pūjito bhavati gandharvaiḥ sadāpacāyitaś ca bhavati nāgendrāsurendraiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3263: śāstṛsaṃmataś ca bhavati sadevakasya lokasyānukampakaś ca bhavati sarvasatvānāṃ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:3266: yad utākṣaṇagatiṃ na gacchaty anyatra satvaparipākāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:3270: evaṃ pūrvotsṛṣṭasyāpi puṇyasya kleśavaśāt punar upādīyamānasya rakṣā kāryā /
SA11sanssr_pu:3271: puṇyadānād api yat puṇyaṃ tato 'pi na vipākaḥ prārthanīyo 'nyatra parārthāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:3274: yathoktam ugraparipṛcchāyāṃ / dattvā ca na vipratisāracittam utpādayitavyam iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3276: vipratisārāt pāpavat puṇyasyāpi kṣayaḥ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3281: pāpasya daurmanasyenaiva puṇyasya saumanasyenāpattiḥ satvārthaṃ nirāmiṣacittasya prakāśayataḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:3282: yathā ratnameghe vaidyadṛṣṭāntena ātmotkarṣo nirdoṣa uktaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3283: punaḥ puṇyarakṣā kāmo lābhasatkārabhītaḥ syād unnatiṃ varjayet sadā /
SA11sanssr_pu:3284: bodhisatvo prasannaḥ syād dharme vimatim utsṛjet //
SA11sanssr_pu:3286: caturbhiḥ kāśyapa dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya bodhisatvasyotpannotpannāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ parihīyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:3287: yaiḥ caturbhir muktāḥ na vardhante kuśaladharmaiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3294: paśyadhvaṃ bhikṣava etaṃ bhikṣuṃ keśanakhastūpe sarvāṅgena praṇipatya cittam abhiprasādayantam /
SA11sanssr_pu:3296: anena bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā yāvatī bhūmir ākrāntādharaśītiyojanasahasrāṇi yāvat kāñcanacakraṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3297: atrāntare yāvantyā vālikās tāvanty anena bhikṣuṇā cakravartirājyasahasrāṇi paribhoktavyāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:3298: yāvad athāyuṣmān upālir yena bhagavān tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat /
SA11sanssr_pu:3299: yad uktaṃ bhagavatāsya bhikṣor evaṃ mahānti kuśalamūlāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:3300: kutremāni bhagavan kuśalamūlāni tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3301: nāham upāle evaṃ kṣatiṃ copahatiṃ ca samanupaśyāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:3303: atropāle imāni mahānti kuśalamūlāni tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3304: tasmāt tarhy upāle evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yad dagdhasthūṇāyām api cittaṃ na pradūṣayiṣyāmaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3307: pratighaḥ pratigha iti kalpaśatopacitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ pratihanti tenocyate pratigha iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3308: āryagaṇḍavyūhasūtre ca samantasatvaparitrāṇy ojasaḥ striyā rātridevatayā pūrvāvadānaṃ kathayantyābhihitaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3310: varṇād api balād api parihīyante smeti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3311: atra ca na kadācid unnatiḥ kāryeti pradarśanārthaṃ sadety ucyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:3314: iha kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ sumerumātram api ratnarāśiṃ labhamānaḥ pratigṛhṇāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3319: taddhetoḥ tatpratyayaṃ tannidānaṃ mahāvāriskandhāvaṣṭabdā iva saṃsārasāgare unmajjanimajjanaṃ kurvanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3320: tad eṣāṃ bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:3324: yathā duṣkhitānāṃ ca sarvasatvānām upajīvyaṃ karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3326: tathātraivoktaṃ / tena ca dānena nonnato bhavatīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3328: yadi punar asya taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ tannidānaṃ kīrtiśabdaśloko bhavati tatra nonnāmajāto bhavati na mānajāto na madajātaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3330: na cireṇa kālena yasya cāyaṃ kīrtiślokaśabdaḥ samutthito yaiś ca samutthāpito yaś ca kīrtiśabdaślokas trayam apy etat sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3331: tatra kaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo 'nityeṣu na ca sthiteṣu dharmeṣv adhruveṣv annāśvāsikeṣv anunayacittam utpādayed unnato bhaven mānadarpito vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:3332: evaṃ hi bodhisatvo lābhasatkārakīrtiśabdaślokeṣu sūpasthitasmṛtir viharatīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3334: caṇḍālakumāropamāś ca loke viharanti nīcanīcena manasā /
SA11sanssr_pu:3335: mānamadadarpādhigatāś ca bhavanti paiśunyasaṃjñāyāḥ satatasamitaṃ pratyupasthitatvād iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3337: iha kulaputrābhiniṣkrāntagṛhavāsaḥ pravrajito bodhisatvo mṛtakasadṛśo 'haṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitānām iti nihatamāno bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3338: vairūpyaṃ me 'bhyudgataṃ vivarṇāni ca me vāsāṃsi prāvṛtāny anyaś ca me ākalpaḥ saṃvṛtta iti nihatamāno bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3339: muṇḍaḥ pātrapāṇiḥ kulāt kulam upasaṃkramāmi bhikṣāhetor bhikṣānidānam iti nihatamāno bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3340: nīcanīcena cittena caṇḍālakumārasadṛśena piṇḍāya carāmīti nihatamāno bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3342: parapratibaddhā ca me jīviketi nihatamāno bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3344: ārādhanīyā me ācāryagurudakṣiṇīyā iti nihatamāno bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3346: yad uta tena tenācāragocarasamudācāreṇeti nihatamāno bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3348: kruddhānāṃ vyāpannacittānāṃ satvānāṃ madhye kṣāntibahulo vihariṣyāmīti nihatamāno bhavatīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3354: sa kiyad dhīnānām api satvānāṃ rūpavikalānām apy avanamati praṇamati dharmagrāhyatām upādāyeti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3356: syād yathāpi nāma bhagavan yadā mahāsāgaraḥ pratisaṃtiṣṭhate tadā nimne pṛthivīpradeśe saṃtiṣṭhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3357: tasya nimnatvād alpakṛcchreṇa sarvanadyaś ca sarvapraśravaṇāni ca prapatanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3358: evam eva bhagavan nirmānasya gurudakṣiṇīyagauravasya bodhisatvasyālpakṛcchreṇa tāni gambhīrāṇi dharmasukhāni śrotendriyasyābhāsam āgacchanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3360: tasmāt tarhi bhagavan yo bodhisatvo mānonnato bhavati mānastabdhaḥ na ca gurudakṣiṇīyebhyo 'vanamati na praṇamati veditavyaṃ bhagavan mārāṅkuśāviddho vatāyaṃ bodhisatva iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3365: dharmabhāṇakānāṃ viśiṣṭadharmādhigatānām udāradharmadeśakānāṃ mahāyānasamārūḍhānāṃ nirvāṇapathavidhijñānāṃ dhāraṇīsūtrāntarājapratilabdhānāṃ nāvanamati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3369: mārakarma dharmaśravaṇasāṃkathye ca niṣaṇṇae udāradharmavege samutpanne dharmabhāṇakasya sādhukāraṃ na prayacchati mā kaścid asmin praśaṃsatīti mārakarma //
SA11sanssr_pu:3374: adhimānaṃ cotpādyājānann abudhyamāno varṇārhāṇāṃ pudgalānāṃ varṇaṃ praticchādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3376: na ca parasya guṇavarṇenāttamanā bhavati / mārakarma //
SA11sanssr_pu:3378: ayaṃ dharmo 'yaṃ vinayo bhūtam idaṃ buddhavacanam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3385: vṛddhasthavirāṇāṃ ciracaritabrahmacaryāṇāṃ na pratyupatiṣṭhate na ca pratyudgacchati / mārakarma //
SA11sanssr_pu:3397: kiṃ kuśalaṃ kim akuśalaṃ kiṃ karaṇīyaṃ kiṃ kṛtaṃ dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3407: sa evaṃ dharmavihārī sthānam etad vidyate yasmin mithyā mahāprapātaṃ patet /
SA11sanssr_pu:3408: atha ca punar bodhicittabalādhīnād aiśvaryaṃ pratilabhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3413: yāni parivarjya bodhisatvā daśa jñānakarmāṇi pratilabhante /
SA11sanssr_pu:3425: satvakṣetraṃ bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetraṃ yataś ca buddhakṣetrād buddhadharmāṇāṃ lābhāgamo bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3428: sarvaṃ sucaritaṃ duścaritaṃ ca satvān niśritya pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3432: iha bho jinaputrāḥ prathamacittotpādiko bodhisatvaḥ ādita eva sarvasatvānām antike daśaprakāraṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3435: hitacittatāṃ sukhacittatāṃ dāyācittatāṃ snigdhacittatāṃ priyacittatāṃ anugrahacittatāṃ ārakṣācittatāṃ samacittatāṃ ācāryacittatāṃ śāstṛcittatāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3439: parāṃś ca sarvasatvaśiṣyatvābhyupagame pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīty āśvāsaṃ pratilabhate //
SA11sanssr_pu:3445: lokaprasādānurakṣārthaṃ tv āsanapādaprakhyālanakarma kurvatāpi cetasā strīṣu vākṣaṇaprāpteṣu vā vinipatiteṣu bodhisatvena premagauravābhyāsaḥ kāryaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:3446: uktaṃ hi gaṇḍavyūhe tasya samanantaraniṣaṇṇasya tasmin mahāsiṃhāsane sarvaḥ sa janakāyo 'bhimukhaḥ prāñjalisthito 'bhūt /
SA11sanssr_pu:3448_0: sa khalu sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣo rājā teṣāṃ yācanakānāṃ saha darśanenāttamanaskataro
SA11sanssr_pu:3451: teṣāṃ samavadhānena mahatī prītir adhyavasānam utpatet taddarśanāvitṛptatayā /
SA11sanssr_pu:3452: evam eva kulaputra rājñaḥ sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣasya teṣāṃ yācanakānāṃ saha darśanena mahāprītivegāḥ saṃjātāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3453_0: cittatuṣṭisukham avakrāntaṃ mahāṃś cittodagratāvegaḥ prādurbhūto yāvat teṣu sarvayācanakeṣu
SA11sanssr_pu:3453_1: ekaputrakasaṃjñā mātāpitṛsaṃjñā dakṣiṇīyasaṃjñā kalyāṇamitrasaṃjñā varṇasaṃjñā durlabhasaṃjñā
SA11sanssr_pu:3454: evam anyagatabhāve satvānām agratogamanopasthānādiprasaṅge sarvotsargaṃ smaret /
SA11sanssr_pu:3458: athavā svāmyaprasādabhīteneva tatprasādārthineva tadājñāsaṃpādanā manasi kartavyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:3463: mā bhāya bhikṣu mā bhāya bhikṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:3465: āhara bhikṣu cīvarāṇi yāvat te dhopāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:3466: evam ukte āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat /
SA11sanssr_pu:3467: mā bhagavān etasya glānasyāśucimraks.itāni cīvarāṇi dhovatu /
SA11sanssr_pu:3470: tena hy ānanda tvam etasya bhikṣusya cīvarāṇi dhova /
SA11sanssr_pu:3472: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando tasya glānasya bhikṣusya cīvarāṇi dhovati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3474: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānandas taṃ glānaṃ bhikṣuṃ sādhu ca suṣṭhu cānuparigṛhya bahirdhā haritvā snāpayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:3477: yān ārādhya mahat tvaṃ virādhya kaṣṭāṃ vipattim āpnoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3478: prāṇaparityāgair api teṣāṃ nanu toṣaṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:3479: ete te vai satvāḥ prasādya yān siddham āgatā bahavaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3481: ete cintāmaṇayo bhadraghaṭā dhenavaś ca kāmadughāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3482: guruvac ca devateva ca tasmād ārādhanīyās te //
SA11sanssr_pu:3483: kiṃ ca niśchadmabandhūnām aprameyopakāriṇām / satvārādhanam utsṛjya niṣkṛtiḥ kā parā bhavet //
SA11sanssr_pu:3484: śirasā dhārayām āsa purā nātho yathepsitam / jaṭāsvadhyuṣitān satvān bhūtvā yatnena niścalaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:3485: bhindanti dehaṃ praviśanty avīcīm yeṣāṃ kṛte tatra kṛte kṛtaṃ syāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:3486: mahāpakāriṣv api tena sarvaṃ kalyāṇam evācaraṇīyam eṣu //
SA11sanssr_pu:3487: svayaṃ mama svāmina eva tāvad yad artham ātmany api nirvyapekṣāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3488: ahaṃ kathaṃ svāmiṣu teṣu teṣu karomi mānaṃ na tu dāsabhāvam //
SA11sanssr_pu:3489: yeṣāṃ sukhe yānti mudaṃ munīndrāḥ yeṣāṃ vyathāyāṃ praviśanti manyum /
SA11sanssr_pu:3493: satvavyathāyām api tadvad eva na prītyupāyo 'sti mahākṛpāṇām //
SA11sanssr_pu:3496: tad adya pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi yatkheditās te munayaḥ kṣamantām //
SA11sanssr_pu:3497: ārādhanāyādya tathāgatānāṃ sarvātmanā dāsyam upaimi loke /
SA11sanssr_pu:3498: kurvantu me mūrdhni padaṃ janaughāḥ nighnantu vā tuṣyatu lokanāthāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:3499: ātmīkṛtaṃ sarvam idaṃ jagat taiḥ kṛpātmabhir naiva hi saṃśayo 'tra /
SA11sanssr_pu:3502: tathāgatārādhanam etad eva svārthasya saṃsādhanam etad eva /
SA11sanssr_pu:3503: lokasya duṣkhāpaham etad eva tasmān mamāstu vratam etad eva //
SA11sanssr_pu:3504: yathaiko rājapuruṣaḥ pramathnāti mahājanaṃ / vikaroti na śaknoti dīrghadarśī mahājanaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:3505: yasmān naiva sa ekākī tasya rājabalaṃ balaṃ / tathā na durbalaṃ kaṃcid aparāddhaṃ vimānayet //
SA11sanssr_pu:3506: yasmān narakapālāś ca kṛpāvantaś ca tadbalaṃ / tasmād ārādhayet satvān bhṛtyaś caṇḍanṛpaṃ yathā //
SA11sanssr_pu:3507: kupitaḥ kiṃ nṛpaḥ kuryād yena syān narakavyathā / yatsatvadaurmanasyena kṛtena hy anubhūyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:3508: tuṣṭaḥ kiṃ nṛpatir dadyād yad buddhatvasamaṃ bhavet / yat satvasaumanasyena kṛtena hy anubhūyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:3510: ihaiva saubhāgyayaśaḥ sausthityaṃ kiṃ na paśyasi //
SA11sanssr_pu:3511: prāsādikatvam ārogyam prāmodyaṃ cirajīvitaṃ / cakravartisukhaṃ sphītaṃ kṣamī prāpnoti saṃsaran //
SA11sanssr_pu:3512: maitrāśayaś ca yat pūjyaḥ satvamāhātmyam eva tat /
SA11sanssr_pu:3513: buddhaprasādād yat puṇyaṃ buddhamāhātmyam eva tat //
SA11sanssr_pu:3514: ata eva hi candrapradīpasūtre maitrībhāvaphalam udbhāvitam /
SA11sanssr_pu:3524: iha bodhisatva ekākī rahogataḥ pravivekasthito naivaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3528: ye tv anye śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā sarve te saṃkīrṇavihāriṇaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3532: iha bodhisatvo vīryam ārabhamāṇo na tan mahad vīryam āsvādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3536: ko hi nāma saprajñajātīyaḥ svakarmābhiyuktaḥ parāṃś codayet //
SA11sanssr_pu:3538: eṣa tu puṇyarakṣāyāḥ saṃkṣepo yad bodhipariṇāmanā //
SA11sanssr_pu:3540: na hi bodhipariṇāmitasya kuśalamūlasyāntarā kaścit parikṣayo yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣadanāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:3541: tad yathāpi nāma bhadanta śāradvatīputra mahāsamudrapatitasyodakabindor nāntarāsti kṣayo yāvan na kalpaparyavasāna / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3551: yāni ca tāni mahānagareṣu mahāśmaśānāni bhavanty annekaprāṇiśatasahasrākīrṇāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:3552: tatrāpi sa bodhisatvo mahāsatvo mahāntam ātmabhāvaṃ mṛtaṃ kālagatam upadarśayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3553: tatra te tiryagyonigatāḥ satvā yāvad arthaṃ māṃsaṃ paribhujyāyuḥparyante mṛtāḥ kālagatāḥ sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:3554: sa caiva teṣāṃ hetur bhavati yāvat parinirvāṇāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:3558: ye me mṛtasya kālagatasya māṃsaṃ paribhuñjīran /
SA11sanssr_pu:3559: sa eva teṣāṃ hetur bhavet svargotpattaye yāvat parinirvāṇāya tasya śīlavataḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3564: sa dharmakāyaprabhāvito darśanenāpi satvānām arthaṃ karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3566_0: tad yathāpi nāma śāntamate jīvakena vaidyarājena sarvabhaiṣajyāni samudānīya bhaiṣajyatarusaṃhātam
SA11sanssr_pu:3566_1: ayaṃ dārikārūpaṃ kṛtaṃ prāsādikaṃ darśanīyaṃ sukṛtaṃ suniṣṭhitaṃ suparikarmakṛtaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3567: sāgacchati gacchati tiṣṭhati niṣīdati śayyāṃ ca kalpayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3568: tatra ye āgacchanty āturā mahātmāno rājāno vā rājamātrā vā śreṣṭhigṛhapatyamātyakoṭṭarājāno vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:3569: tān sa jīvako vaidyarājas tayā bhaiṣajyadārikayā sārddhaṃ saṃyojayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3570: teṣāṃ samanantarasaṃyogam āpannānāṃ sarvavyādhayaḥ prasrabhyante 'rāgāś ca bhavanti sukhino nirvikārāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3571: paśya śāntamate jīvakasya vaidyarājasya laukikavyādhicikitsājñānaṃ yady anyeṣāṃ vaidyānāṃ saṃvidyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3572: evam eva śāntamate tasya dharmakāyaprabhāvitasya bodhisatvasya yāvantaḥ satvāḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikā rāgadoṣamohasaṃtaptāḥ kāyaṃ spṛśanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3573: teṣāṃ saṃspṛṣṭamātrāṇāṃ sarvakleśāḥ prasrabhyante vigatasaṃtāpaṃ ca kāyaṃ saṃjānanti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3574: yad idaṃ tasyaiva bodhisatvasya pūrvapraṇidhānasupariśuddhatvāt / etadartham ātmabhāvaḥ śodhyaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:3576: tṛṇachannaṃ yathā śasyaṃ rogaiḥ sīdati naidhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3577: buddhāṅkuras tathā vṛddhiṃ kleśachanno na gacchati //
SA11sanssr_pu:3579: ātmabhāvasya kā śuddhiḥ / pāpakleśaviśodhanaṃ / saṃbuddhoktyarthasāreṇa / yatnābhāve tv apāyagaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:3581: caturbhir maitreya dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ kṛtopacitaṃ pāpam abhibhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3586: tatra vidūṣaṇāsamudācāro 'kuśalaṃ karmādhyacārati tatra tatraiva ca vipratisārabahulī bhavati //
SA11sanssr_pu:3587: tatra pratipakṣasamudācāraḥ kṛtvāpy akuśalaṃ karma kuśale karmaṇy atyarthābhiyogaṃ gataḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:3591: ebhir maitreya caturbhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ kṛtopacitaṃ pāpam abhibhavatīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3592: tatra kathaṃ vidūṣaṇāsamudācāro bhāvayitavyaḥ / yathā suvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtre 'bhihitaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:3593: samanvāharantu māṃ buddhāḥ kṛpākāruṇyacetasaḥ / ye ca daśadiśi loke tiṣṭhanti dvipadottamāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:3594: yac ca me pāpakaṃ karma kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ sudāruṇaṃ / tat sarvaṃ deśayiṣyāmi sthito daśabalāgrataḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:3595: mātāpitṝn ajānatā buddhānām aprajānatā / kuśalaṃ cāprajānatā yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā //
SA11sanssr_pu:3596: aiśvaryamadamattena kulabhogamadena ca / tāruṇyamadamattena yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā //
SA11sanssr_pu:3597: duścintitaṃ duruktaṃ ca duṣkṛtenāpi karmaṇā / annādīnavadarśinā yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā //
SA11sanssr_pu:3599: krīḍārativaśāc caiva śokarogavaśena vā / atṛptadhanadoṣeṇa yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā //
SA11sanssr_pu:3600: annāryajanasaṃsargair īrṣyāmātsaryahetunā / śāṭhyadāridryadoṣeṇa yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā //
SA11sanssr_pu:3601: vyasanāgamakāle 'smin kāmānāṃ bhayahetunā / annaiśvaryagatenāpi yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā //
SA11sanssr_pu:3602: calacittavaśenaiva kāmakrodhavaśena vā / kṣutpipāsārditenāpi yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā //
SA11sanssr_pu:3603: pānārthaṃ bhojanārthaṃ ca vastrārthaṃ strīṣu hetunā /
SA11sanssr_pu:3604: vicitraiḥ kleśasaṃtāpair yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā //
SA11sanssr_pu:3605: kāyavāṅmanasāṃ pāpaṃ tridhā duścaritaṃ cittaṃ / yat kṛtam īdṛśai rūpais tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham //
SA11sanssr_pu:3606: yat tu buddheṣu dharmeṣu śrāvakeṣu tathaiva ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:3607: agauravaṃ kṛtaṃ syād dhi tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham //
SA11sanssr_pu:3608: yat tu pratyekabuddheṣu bodhisatveṣu vā punaḥ /agauravaṃ kṛtaṃ syād dhi tat srvaṃ deśayāmy aham //
SA11sanssr_pu:3609: saddharmabhāṇakeṣv eva anyeṣu guṇavatsu vā / agauravaṃ kṛtaṃ syād dhi tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham //
SA11sanssr_pu:3610: saddharmaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ syād ajñānaṃ tena me sadā /
SA11sanssr_pu:3611: mātāpitṛṣv agauravaṃ tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham //
SA11sanssr_pu:3612: mūrkhatvena bālatvena mānadarpāvṛtena ca / rāgadveṣeṇa mohena tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham //
SA11sanssr_pu:3613: vyavalokayantu māṃ buddhāḥ samanvāhṛtacetasaḥ / atyayaṃ pratigṛhṇantu kāruṇyārpitacetasaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:3614: yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ mayā kalpaśateṣu ca / tasyārthaṃ śokacitto 'haṃ krpaṇīyo bhayārditaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:3615: bhavāmi pāpakarmāṇāṃ satataṃ dīnamānasaḥ / yatra yatra cariṣyāmi na cāsti me balaṃ kvacit //
SA11sanssr_pu:3616: sarve kāruṇikā buddhāḥ sarve bhayaharā jage / atyayaṃ pratigṛhṇantu mocayantu ca māṃ bhayāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:3617: kleśakarmaphalaṃ mahyaṃ pravāhayantu tathāgatāḥ / snāpayantu ca māṃ buddhāḥ kāruṇyasaritodakaiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:3618: sarvaṃ pāpaṃ deśayāmi yat tu pūrvaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā / yac ca etarhi me pāpaṃ tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham //
SA11sanssr_pu:3619: āyatyāṃ saṃvaram āpadye sarvaduṣkṛtakarmaṇām / na chādayāmi tat pāpaṃ yad bhaven mama duṣkṛtam //
SA11sanssr_pu:3620: trividhaṃ kāyikaṃ karma vacasā ca caturvidham / manasā triprakāreṇa tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham //
SA11sanssr_pu:3621: kāyakṛtaṃ vācakṛtaṃ manasā ca vicintitaṃ / kṛtaṃ daśavidhaṃ karma tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham //
SA11sanssr_pu:3622: yac ca me pāpakaṃ karma anniṣṭaphaladāyakaṃ / tat sarvaṃ deśayiṣyāmi buddhānāṃ purataḥ sthitaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:3623: bhavagatisaṃkaṭe bālabuddhinā pāpaṃ yan me kṛtaṃ sudāruṇam /
SA11sanssr_pu:3624: daśabalam agrataḥ sthitaḥ tat sarvaṃ pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:3625: deśayāmi ca tat pāpaṃ yan mayā saṃcitaṃ janmasaṃkaṭe vividhaiḥ kāyapracārasaṃkaṭair bhavasaṃkaṭalokasaṃkaṭe cāpalacalacittasaṃkaṭe mūrkhabālakṛtakleśasaṃkaṭe /
SA11sanssr_pu:3627: bhayasaṃkaṭarāgasaṃkaṭe doṣamohatamasaṃkaṭair api kṣaṇasaṃkaṭe kālasaṃkaṭe puṇyopārjanasaṃkaṭair api /
SA11sanssr_pu:3630: viśeṣatas tu bodhisatvāpattīnāṃ gurvīṇāṃ laghvīnāṃ deśanāryopāliparipṛcchāyām uktā /
SA11sanssr_pu:3633: saced upāle mahāyānasaṃprasthito bodhisatvo mahāsatvo gaṅgānadīvālikopamā rāgapratisaṃyuktā āpattīr āpadyeta /
SA11sanssr_pu:3634: yāṃ caikato dveṣasaṃprayuktām āpattim āpadyeta bodhisatvayānaṃ pramāṇīkṛtya // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:3635: iyaṃ tābhyo gurutarā āpattir yeyaṃ dveṣasaṃyuktā /
SA11sanssr_pu:3640: na tatra bodhisatvasya chalaṃ na bhayaṃ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:3641: tasmāt tarhi tvām upāle yāḥ kāścana rāgapratisaṃyuktā āpattayaḥ sarvas tā annāpattaya iti vadāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:3646: tatropāle ye 'nnupāyakuśalā bodhisatvās te rāgapratisaṃyuktābhya āpattibhyo bibhyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3647: ye punar upāyakuśalā bodhisatvās te dveṣasaṃprayuktābhya āpattibhyo bibhyati na rāgapratisaṃyuktābhya iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3652: kevalayā ca kṛpayā kleśabalād acireṇa kṛpāhāniḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:3654: tad yathā kulaputra maṃtravidyādharaḥ puruṣo rājñā pañcapāśakena bandhanena baddhaḥ syāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:3655: sa yadā kāṅkṣeta prakramaṇāya tadaikamantravidyābalena sarvabandhanāni chittvā prakramet /
SA11sanssr_pu:3656: evam eva kulaputropāyakuśalo bodhisatvaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇai ratiṃ vindati taiś cākīrṇo viharati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3657: yadā ca punar ākāṅkṣate tadā prajñābalādhīnena ekena ca sarvajñatācittena sarvakāmaguṇān prabhujya cyuto brahmalokae upapadyatae iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3658: dveṣe 'pi kiṃ naivam iṣyate / prakṛtimahāsāvadyatvāt / kṛpāvaikalye copāyasyaivāsaṃbhavāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:3659: parārthasiddhiṃ vā svārthād gurutarām adhimucyamānaḥ kopaparavattayāpi param anuśāsyānutāpapūrvakam āyatyāṃ saṃvaram utpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3663: yady api tasya satvasya taddhitaṃ tathāpi bodhisatvakṛpāhānyā mahataḥ satvārthānubandhasya hāniḥ syāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:3664: āryasatyake parivartte 'pi putradṛṣṭāntaḥ karuṇādhiṣṭhita eva veditavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3665: yaś ca tatrāpi kṛpāpratiṣedhaḥ sa lokārthapāṇḍityena lokāvarjanārthaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3666: nivāryamāṇaś ca yadi hitakāme bodhisatve pratighaṃ labheta sa bodhisatvaḥ syād ubhayor annarthaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:3678: tad yathāpi nāmānanda kaścid eva puruṣo 'dhastāt pādatalam ādāya yāvan murddhany ādīpto bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:3679: saṃprajvalita ekajvalībhutas taṃ kaścid eva puruṣa upasaṃkramya evaṃ vaded /
SA11sanssr_pu:3680: ehi tvāṃ bhoḥ puruṣa nirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ krīḍasva ramasva paricārayasveti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3682: api tu sa puruṣo 'nirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ krīḍeta ramet paricaret //
SA11sanssr_pu:3687: krīḍetānanda sa puruṣo ramet paricaret parikalpam upādāyāparinirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūto /
SA11sanssr_pu:3688: na tv evaṃ tathāgatasya pūrvaṃ bodhisatvacaryāṃ caramāṇasya satvān tribhir apāyair duṣkhitān dṛṣṭvā daridrān abhūt saumanasyaṃ vā cittaprasādo veti vistaraḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:3690: paśyator mātāpitror na svasaukhyasaṃgo dṛṣṭaḥ svānurūpakṛpāvaśāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:3691: pracchannas tarhi sasvāmikāsu nisvāmikāsu bāhuladharmadhvajarakṣitāsu kāmamithyācāro na syāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:3695: evaṃ tarhi bhikṣor apy evam āpannaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3697: tathā hy uktam āryākṣayamatisūtre / kālākāle punar anenopekṣā karaṇīyeti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3698: atha tato 'py adhikaṃ satvārthaṃ paśyet / śikṣāṃ nikṣipet //
SA11sanssr_pu:3699: upāyakauśalyasūtre jyotirmāṇavakaṃ dvācatvāriṃśadvarṣasahasrabrahmacāriṇam adhikṛtya saptame pade sthitasya kāruṇyam utpadyeta /
SA11sanssr_pu:3700: kiṃ cāpy aham idaṃ vrataṃ khaṇḍayitvā nirayaparāyaṇaḥ syāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3701: tathāpy utsahe 'haṃ nairayikaṃ duṣkhaṃ prativedayitum atha ceyaṃ strī sukhitā bhavatu /
SA11sanssr_pu:3703: iti hi kulaputra jyotirmāṇavakaḥ paścānmukho nivartya tāṃ striyaṃ dakṣiṇena pāṇinā gṛhītvaivam āha /
SA11sanssr_pu:3704: uttiṣṭha bhagini yathākāmakaraṇīyas te bhavāmīti // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:3705: so 'haṃ kulaputra mahākāruṇyacittotpādenetvareṇa kāmopasaṃhitena daśakalpasahasrāṇi paścānmukham akārṣam /
SA11sanssr_pu:3706: paśya kulaputra yad anyeṣāṃ nirayasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma /
SA11sanssr_pu:3709: yadi bodhisatva ekasya satvasya kuśalamūlaṃ saṃjanayet tathārūpāṃ cāpattim āpadyeta yathārūpayāpattyāpannayā kalpaśatasahasraṃ niraye pacyeta /
SA11sanssr_pu:3710: utsoḍhavyam eva bhagavan bodhisatvenāpattim āpattuṃ tac ca nairayikaṃ duṣkhaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3711: na tv eva tasyaikasay satvasya kuśalaṃ parityaktum iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3713: iha kulaputropāyakuśalo bodhisatvo yadā kadācit kasmiṃścit pāpamitravaśenāpattim āpadyeta /
SA11sanssr_pu:3719: yathā yathā saṃsariṣyāmi tathā tathā satvān paripācayiṣyāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:3720: api tv etāṃ cāpattiṃ yathādharmaṃ pratikariṣyāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:3722: sacet kulaputra pravrajito bodhisatvaḥ parikalpam ādāya sarvāś catasro mūlāpattīr atikramed anena copāyakauśalyena vinodayed /
SA11sanssr_pu:3725: śrāvakavinaye 'pi mūlāpattisthānae eva kāruṇyān mṛgādimokṣaṇe 'nnāpattir uktaiva //
SA11sanssr_pu:3726: ayaṃ ca rāge guṇo yad bodhisatve rāgam utpādya sugatir labhyate / na tu krodhena //
SA11sanssr_pu:3728: priyaṃkare bodhisatve raktā ... dhavyottarāṃ dārikām adhikṛtya /
SA11sanssr_pu:3729: priyaṃkarasya praṇidheḥ punaḥ punar yā istri prekṣeta sarāgacittā /
SA11sanssr_pu:3730: sā istribhāvaṃ parivarjayitvā puruṣo bhavet yādṛg udārasatvaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:3733: tenaiva śūreṣu janitva rāgaṃ gacchanti svargaṃ puruṣatvam eva ca // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:3737: kiṃ vā punar yaḥ tān satkareyā / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3738: evam anyasmin satvārthopāye sati rāgajāpattir annāpattir uktā //
SA11sanssr_pu:3739: upāyakauśalyasūtre ca gaṇikāvat kṛtārtho bodhisatvo nirapekṣas taṃ satvaṃ tyajatīti vistareṇoktam //
SA11sanssr_pu:3740: alabdhabhūmeś ca ṣaṭpāramitāsu caritavata iyaṃ cintā / netarasyety āstāṃ prāsaṅgikam //
SA11sanssr_pu:3746: tatra śāriputra prathamā āpattir daśavarge ṛjukena deśayitavyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:3749: duṣṭacittāpattir ekapudgalasya dvayor vā śāriputra tāṃ gurvīṃ daśayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:3750_1: stūpāpattiḥ saṃghāpattis tathānyāś cāpattayo bodhisatvena na pañcatriṃśatāṃ buddhānāṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:3750_2: bhagavatām antike rātriṃdivaṃ ekākinā gurvyo deśayitavyāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:3790: evaṃpramukhā yāvantaḥ sarvalokadhātuṣu tathāgatārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3791_0: te māṃ samanvāharantu buddhā bhagavanto yan mayāsyāṃ jātau anyāsu vā jātiṣv annavarāgre
SA11sanssr_pu:3791_1: jātisaṃsāre saṃsaratā [doubtful] pāpakaṃ karma kṛtaṃ syāt kāritaṃ vā kriyamāṇaṃ vānumoditaṃ bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:3792: staupikaṃ vā sāṅghikaṃ vā dravyam apahṛtaṃ syāt hāritaṃ vā hriyamāṇaṃ vānumoditaṃ bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:3793: pañcānantaryāṇi kṛtāni syuḥ kāritāni vā kriyamāṇāni vānumoditāni bhaveyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3794_0: daśākuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartitaṃ syāt pare vā samādāpitāḥ syur vartamānā
SA11sanssr_pu:3794_1: vānumoditā bhaveyur yena karmāvaraṇenāvṛto 'haṃ nirayaṃ vā gaccheyaṃ tiryagyoniṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:3794_2: vā yamaviṣayaṃ vā gaccheyaṃ pratyantajanapadeṣu mleccheṣu vā pratyājāyeyaṃ dīrghāyuṣkeṣu
SA11sanssr_pu:3794_3: deveṣūpapadyeyam indriyavikalatāṃ vādhigaccheyaṃ mithyādṛṣṭiṃ vopagṛhṇīyāṃ buddhotpādaṃ vā virāgayeyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3795_0: tat sarvaṃ karmāvaraṇaṃ teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ jñānabhūtānāṃ cakṣurbhūtānāṃ sākṣibhūtānāṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:3795_1: pramāṇabhūtānāṃ jānatāṃ paśyatām agrataḥ pratideśayāmi āviṣkaromi na praticchādayāmy
SA11sanssr_pu:3796_0: samanvāharantu māṃ te buddhā bhagavanto yan mayāsyāṃ jātāv anyāsu vā jātiṣv annavarāgre
SA11sanssr_pu:3796_1: vā jātisaṃsāre saṃsaratā dānaṃ dattaṃ bhaved antaśas tiryagyonigatāyāpy ālopaḥ śīlaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:3796_2: vā rakṣitaṃ bhaved yac ca me brahmacaryavāsakuśalamūlaṃ yac ca me satvaparipākakuśalamūlaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:3796_3: yac ca me bodhicittakuśalamūlaṃ yac ca me 'nnuttarajñānakuśalamūlaṃ tat sarvam aikadhyaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:3796_4: piṇḍayitvā tulayitvābhisaṃkṣipyānnutt arāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau uttarottarayā pariṇāmanayā
SA11sanssr_pu:3796_5: yathā pariṇāmitam atītair buddhair bhagavadbhir yathā pariṇāmayiṣyanty annāgatā buddhā
SA11sanssr_pu:3796_6: bhagavanto yathā pariṇamanty etarhi daśasu dikṣu pratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3801: ye cābhyatītās tathāpi ca ye annāgatā ye cāpi tiṣṭhanti narottamā jināḥ /

SA11sanssr_pu:3808_1: bodhisatvas teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ nāmadheyadhāraṇaparikīrtanena rātriṃdivaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:3813: ye te subhūte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imān evaṃrūpān sūtrāntān udgrahīṣyanti yāvat paryavāpsyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3816: yāni teṣāṃ satvānāṃ paurvajanmikāni karmāṇi kṛtāny apāyasaṃvartanīyāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:3817: tāni tayā paribhūtatayā dṛṣṭae eva dharme kṣapayiṣyanti buddhabodhiṃ ca prāpsyantīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3819: yaḥ kāśyapa pitā ca syāt pratyekabuddhaś ca taṃ jīvitād vyaparopayed idam agraṃ prāṇātipātānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3820: idam agram adattādānānāṃ yad uta triratnadravyāpaharaṇatā /
SA11sanssr_pu:3821: idam agraṃ kāmamithyācārāṇāṃ yad uta mātā syād arhantī ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:3822: idam agraṃ mṛṣāvādānāṃ yad uta tathāgatasyābhyākhyānaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3824: idam agraṃ pāruṣyāṇāṃ yad utāryāṇām avasphaṇḍanaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3825: idam agraṃ saṃbhinnapralāpānāṃ yad uta dharmakāmānāṃ vikṣepaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3827: idam agram abhidhyānāṃ yad uta samyaggatānāṃ lābhaharaṇacittatā /
SA11sanssr_pu:3828: idam agraṃ mithyādṛṣṭīnāṃ yad uta gahanatādṛṣṭiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3830: sacet kāśyapa ekasatva ebhir evaṃ mahāsāvadyair daśabhir akuśalaiḥ karmapathaiḥ samanvāgato bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:3831: sa ca tathāgatasya hetupratyayasaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām avataren /
SA11sanssr_pu:3832_0: nātra kaścid ātmā vā satvo vā jīvo vā pudgalo vā yaḥ karoti pratisaṃvedayate iti
SA11sanssr_pu:3832_1: hy akṛtām annabhisaṃskārāṃ māyādharmatām asaṃkleśadharmatāṃ prakṛtiprabhāsvaratāṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:3832_2: sarvadharmāṇām avataraty ādiśuddhān sarvadharmān abhiśraddadhāty adhimucyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3835: punar aparaṃ mañjuśrīr yo bodhisatva āpattim annāpattiṃ paśyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3841: akṣiṇī nimīlya buddhabodhisatvālambanacittaḥ śatākṣaram aṣṭasahasraṃ japet /
SA11sanssr_pu:3842: nimīlitākṣa eva buddhabodhisatvān paśyati vigatapāpo bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3843: athavā caityaṃ pradakṣiṇīkurvann aṣṭasahasraṃ japec caityapratimāyāḥ saddharmapustakānāṃ caikatamaṃ puraḥkṛtyāyam eva vidhir iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3844: cundādhāraṇīṃ vā tāvaj japed yāvat pāpakṣayanimittāni paśyati svapne /
SA11sanssr_pu:3845: tad yathā krandanādichardanadadhikṣīrādibhojanāt tu vigatapāpo bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3848: tad yathā puruṣo mīḍhāvaliptaḥ sudhautusnānaṃ kṛtvā gandhair vilipyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3849: tasya tad daurgandhyaṃ vāntaṃ vigataṃ syād evaṃ pañcānantaryakāriṇas tat pāpaṃ vigacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3850: yo 'pi daśākuśalakarmapathasamanvāgatas tathāgate śraddhāṃ pratilabhya tathāgatabimbaṃ kārayet tasyāpi tat pāpaṃ na prajñāyate viśeṣato bodhicittasamanvāgatasya /
SA11sanssr_pu:3853: yaś ca khalu punaḥ siṃhavikrīḍitatathāgataṃ saṃmukhaṃ varṣaṃ vā varṣasahasraṃ vā varṣaśatasahasraṃ vā sarvasukhopadhānair upatiṣṭhed /
SA11sanssr_pu:3854_0: yaś ca parinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya caitye bodhicittasaṃgṛhīta ekapuṣpam āropayet
SA11sanssr_pu:3854_1: tathāgatapūjāyai janāñjaliṃ copanāmayej jalena vā siñcayed iṣikāpadaṃ vā dadyān nirmālyaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:3854_2: cāpanayed upalepanapradānaṃ vā puṣpapradānaṃ vā dīpapradānaṃ vā kuryād āttamanāḥ
SA11sanssr_pu:3855_0: namas tasmai buddhāya bhagavata itimātre 'tra siṃhavikrīḍitakāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā
SA11sanssr_pu:3855_1: vicikitsā vā yad asau kalpaṃ vā kalpaśataṃ vā kalpasahasraṃ vā durgativinipātaṃ gacchen
SA11sanssr_pu:3859: ye ca bodhisatvasaṃvaraṃ caturthaṃ śataṃ śikṣāpadānāṃ dhārayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3860: ye punar abhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāsā bhikṣavaḥ pañcāśādhike dve śikṣāpadaśate dhārayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3862: ye ca yathāparigṛhītāc chikṣāsaṃvarād anyatarāc chikṣāpadād bhraṣṭā bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3863: sacet te durgatibhayabhītās tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayeyur yathāvibhavataś ca pūjāṃ kuryuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3865: atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma /
SA11sanssr_pu:3868: yad ahaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya guṇān varṇayāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:3869: atha te kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vātra gambhīre buddhagocare //
SA11sanssr_pu:3871: na me bhadanta bhagavan kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā tathāgatabhāṣiteṣu sūtrānteṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:3874: imau bhagavan candrasūryāv evaṃ maharddhikāv evaṃ mahānubhāvau pṛthivyāṃ patetāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3876: na tu buddhānāṃ vacanam anyathā bhavet //
SA11sanssr_pu:3877: kiṃtu bhadanta bhagavan santi satvāḥ śraddhendriyavikalā ye buddhagocaraṃ śrutvā na śraddadhati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3879: katham idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ smaraṇamātreṇa tasya tathāgatasya ettakā guṇānuśaṃsā bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3885: asthānam ānandānnavakāśo yeṣāṃ tasya nāmadheyaṃ nipatet karṇe teṣāṃ durgatyapāyagamanaṃ bhaved iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3887: yac ca tvam ānanda śraddadhāsi pattīyasi /
SA11sanssr_pu:3889: abhūmiś cātra śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ sthāpayitvā ekajātipratibaddhān bodhisatvān mahāsatvān iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3891: ye cānye śrāddhāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatam upavāsam upavasanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3892: ekavārṣikaṃ vā traivārṣikaṃ vā śikṣāpadaṃ dhārayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3894: anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena paścimāyāṃ diśāyāṃ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau upapadyema yatrāmitābhas tathāgataḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3895: yaiḥ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabhavarājasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3896: teṣāṃ maraṇakālasamaye 'ṣṭau bodhisatvā ṛddhyāgatya mārgam upadarśayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3899: teṣāṃ tatropapannānāṃ tat pūrvakaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ na kṣīyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3901: te tataś cyutā iha manuṣyaloke rājāno bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3903: annekāni satvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi daśa kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3910: yena ca punar mātṛgrāmeṇa tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3912: sa tasya paścimo mātṛgrāmabhāvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavya iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3916: ya eṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ tu dhārayet / etasya mātṛgrāmasya strībhāvo na bhaviṣyati //
SA11sanssr_pu:3920: prāṇātipātāt prativirato bhavati bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvasatvānām abhayaṃdadaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3922: yat pūrvāntakoṭipañcagaticakrāruḍhena saṃsāranadyudyātena prāṇātipātahetunā kāyavāṅmanasā karmāvaraṇaṃ kleśāvaraṇaṃ dharmāvaraṇaṃ kṛtaṃ vā syāt kāritaṃ vānumoditaṃ syāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:3923: tat sarvaṃ tena prāṇātipātavairamaṇacakreṇa sarvānarthaṃ mardayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3925: sanikāyasabhāge devamanuṣyāṇāṃ priyo bhavati nirātaṅko dīrghāyuṣka iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3926: yāvat punar aparaṃ kulaputra yo bodhisatvo yāvajjīvam adattādānāt prativirato bhavati sa sarvasatvānām abhayam dadāti anyatrāsayatnenāsaṃkṣobheṇa svalābhena saṃtuṣṭo viharati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3927: adhārmikabhogānabhilāṣī sa tena kuśalamūlena yāvad adattādānahetukaṃ karmāvaraṇaṃ mardayati pramardayati yāvad aśeṣam avipākaṃ kurutae iti // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:3928: evaṃ daśāpi kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ svavipakṣākuśalaghātakās tatra paṭhyante //
SA11sanssr_pu:3933: kṣapayiṣye pāpakaṃ karma yan mayā purime kṛtam / anyeṣu bodhisatveṣu vyāpādo janito mayeti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3937: ye buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ yānti na te gacchanti durgatiṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3938: prahāya mānuṣān kāyān divyān kāyāṃl labhanti te //
SA11sanssr_pu:3939: ity evaṃ dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ cādhikṛtya pāpakṣayaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:3943: tad yathā kulaputra hāṭakaprabhāsaṃ nāma rasajātaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3945: na ca tatra tat palaṃ śakyate tena lohapalasahasreṇa paryādātuṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3947: evam evaikaḥ sarvajñatācittotpādarasadhātuḥ kuśalamūlapariṇāmanājñānasaṃgṛhītaḥ sarvakarmakleśāvaraṇalohāni paryādāya sarvadharmān sarvajñatāvarṇān karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3948: na ca sarvajñatācittotpādarasadhātuḥ śakyaḥ sarvakarmakleśalohaiḥ saṃkleśayituṃ paryādātuṃ vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:3949: tad yathā kulaputraikaḥ pradīpo yādṛśe gṛhe vā layane vā praveśyate sa saha praveśito varṣasahasrasaṃcitam api tamondhakāraṃ vidhamayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3951_0: evam evaikaḥ sarvajñatācittotpādapradīpo yādṛśe satvāśaye gahane 'vidyātamondhakārānugate
SA11sanssr_pu:3951_1: praveśyate sa saha praveśito 'nnabhilāpyakalpaśatasahasrasaṃcitam api karmakleśāvaraṇatamondhakāraṃ vidhamati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3953: tad yathā kulaputra cintāmaṇirājamukuṭānāṃ mahānāgarājñāṃ nāsti paropakramabhayaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3954: evam eva bodhicittamahākaruṇācintāmaṇirājamukuṭāvabaddhānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ nāsti durgatyapāyaparopakramabhayam iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3956: ihopāle mahāyānaṃ saṃprasthito bodhisatvaḥ sacet pūrvāhṇakālasamaye āpattim āpadyeta /
SA11sanssr_pu:3957: madhyāhnakālasamaye sarvajñatācittenāvirahito vihared aparyanta eva bodhisatvasya śīlaskandhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3958: sacen madhyāhnakālasamaye āpattim āpadyate sāyāhnakālasamaye sarvajñatācittenāvirahito bhaved aparyanta eva bodhisatvasya śīlaskandhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3960: evaṃ hy upāle saparihārā śikṣā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3961: tatra bodhisatvena nātikaukṛtyaparyutthānam utpādyaṃ nātivipratisāriṇā bhavitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3962: sacet punaḥ śrāvakayānīyaḥ pudgalaḥ punaḥ punar āpattim āpadyeta /
SA11sanssr_pu:3963: naṣṭaḥ śrāvakasya pudgalasya śīlaskandho veditavyaḥ / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3967: tad evam aviratapravṛttāṃ bahusukhāṃ dauḥślyotpattiṃ rakṣann evaṃ ca karmāvaraṇavibandham apanayan kleśaviśodhane prayateta //
SA11sanssr_pu:3975: tatrāpi vikṣepapraśamanānabhiyuktasya cittaṃ na samādhīyatae iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3977: samāhitasya ca na kiñcit phalam anyatra kleśaśodhanād iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3988: ata evāha candrapradīpasūtre / sukhe 'nnabhiṣvaṅgaḥ / duṣkhe 'vaimukhyam iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3990: yae ime ādhyātmikāḥ śokaparidevaduṣkhadaurmanasyopāyāsās tān kṣamate 'dhivāsayatīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3992: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate gṛhiṇā bodhisatvenānunayapratighāpagatena bhavitavyam aṣṭalokadharmānanuliptena /
SA11sanssr_pu:3993: tena bhogalābhena vā bhāryāputralābhena vā dhanadhānyavittalābhena vā nonnamitavyaṃ na praharṣitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3995: na durmanasā bhavitavyaṃ evaṃ cānena pratyavekṣitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4002: yady asty eva pratīkāro daurmanasyena tatra kim /
SA11sanssr_pu:4004: līnatvād vā hatotsāho gṛhyate parayāpadā / taccintayā mudhā yānti hrasvam āyur muhur muhuḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:4009: duryodhanaṃ cittaṃ te dārike utpādayitavyaṃ sarvakleśanirghātāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:4012: na cābhyāsasya duṣkaraṃ nāma kiñcid asti /
SA11sanssr_pu:4013: tathā hi mūḍhatarāṇām api tāvad bhārahārakakaivartakarṣakādīnāṃ duṣkhābhyāsāt kṣudrataraphale 'pi vastuni saṃrūḍhakiṇāṅkitaṃ cittam avasādena na paribhūyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:4015: tathā prākṛtā api kiñcid apakāriṣv ātmaduṣkṛtenaiva hateṣu svayaṃ mṛtyuṣu prahartuṃ gāḍhaprahāravedanā api saṃgrāmayanty eva /
SA11sanssr_pu:4016_0: ki.ṃ punar drāghiṣṭhakālāpakāriṣu duṣkhopāttakuśaladhanalavastainyeṣu narakeṣu nāvadhyaghātakeṣu
SA11sanssr_pu:4016_2: annavadhikalpābaddhadṛḍhavaireṣu kleśaśatruṣu prahartum utsāho duṣkhasahanaṃ vā na bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:4021: tathā sarvaduṣkhotpādeṣu sukhasaṃjñā pratyupasthānābhyāsāt sukhasaṃjñaiva pratyupatiṣṭhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:4022: etan niṣyandaphalaṃ ca sarvadharmasukhākrāntaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate //
SA11sanssr_pu:4025: yasya samādheḥ pratilambhād bodhisatvaḥ sarvārambaṇavastuṣu sukhām eva vedanāṃ vedayate /
SA11sanssr_pu:4027: tasya nairayikām api kāraṇāṃ kāryamāṇasya sukhasaṃjñaiva pratyupasthitā bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4028: mānuṣīm api kāraṇāṃ kāryamāṇasya hasteṣv api chidyamāneṣu pādeṣv api karṇeṣv api nāsāsv api sukhasaṃjñaiva pratyupasthitā bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4029: vetrair api tāḍyamānasyārddhavetrair api kaśābhir api tāḍyamānasya sukhasaṃjñaiva pravartate bandhanāgāreṣv api praks.iptasya // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:4032: naḍacippitikaṃ vā cipyamānasya tailapradyotikaṃ vādīpyamānasya sarpiḥpradyotikaṃ vā dadhipradyotikaṃ vādīpyamānasya sukhasaṃjñaiva pratyupasthitā bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4033: ulkāmukhaṃ vā hriyamāṇasya siṃhamukhaṃ vā hriyamāṇasya śuṣkavarttikāṃ vā vartyamānasya // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:4034: kārṣāpaṇacchedikaṃ vā chidyamānasya piṣṭapācanikaṃ vā pācyamānasya hastibhir vā mardyamānasya sukhasaṃjñaiva pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:4035: akṣiṇyutpāṭhyamāne jīvaśūlikam api kriyamāṇasya sarvaśo vāghātaṃ nirṇīya śirasi vā prapātyamāne sukhasaṃjñaiva pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:4039: tathā hi bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dīrgharātraṃ caryāṃ carata etat praṇidhānam abhūt /
SA11sanssr_pu:4042: ye māṃ pālayeyuḥ satkuryur gurukuryur mānayeyuḥ pūjayeyuḥ sarve te upaśamasukhasya lābhino bhaveyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4043: ye 'pi mām ākrośeyur visparśeyus tāḍayeyuḥ śastreṇāchindyur yāvat sarvaśo jīvitād vyaparopayeyuḥ sarve te saṃbodhisukhasya lābhino bhaveyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4045: sa ebhir manaḥkāraiḥ samanvāgata etena karmaṇā /
SA11sanssr_pu:4046: ebhiḥ praṇidhibhiḥ samanvāgataḥ sarvasatvānugatāṃ sukhasaṃjñām āsevate nisevate bhāvayati bahulīkaroti /
SA11sanssr_pu:4047: sa tasya karmaṇo vipākena sarvadharmasukhākrāntaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:4048: yasmin samaye bodhisatvena sarvadharmasukhākrānto nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdho bhavati tasmin samaye akṣobhyo bhavaty asaṃhāryaḥ sarvamārakarmabhir iti vistaraḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:4055: saumyāya dṛṣṭīya sadā sthito bhaved / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:4060: cittasya prāmodyaṃ kāyasyaudbilyaṃ buddheḥ saṃpraharṣaṇaṃ manasa utplavaḥ /

SA11sanssr_pu:4404: api tu khalu punar gṛhapate nāsty ātmasaṃjñino 'raṇyavāso /
SA11sanssr_pu:4406: araṇyavāso nāma gṛhapate ucyate sarvadharmeṣv asaṃbhavavāsaḥ sarvadharmeṣv asaṃgavāsaḥ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:4407: tad yathā gṛhapate 'raṇye tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaḥpatayaḥ prativasanto na bibhyati nottrasyanti na saṃtrasyanti na saṃtrāsam āpadyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:4408: evam eva gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenāraṇye viharatā tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaḥpatikāṣṭhakuḍyavad ātmapratibhāsavat saṃjñā kāye utpādayitavyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:4412: tena bhayabhītena vā trastena vā evaṃ yoniśaḥ kāya upaparīkṣitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4413: nāsty atra kāye ātmā vā satvo vā jīvo vā poṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā mānavo vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:4414: abhūtaparikalpa eṣa yad uta bhayaṃ nāma /
SA11sanssr_pu:4416: tena yathāraṇye tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaḥpatayaḥ prativasanti amamā aparigrahāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4417: evam evāmamenāparigraheṇāraṇyam eva sarvadharmā iti jñātvā upasampadya vihartavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4420: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvena buddhānujñāto 'raṇyavāsa iti jñātvāraṇye vastavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4422: upastabdhakuśalamūlaḥ paścādgrāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣv avatīrya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:4423: sacet punar gṛhapate pravrajito bodhisatva uddeśasvādhyāyārthaṃ gaṇam avatarati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4424_0: tena tatra sagauraveṇa bhavitavyaṃ sapratīsenācāryopādhyāyeṣu sthaviramadhyanavakeṣu
SA11sanssr_pu:4424_1: bhikṣuṣu pradakṣiṇabhavitavyam annalasena svayaṃkāriṇāparopatāpinā na ca tenopasthānagurukeṇa bhavitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4426: tathāgato 'py arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sadevasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pūjito dakṣiṇīyaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4427: so 'pi tāvan na kasyacit sakāśād upasthānaṃ svīkaroti /
SA11sanssr_pu:4429: api tu vayam eva sarvasatvānām upasthāyakā bhaviṣyāmaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4430: vayam eva pareṣām upasthānaparicaryāṃ kariṣyāmo na ca punaḥ kasyacit sakāśād upasthānaparicaryāṃ svīkariṣyāmaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4432: upasthānagurukasya hi gṛhapate bhikṣor guṇadharmānugraho naśyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4433: yeṣāṃ ca saṃgrahaṃ karoti teṣām evaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4436_0: sacet punar gṛhapate āraṇyako bodhisatvo dharmaśravaṇārthika ācāryopādhyāyadarśanārthiko
SA11sanssr_pu:4436_1: vā glānaparipṛcchako vā grāmāntikaṃ śayanāsanam āgacchet tena sāyam āgamanāya prakramaṇāya
SA11sanssr_pu:4437: sacet punar asya parapratibaddha uddeśaḥ svādhyāyo vā tena vihāre prativasatāraṇyapravaṇacittena bhavitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4438: eṣa eva tasyāraṇyavāso yat sarvavastuṣv araṇyasaṃjñā dharmaparyeṣṭyā cātṛpteti //
SA11sanssr_pu:4440: yadi punar asya tatrāraṇyāyatane viharato 'prāptaphalapṛthagjanasya vyāḍamṛgā āgaccheyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4441: tena tatra na bhayaṃ na trāsa utpādayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4446: api tu maitrīm utpādayitvā doṣaṃ vivarjayiṣyāmi bhayam apanayiṣyāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:4447: yady evam api kṛtvā te vyāḍamṛgā māṃ jīvitād vyaparopya bhuñjīran /
SA11sanssr_pu:4449: lābhā me sulabdhā yasya me 'sārāt kāyāt sāram ādattaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4450: na punar ime vyāḍamṛgāḥ śakyā mayāmiṣeṇa toṣayituṃ mama māṃsaṃ bhakṣayitvā sukhasparśaṃ vihariṣyanti // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:4451: yadi punas tatrāraṇyāyatane viharato 'manuṣyā upasaṃkramiṣyanti suvarṇā vā durvarṇā vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:4453: yadi pūrvabuddhadarśinyo devatā āraṇyakaṃ bhikṣum upasaṃkramya praśnaṃ paripṛccheyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4454: tatra tenāraṇyakena bhikṣuṇā yathāśakti yathābalaṃ yathādharmādhigamāya tāsāṃ devatānāṃ dharmo deśayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4455: yadi punas tāvaṅ gambhīrān praśnān paripṛccheyur yān sa āraṇyako bhikṣur na śaknuyād visarjayituṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4456: tena nirmānena bhūtvā vāg bhāṣitavyāśikṣito na paribhavitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4458: bhaviṣyati sa kālaḥ sa samayo yadādhigatān dharmān śrutvā sarvakathāṃ visarjayiṣyāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:4461: tena tatrāraṇyāyatane prativasatā tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaḥpatīnāṃ nimittaṃ grahītavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4463: yathaiṣāṃ bhāvanām asvāmikānām amamānām aparigrahāṇām evaṃ niśceṣṭānāṃ nirvyāpārāṇāṃ bhavaty utpādo bhaṅgaś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:4466: evam evāyaṃ kāyas tṛṇakāṣṭhakuḍyapratibhāsopamo 'svāmiko 'mamo 'parigraho niśceṣṭo nirvyāpāro hetupratyayayuktyā utpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:4468: na punar atra kaścid dharmaḥ paramārthata utpadyate vā nirudhyate veti //
SA11sanssr_pu:4470: tena tatrāraṇyāyatane viharatā evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4471: yady apy aham araṇyam āgata eko 'dvitīyo /
SA11sanssr_pu:4472: na me kaścit sahāyo yo māṃ sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ vā codayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:4473: api tu khalu punaḥ santīme devanāgayakṣā buddhāś ca bhagavanto ye mama cittāśayaṃ jānanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:4475: so 'ham ihāraṇyāyatane prativasann akuśalacittasya vaśaṃ gacchāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:4476: yadi punar aham iyaddūram āgata eko 'dvitīyo 'saṃstabdho 'mamo 'parigrahaḥ kāmavitarkaṃ vā vitarkayeyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4477: vyāpaādaṃ vihinsāvitarkaṃ vā vitarkayeyam anyaṃ vākuśalavitarkaṃ vitarkayeyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4479: te ca me devanāgayakṣā visaṃvāditāḥ buddhāś ca bhagavanto 'nnabhirāddhā bhaviṣyantīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:4483: tad evam araṇye vasan samādhānāya yujyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:4485: sa teṣām eva satvānām arthāya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carann avikṣiptacitto bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4488: laukikī dhyānopapattir api tāvad vikṣiptacittasya durlabhā /
SA11sanssr_pu:4493: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair dhyānaṃ samāpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:4494: sa cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavati nānuvyañjanagrāhī /
SA11sanssr_pu:4495: yato 'dhikaraṇam asya cakṣurindriyeṇāsaṃvarasaṃvṛtasya viharato 'bhidhyādaurmanasye anye vā pāpakā akuśalā dharmāś cittam anuprāpnuyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4502: manasā dharmān vijñāya na nimittagrāhī bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4504: yato 'dhikaraṇam asya mana indriyeṇāsaṃvarasaṃvṛtasya pāpakāś cittam anuprāpnuyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4507: sa gacchann api tiṣṭhann api niṣaṇṇo 'pi śayāno 'pi bhāṣamāṇo 'pi samāhitāvasthām asamāhitāvasthāṃ na vijahāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:4512: rahasy arahasi vā kalpiteryāpathaḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:4530: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān asaṃbhūtān aniṣpannān annabhinirvṛttān sarvadharmān paśyatīti vistaraḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:4531: tatra līne manasi muditā bhāvanayottejanaṃ kuryāt / uddhate tv anityatāmanasikāraiḥ praśamaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:4533: bahu kalpakoṭībhi kadāci buddho utpadyate lokahito maharṣi /
SA11sanssr_pu:4534: labdho 'dhunā sa pravaraḥ kṣaṇo 'dya tyajati pramādaṃ yadi moktukāma / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:4536: mayopamaṃ vitatham etat svapnopamaṃ ca saṃskṛtam avekṣya na cirād bhaviṣyati viyogaḥ sarvapriyaiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4538: udyujya yathā ghaṭata nityaṃ pāramitāsu bhūmiṣu baleṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:4539: mā jātu sraṃsaya vīryaṃ yāvan na budhyathā pravarabodhim / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:4541: jvalitaṃ tribhuvaṃ jaravyādhidukhair maraṇāgnipradīptam anātham idam /
SA11sanssr_pu:4542: bhavaniḥśaraṇe sada mūḍha jagad bhramati bhramaro yathā kumbhagataḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:4543: adhruvaṃ tribhuvaṃ śaradabhranibhaṃ naṭaraṅgasamā jagi janmacyutiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4544: girinadyasamaṃ laghuśīghrajavaṃ vrajatāyu jage yatha vidyu nabhe //
SA11sanssr_pu:4546: parivarttiṣu pañcagatiṣv abudhā yatha kumbhakarasya hi cakra bhramī //
SA11sanssr_pu:4548: pariṣiktam idaṃ kalipāśa jagat mṛgalubdhakapāśi yathaiva kapi //
SA11sanssr_pu:4549: sabhayāḥ saraṇāḥ sada vairakarāḥ bahuśokopadrava kāmaguṇāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4552: bhavatṛṣṇalatāya vivṛddhikarāḥ sabhayāḥ saraṇā sada kāmaguṇāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:4553: yatha agnikhadāḥ jvalitāḥ sabhayāḥ tatha kāma ime viditāryajanaiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4555: yatha sarpaśiro yatha mīḍhaghaṭaḥ tatha kāma ime viditā viduṣām /
SA11sanssr_pu:4556: tatha śūlasāmā dvijapeśisamā yatha śvānakaraṃ kiśavaira tathodakacandranibhā imi kāmaguṇāḥ pratibimba ivā girighoṣa yathā /
SA11sanssr_pu:4558: kṣaṇikāvasikā imi kāmaguṇāḥ tatha māyamarīcisamā alikodakabudbudaphenasamā vitathāḥ parikalpasamutthita buddha budhaiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:4559: prathame vayase vararūpadharaḥ priya iṣṭamato iya bālacārī /
SA11sanssr_pu:4560: jaravyādhidukhair hatatejavapuṃ vijahanti mṛgā iva śuṣkanadīm //
SA11sanssr_pu:4561: dhanadhānyavaro bahudravyabalī priya iṣṭamato iya bālacārī /
SA11sanssr_pu:4562: parihīṇadhanaṃ puna kṛcchragataṃ vijahanti narā iva śūnyaṭavīm //
SA11sanssr_pu:4563: yatha puṣpadrumo saphalo va drumo narudānarataḥ tatha prītikaraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4564: dhanahīnu jarārditu yācanako bhavate tada apriyagṛdhrasamaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:4567: jarayā jaritaḥ samatītavayo druma vidyuhato va yathā bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4568: jarajīrṇa agāra yathā sabhayo jaraniḥśaraṇaṃ laghu brūhi mune //
SA11sanssr_pu:4569: jara śoṣayate naranārigaṇaṃ yatha mālulatā ghana śālavanam /
SA11sanssr_pu:4570: jara vīryaparākramavegaharī jara paṅkanimagna yathā puruṣo //
SA11sanssr_pu:4571: jara rūpa surūpavirūpakarī jara tejaharī balasthāmaharī /
SA11sanssr_pu:4572: sada saukhyaharī paribhāvakarī jara mṛtyukarī jara ojaharī //
SA11sanssr_pu:4573: bahurogaśatair ghanavyādhidukhaiḥ upasṛṣṭu jagaj jvalaneva mṛgāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4574: jara vyādhigataṃ prasamīkṣya jagat dukhaniḥśaraṇaṃ laghu deśaya hī //
SA11sanssr_pu:4575: śiśirehi yathā himadhātu mahaṃ tṛṇagulmavanauṣadhi ojaharo /
SA11sanssr_pu:4576: tatha ojaharo 'yu vyādhi jage parihīyati indriyarūpabalam //
SA11sanssr_pu:4578: pratighātakaraḥ priyadveṣakaraḥ paridāhakaro yatha sūryu nabhe //
SA11sanssr_pu:4579: maraṇaṃ cyavanaṃ cyuti kālakriyā priyadravyajanena viyogu sadā /
SA11sanssr_pu:4580: apunāgamanaṃ ca asaṃgamanaṃ drumapattraphalā nadiśrotu yathā //
SA11sanssr_pu:4581: maraṇaṃ vaśitān avaśīkurute maraṇaṃ harate nadi dāru yathā /
SA11sanssr_pu:4583: maraṇaṃ grasate bahu prāṇiśatān makaro va jalākari bhūtagaṇān /
SA11sanssr_pu:4584: garuḍo uragaṃ mṛgarāja gaja jvalano va tṛṇauṣadhibhūtagaṇam / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:4586: tad yathā mahārāja catasṛbhyo digbhyaś catvāraḥ parvatā āgaccheyur dṛḍhāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4587_0: sāravanto 'khaṇḍā acchidrā asuṣirāḥ susaṃvṛtā ekaghanā nabhaḥ spṛśantaḥ pṛthivīṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:4587_2: tebhyo na sukaraṃ javena vā palāyituṃ balena vā dravyamantrauṣadhibhir vā nivartayitum /
SA11sanssr_pu:4588: evam eva mahārāja catvārīmāni mahābhayāny āgacchanti yeṣāṃ na sukaraṃ javena vā palāyituṃ balena dravyamantrauṣadhair vā nivartanaṃ kartum /
SA11sanssr_pu:4596: tad yathā mahārāja siṃho mṛgarājo rūpasaṃpanno javasaṃpannaḥ sujātanakhadaṃṣṭrākarālo mṛgagaṇam anupraviśya mṛgaṃ gṛhītvā yathākāmakaraṇīyaṃ karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:4597: sa ca mṛgo 'tibalaṃ vyāḍamukham āsādya vivaśo bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4598_0: evam eva mahārāja viddhasya mṛtyuśalyenāpagatamadasyāparāyaṇasya marmasu chidyamāneṣu
SA11sanssr_pu:4598_4: e kākino 'dvitīyasyāsahāyasyemaṃ lokaṃ jahataḥ paralokam ākrāmato mahāpathaṃ vrajato
SA11sanssr_pu:4598_5: mahākāntāraṃ praviśato mahāgahanaṃ samavagāhamānasya mahāndhakāraṃ pratipadyamānasya
SA11sanssr_pu:4598_7: trāṇaṃ nānyac charaṇaṃ nānyat parāyaṇam ṛte dharmāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:4599: dharmo hi mahārāja tasmin samaye trāṇaṃ layanaṃ śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4609: evam eva mahārāja viddhasya mṛtyuśalyenāpagatamadasyātrāṇasyāśaraṇasyāparāyaṇasya nānyat trāṇaṃ nānyat parāyaṇam anyatra dharmāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:4610: tasmāt tarhi te mahārājānityatānudarśinā bhavitavyaṃ kṣayavyayānudarśinā bhavitavyaṃ maraṇabhayabhītena /
SA11sanssr_pu:4611: dharmeṇaiva te mahārāja rājyaṃ kārayitavyaṃ nādharmeṇa /
SA11sanssr_pu:4613: asyāpi te mahārājātmabhāvasyaivaṃ suciram api parirakṣitasya suciram api śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyāsvādanīyena saṃtarpitasya saṃpravāritasya /
SA11sanssr_pu:4615: evaṃ kāśikauśeyadūkūlapattrorṇākṣaumādibhir vastraviśeṣair ācchāditasya caramaśayanāvasthitasya vividhasvedāmbuklinnamalinavasanāvṛtasya kālakriyā bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4616: evam api te mahārāja snānānulepanavāsadhūpapuṣpasurabhigandhasyātmabhāvasya na cireṇa durgandhatā bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4617_0: evaṃ stryāgāramadhyagatasyāpi te strīgaṇaparivṛtasya nānāvādyagītatūryanādyair upagīyamānasya
SA11sanssr_pu:4617_1: sumanasaḥ krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato maraṇabhayabhītasyātīva duṣkhadaurmanasyābhyāṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:4618_0: evam api te mahārāja gṛheṣūpalepanopalipteṣu susthāpitārgaleṣu supihitavātāyaneṣu
SA11sanssr_pu:4619: punaś ca śṛgālakākagṛdhramṛtakaḍevaramāṃsāsthikeśarudhiravaśākule paramabībhatse śmaśāne gataceṣṭasyātmabhāvaḥ pṛthivyām avaśaḥ śeṣyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:4620_0: evam api te mahārāja gajaskandhāśvapṛṣṭharathābhirūḍhasya śaṅkhapaṭaheṣv āhanyamāneṣu
SA11sanssr_pu:4621_0: nirgamanam anubhūya na cirān niśceṣṭasya mṛtaśayanābhirūḍhasya caturbhiḥ puruṣair
SA11sanssr_pu:4622_0: hā putra hā nātha hā tāta hā svāminn ity ākrandamānaiḥ paurajānapadaiḥ saparibhāvadṛśyamānasya
SA11sanssr_pu:4622_1: śmaśānaṃ nītasya punaḥ kākagṛdhraśvaśṛgālādibhir bhakṣitasya tāny asthīny agninā
SA11sanssr_pu:4622_2: vā dagdhāni pṛthivyāṃ vā nikhānitāni adbhir vā klinnāni vātātāpavarṣair vā cūrṇīkṛtāni
SA11sanssr_pu:4623: evam anityāḥ sarvasaṃskārā evam adhruvā iti vistaraḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:4624: tatra kleśāḥ prādhānyena rāgadveṣamohā yasyaiṣām ekatarasya tāvat pratipakṣam ādau bhāvayet tannidānaṃ ca varjayet //
SA11sanssr_pu:4633: yad uta santy asmin kāye keśā romāṇi nakhā dantā rajo malaṃ tvak māṃsāsthi snāyuḥ śirā vṛkkā hṛdayaṃ plīhakaḥ klomakaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4635: audaryakaṃ yakṛt purīṣam aśru svedaḥ kheṭaḥ siṅghāṇakaṃ vasā lasikā majjā medaḥ pittaṃ śleśmā pūyaṃ śoṇitaṃ mastakaṃ mastakaluṅgaṃ prasrāvaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4636: eṣu ca vastuṣu bodhisatva upaparīkṣaṇajātīyo bhavati /
