SA11sanssr_pu:4951: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogād ṛtusamavāyād anyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyād āsvādānupraviddhaṃ vijñānabījaṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkurabījam abhinirvartayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4952: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣv amameṣv aparigraheṣv apratyarthikeṣv ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānām avaikalyāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:4953: tad yathā pañcabhiḥ kāraṇaiś cakṣurvijñānam utpadyate / katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:4954: cakṣuś ca pratītya rūpaṃ cālokaṃ cākāśaṃ tajjaṃ ca manasikāraṃ ca pratītyotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:4961: yadā cakṣur ādhyātmikam āyatanam avikalaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4976: atha ca punaḥ satsv eṣu pratyayeṣu cakṣurvijñānasyotpattir bhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4978: tatra na kaścid dharmo 'smāl lokāt paraṃ lokaṃ saṃkrāmati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4982: evam eva karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatra tatrotpattyāyatanapratisandhau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuram abhinirvartayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4983: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣv amameṣv aparigraheṣv apratyarthikeṣv ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānām avaikalyāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:4984: tan nādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇair draṣṭavyaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:4989: yasmād anye māraṇāntikāḥ skandhā anyae aupapattyaṃśikāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4990: na tu yae eva māraṇāntikāḥ skandhās tae evaupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhā /
SA11sanssr_pu:4991: api tu māraṇāntikāś ca skandhā nirudhyamānā aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāś ca prādurbhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:4994: na ca niruddheṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti nāpy aniruddheṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:4995: api tu māraṇāntikāś ca skandhā nirudhyante aupapattyaṃśikāś ca prādurbhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:4998: visadṛśāt satvanikāyād dhi sabhāgāḥ skandhā jātyantare 'bhinirvartante /
SA11sanssr_pu:5000: kathaṃ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ parīttaṃ karma kriyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5007_0: yaḥ kaścid bhadanta śāriputremaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ bhagavatā samyakpraṇītam evaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:5007_1: yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā satatasamitam ajīvaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvad aviparītam ajātam
SA11sanssr_pu:5007_2: abhūtam akṛtam asaṃskṛtam apratigham annāvaraṇaṃ śivam abhayam ahāryam avyayam avyupaśamam
SA11sanssr_pu:5008: asatyatas tucchata ṛktato 'sārato 'ghato 'nityato duṣkhataḥ śūnyato 'nnātmanaś ca samanupaśyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5010: kim aham abhūvam atīte 'dhvany āho svin nābhūvam atīte 'dhvani /
SA11sanssr_pu:5013: kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmy annāgate 'dhvany āho svin na bhaviṣyāmy annāgate 'dhvani /
SA11sanssr_pu:5016: kiṃ svid idaṃ kathaṃ svid idaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5022: api tu khalu punar yad ucyate 'vidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5027: eṣāparāntiky apekṣāta ūrddhvam asy pravṛttir iti // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5033: hanta vayam evaṃ bahudoṣaduṣṭaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ viditvāsya saṃyogasyāsyāś ca sāmagryā vyavacchedaṃ kariṣyāmo /
SA11sanssr_pu:5034: na cātyantopaśamaṃ sarvasaṃskārāṇām adhigamiṣyāmaḥ satvaparipācanatāyai / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:5038: smṛtyupasthānaparicchedaḥ trayodaśaḥ / evaṃ karmaṇyacittaḥ smṛtyupasthānāny avataret //
SA11sanssr_pu:5041: punar aparaṃ kulaputra bodhisatva evaṃ kāye smṛtim upasthāpayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5052: tasya kāyaparijñānahetor na bhūyaḥ kvacit smṛtiḥ prasarati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5057: na parānte saṃkrānto na pūrvāntāparāntāvasthito 'nyatrāsadviparyāsasaṃbhūtaḥ kārakavedakarahito nādyantamadhye pratiṣṭhitamūlaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5061: āgantukair vyavahārair vyavahriyate kāya iti deha iti bhoga iti āśraya iti śarīram iti kuṇapa iti āyatanam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5065: anityo vatāyaṃ kāyo 'cirasthitiko maraṇaparyavasāna iti jñātvā na kāyahetor viṣamayā jīvati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5070: so 'nityaḥ kāya iti sarvasatvānāṃ dāsatvaśiṣyatvam abhyupagamya kiṅkaraṇīyatāyai utsuko bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5071: anityaḥ kāya iti sarvakāya doṣavaṅkaśāṭhyakuhanāṃ na karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5072: anityaḥ kāya iti jīvitenāśvāsaprāpto jīvitahetor api pāpaṃ karma na karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5073: anityaḥ kāya iti bhogeṣu tṛṣṇādhyavasānaṃ na karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5075: punar aparaṃ kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ kāye kāyānudarśanasmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayan sarvasatvakāyāṃs tatra svakāyae upanibadhnāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5078: yathā ca tathāgatakāye nāśravas tathā svakāyadharmatāṃ pratyavekṣate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5079: so nāśravadharmatākuśalaḥ sarvasatvakāyān api tallakṣaṇān eva prajānātīty ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:5081: yad utāyaṃ kāyo 'nupūrvasamudāgato 'nupūrvavināśo paramāṇusaṃcayaḥ śuṣira unnāmāvanāmau navavraṇamukharomakūpasrāvī valmīkavadāsīviṣanivāsaḥ [doubtful] /
SA11sanssr_pu:5114: prajñāyamānaḥ sa hi bālabuddhiḥ viṣṭhāghaṭaṃ yāti vahan vicetāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5121: yāti kṣayaṃ naiva tu śuklabhāvaṃ bālasya buddhir vitathābhimānā //
SA11sanssr_pu:5122: evaṃ hi yaḥ caukṣamatir manuṣyaḥ caukṣaṃ kariṣye 'ham idaṃ śarīram /
SA11sanssr_pu:5123: sūdvartitaṃ tīrthaśatābhiṣiktaṃ yāti kṣayaṃ mṛtyuvaśād acaukṣam //
SA11sanssr_pu:5125: prasravan bodhisatvena kāyaḥ pratyavekṣitavyo nava vraṇamukhair yāvat /
SA11sanssr_pu:5132: asvādhīno bodhisatvena kāyaḥ pratyavekṣitavyaḥ annapānasaṃbhūta iti vistaraḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5134: vedanā smṛtyupasthānaṃ tu yathā tāvad āryaratnacūḍasūtre /
SA11sanssr_pu:5135: iha kulaputra bodhisatvo vedanāsu vedanānupaśyanāsmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayan veditasukhāśriteṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5137: tat sukhaṃ yatra veditaṃ nāsti sa sarvasatvaveditaprahāṇāya vedanāsu vedanāsmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5140: sa yāṃ kāṃcid vedanāṃ vedayate tāṃ sarvāṃ mahākaruṇāparigṛhītāṃ vedayate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5141: sa yadā sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate tadā rāgacariteṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate ātmanaś ca rāgānuśayaṃ pratijahāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5142: yadā duṣkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate tadā dveṣacariteṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate ātmanaś ca doṣānuśayaṃ prajahāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5143: yadāduṣkhāsukhāṃ vedanāṃ mohacariteṣu satyeṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5147: duṣkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ na pratihanyate pratighasamudghātaṃ cārjayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5150: sa yāṃ kāñcid vedanāṃ vetti sarvāṃ tām anityaveditāṃ vetti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5156: iti hi yat sukhaṃ tad anityaṃ yad duṣkhaṃ sukham eva tat /
SA11sanssr_pu:5157: yad aduṣkhāsukhaṃ tad annātmakam ity ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:5159: duṣkhayā vedanayā spṛṣṭaḥ sarvapāpākṣaṇopapanneṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇām utpādayati // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5160: api tu khalu punar abhiniveśo vedanā parigraho vedanopādānaṃ vedanopalambho vedanā viparyāso vedanā vikalpo vedanety ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:5162: vedanānubhavaḥ proktaḥ / kenāsāv anubhūyate / vedako vedanād anyaḥ pṛthagbhūto na vidyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:5163: evaṃ smṛtir upastheyā vedanāyāṃ vicakṣaṇaiḥ / yathā bodhis tathā hy eṣā śāntā śuddhā prabhāsvarā //
SA11sanssr_pu:5168: rajyati vā duṣyati vā muhyati vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5173: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5174: cittaṃ hi kāśyapārūpam anidarśanam apratigham avijñaptikam apratiṣṭham aniketaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5175: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa sarvabuddhair na dṛṣṭaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5176: na paśyanti na drakṣyanti yat sarvabuddhair na dṛṣṭaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5180: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa māyāsadṛśam abhūtaparikalpanayā vividhām upapattiṃ parigṛhṇāti // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5181: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa nadīsrotaḥsadṛśam annavasthitam utpannabhagnavilīnaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5182: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa dīpārcciḥsadṛśaṃ hetupratyayatayā pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5184: cittaṃ hi kāśyapākāśasadṛśam āgantukaiḥ kleśair upakliśyate / pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5187: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa matsyabaḍiśasadṛśaṃ duṣkhe sukhasaṃjñayā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5194: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa gandhārāmaṃ varāha ivāśucimadhye /
SA11sanssr_pu:5196: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa sparśārāmaṃ makṣikeva tailapātre /
SA11sanssr_pu:5197: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5199: yan nopalabhyate tan naivātītaṃ nānnāgataṃ na pratyutpannaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5200: yan naivātītaṃ nānnāgataṃ na pratyutpannaṃ tat tryadhvasamatikrāntaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5201: yat tryadhvasamatikrāntaṃ tan nevāsti na nāstīty ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:5203: sa cittaṃ parigaveṣamāṇo nādhyātmaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5210: tasyaivaṃ bhavati ālambane sati cittam utpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5212: atha yad evālambanaṃ tad eva cittaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5213: yadi tāvad anyad ālambanam anyac cittaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5215: atha yad evālambanaṃ tad eva cittaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5218: tad yathā na tayaivāsidhārayā saivāsidhārā śakyate chettum /
SA11sanssr_pu:5219: na tenaivāṅgulyagreṇa tad evāṅgulyagraṃ spraṣṭuṃ śakyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5220: naiva cittena tad eva cittaṃ śakyate draṣṭum // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5221: punar aparaṃ kulaputra yad upadrutapradrutānavasthitapracārasya vānaramārutasadṛśasya /
SA11sanssr_pu:5223_1: cittasyāvasthānām ekāgratāśaraṇam aviśaraṇaṃ śamathaikāgratāvikṣepa ity ucyate cittasya smṛtir iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:5230: yat punaḥ sarvasvaṃ parityajya sarvabuddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye pariṇāmayatītīyam ucyate viṭhapanety ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:5233: dharme dharmānudarśī viharan bodhisatvo na kañcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5234: yato na buddhadharmā yato na bodhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5235: yato na mārgo yato na niḥsaraṇaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5236: sa sarvadharmāniḥsaraṇam iti viditvānnāvaraṇaṃ nāma mahākaruṇāsamādhiṃ samāpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5237: sa sarvadharmeṣu sarvakleśeṣu ca kṛtrimasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5244: na rāgabhāvo na dveṣabhāvo na mohabhāva /
SA11sanssr_pu:5246: yat svabhāvāś ca kleśās tat svabhāvā bodhir ity evaṃ smṛtim upasthāpayatīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:5248: iha kulaputra bodhisatvasya dharme dharmānupaśyanā smṛtyupasthānena viharata evaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5251: na punar atra kaścid ātmabhāve satvo vā jīvo vā jantur vā poṣo vā puruṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā yo jāyate vā jīryate vā cyavate votpadyate vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5256: yādṛśāḥ samudānīyante tādṛśāḥ samudāgacchanti kuśalā vākuśalā vā aniñjyā vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5258: na cāhetukānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kācid utpattir ity ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:5260: sa kiyadgambhīrān api dharmān pratyavekṣamāṇas tāṃ sarvajñatābodhicittānusmṛtiṃ na vijahāti //
SA11sanssr_pu:5264: saṃskāra pralopa dharmime varṣakāli calitaṃ vilepanaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5270: hetūbhi ca pratyayebhi vā sarva saṃskāragataṃ pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5271: anyonyapratītyahetutaḥ tad idaṃ bālajano na budhyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:5272: yathā muñja pratītya balbajaṃ rajju vyāyāmabalena vartitā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5273: ghaṭiyantra sacakra vartate teṣv ekaikaśu nāsti vartanā //
SA11sanssr_pu:5276: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīja sa caiva aṅkuro /
SA11sanssr_pu:5277: na ca anya tato na caiva tat /
SA11sanssr_pu:5279: saṃskāra avidyapratyayāḥ te ca saṃskāra na santi tatvataḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5280: saṃskāra avidya caiva hi śūnya ete prakṛtī nirīhakāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5281: mudrāt pratimudra dṛśyate mudrasaṃkrānti na copalabhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5282: na ca tatra na caiva sānyato evaṃ saṃskārannucchedaśāśvatāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5283: cakṣuś ca pratītya rūpataḥ cakṣu vijñānam ihopajāyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5284: na ca cakṣuṣi rūpaniśritaṃ rūpasaṃkrānti na caiva cakṣuṣi //
SA11sanssr_pu:5285: nairātmyaśubhāś ca dharmime te punar ātmeti śubhāś ca kalpitāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5288: akahiñci gatam annāgataṃ śūnya māyopama yogi paśyati //
SA11sanssr_pu:5290: iti pratyayato 'gni jāyate jātu kṛtukāryu laghū nirudhyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:5291: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kuta yam āgatu kutra yāti vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5292: vidiśo diśi sarva mārgato na gatir nāpy agatiś ca labhyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:5293: skandhāyatanāni dhātavaḥ tṛṣṇa avidyā iti karmapratyayāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5294: sāmagri tu satvasūcanā sā ca paramārthatu nopalabhyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:5295: kaṇṭhauṣṭha pratītya tālukaṃ jihva parivartir avarti akṣarā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5296: na ca kaṇṭhagatā na tālukaiḥ akṣaraikaika tu nopalabhyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:5297: sāmagripratītyaś ca sā vācam anubudhivaśena niścarī /
SA11sanssr_pu:5300: kṣaṇikāṃ vaśikāṃ tad īdṛśīṃ sarvavācaḥ pratiśrutakopamāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5301: yatha tantri pratītya dāru ca hastavyāyāmatrayebhi saṃgatim /
SA11sanssr_pu:5303: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kuto 'yam āgatu kutra yāti vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5304: vidiśo diśa sarvamārgataḥ śabdam annāgamanaṃ na labhyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:5305: tatha hetubhi pratyayebhi ca sarvasaṃskāragataṃ pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5306: yogī puna bhūtadarśanāt śūnya saṃskāra nirīha paśyati //
SA11sanssr_pu:5310: śūnyā anāmakā dharmāḥ nāma kiṃ paripṛcchasi / śūnyatā na kvacid devā na nāgā nāpi rākṣasāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5311: manuṣyā vāmanuṣyā vā sarve tu eṣa vidyate / nāmnā hi nāmatā śūnyā nāmni nāma na vidyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:5312: anāmakāḥ sarve dharmāḥ nāmnā tu paridīpitāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5313: yo hi svabhāvo nāmno vai na sa dṛṣṭo na ca śrutaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5314: na cotpanno niruddho vā kasya nāmeha pṛcchasi //
SA11sanssr_pu:5315: vyavahārakṛtaṃ nāma prajñaptir nāmadarśitā / ratnacitro hy ayaṃ nāmnā ratnottamapara iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:5320: evaṃ yogyacitto daśasu dikṣu śeṣasya jagato duṣkhasāgaroddharaṇābhisaṃbodhyupāyo vyomaparyantatraikālyasarvadharmavaśavartitvāyaiva tu punaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatām avataret /
SA11sanssr_pu:5322: tataś ca chinnamūlatvāt kleśā na samudācaranti //
SA11sanssr_pu:5324: tad yathāpi nāma śāntamate vṛkṣasya mūlachinnasya sarvaśākhā patrapalāśāḥ śuṣyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5325: evam eva śāntamate satkāyadṛṣṭyupaśamāt sarvakleśā upaśāmyantīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:5328: so 'sau śikṣa na jātu traśatī sugatānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5329: so 'sau śūru na jātu istriṇāṃ vaśam etī /
SA11sanssr_pu:5337: so 'sau loṣṭakadaṇḍa tāḍito na ca kupyī /
SA11sanssr_pu:5338: so 'sau chidyati aṅgam aṅgaśo na ca kṣubhyo /
SA11sanssr_pu:5342: pañcyo tasya abhijña bhāvitā ima nityaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5343: purataḥ so sugatāna sthāsyatī sa ca śūra / ity ādi //

SA11sanssr_pu:5375: tena pratyekam indriyaṣaṭkena saumanasyāditrayāṇāṃ bhedād aṣṭādaśa manopavicārā bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5378: yat kiñcid asmin kāye 'dhyātmaṃ kakkhaṭatvaṃ kharagatam upāttaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5381: keśā romāṇi nakhā dantā ity ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:5384: yat kiñcid bāhyaṃ kakkhaṭvaṃ kharagatam anupāttam ayam ucyate bāhyaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5385: tatra mahārājādhyātmikaḥ pṛthivīdhātur utpadyamāno na kutaścid āgacchati nirudhyamāno na kvacit saṃnicayaṃ gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5386: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yat strī adhyātmam ahaṃ strīti kalpayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5387: sādhyātmam ahaṃ strīti kalpayitvā bahirdhā puruṣaṃ puruṣa iti kalpayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5388: sā bahirdhā puruṣaṃ puruṣa iti kalpayitvā saṃraktā satī bahirdhā puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ saṃyogam ākāṅkṣate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5392: tatra mahārāja yaś ca saṃkalpo yaś ca saṃkalpayitā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5396: iti hy asann asadbhūtaḥ saṃkalpo jātaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5398: yathā saṃkalpas tathā saṃyogo 'pi kalalam api svabhāvena na saṃvidyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5399: yaś ca svabhāvato na saṃvidyate tat kathaṃ kakkhaṭatvaṃ janayiṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5400: iti hi mahārāja saṃkalpaṃ jñātvā kakkhaṭatvaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā kakkhaṭatvam utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5402: bhavati mahārāja samayo yad ayaṃ kāyaḥ śmaśānaparyavasāno bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5403: tasya tat kakkhaṭatvaṃ saṃklidyamānaṃ nirudhyamānaṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5411: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yadākāśībhūte lokasaṃniveśe brāhmaṃ vimānaṃ saṃtiṣṭhate mahāratnamayaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5412: tan mahārāja kakkhaṭatvam utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5413: cakravāḍamahācakravāḍāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante dṛḍhāḥ sārā ekaghanā vajramayās teṣām api kakkhaṭatvam utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5414: sumeravaḥ parvatarājāno yugaṃdharā nimiṃdharā īśādharā yāvat kālaparvatāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante /
SA11sanssr_pu:5418: tad api mahārāja kakkhaṭatvaṃ samudāgacchat kutaścid āgacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5419: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yadāyaṃ lokaḥ saṃvartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5420: tadeyaṃ mahāpṛthivī agninā vā dahyate 'dbhir vā klidyate vāyunā vā vikīryate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5421_0: tasyā agninā dahyamānāyā maṣir api na prajāyate tad yathāpi nāma sarpiṣo vā tailasya
SA11sanssr_pu:5421_1: vāgninā dahyamānasya na maṣir na chāyikā prajñāyate evam evāsyās trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyā
SA11sanssr_pu:5421_2: lokadhātor agninā dahyamānāyā naiva maṣir na chāyikāvaśiṣṭā prajñāyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5422: evam adbhir lavaṇavilayavad vāyunā vairambhavātābhihataśakuntavat pṛthivyāṃ na kiñcid avaśiṣṭaṃ prajñāyatae iti paṭhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5423: tatra mahārāja pṛthivīdhātor utpādo 'pi śūnyaḥ vyayo 'pi śūnya utpanno 'pi pṛthivīdhātuḥ svabhāvaśūnya /
SA11sanssr_pu:5424: iti hi mahārāja pṛthivīdhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātutvena nopalabhyate 'nyatra vyavahārāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:5425: so 'pi vyavahāro na strī na puruṣaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5426: evam evaitan mahārāja yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā draṣṭavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5428: yad idam asmin kāye 'dhyātmaṃ pratyātmam āpaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5434: aśru svedaḥ kheṭaḥ siṅghāṇakaṃ vaśā lasikā majjā medaḥ pittaṃ śleṣmā pūyaḥ śoṇitaṃ kṣīraṃ prasrāva ity ādir ayam ucyante ādhyātmiko 'bdhātuḥ / pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5435: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yat priyaṃ dṛṣṭvāśru pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5438: yāvat sa mahārājābdhātur na kutaścid āgacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5439: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yadādhyātmiko 'bdhātuḥ pariśuṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5440: sa pariśuṣyan nirudhyamāno na kvacid gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5442: vivartamāne khalu punar loke samantād dvātriṃśat paṭalā abhraghanāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante saṃsthāya sarvāvantaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5448: tata iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī yāvad brahmalokād udakena sphuṭā bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5449: sa mahārāja tāvan mahān abdhātur utpadyamāno na kutaścid āgacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5450: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yad ayaṃ lokaḥ saṃvartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5451: saṃvartamāne khalu punar loke dvitīyasya sūryasya prādurbhāvo bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5452: dvitīyasya sūryasa loke prādurbhāvād utsāḥ sarāṃsi kunadyaś ca śuṣyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5455: caturthasya sūryasya prādurbhāvān mahāsamudrasya yojanikam apy udakaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5456: dviyojanikam api tricatuḥpañcadaśaviṃśatitriṃśaccatvāriṃśatpañcāśadyojanikam api yāvac catvāriṃśadyojanasahasram udakam avaśiṣṭaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5460: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yan mahāsamudre pṛthitapṛthitāny avaśiṣṭāni bhavanti / pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5461: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yan mahāsamudre 'ṅgulisnehamātram apy udakaṃ nāvaśiṣṭaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5462: sa mahārāja tāvān abdhātur nirudhyamāno na kvacid gacchati /

SA11sanssr_pu:5476_0: yan manuṣyā araṇīsahagatebhyo garbhalasahagatebhyo vā gomayacūrṇena vā kārpāsapicunāvāsam
SA11sanssr_pu:5476_1: anveṣante yad utpannaṃ grāmam api dahati grāmapradeśam api dahati yāvad dvīpaṃ vā
SA11sanssr_pu:5476_2: kakṣaṃ tṛṇānāṃ vā dāvaṃ vā kāṣṭhaṃ vā yāvad dahan paraitīty ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:5477: tatra mahārājādhyātmikas tejodhātur utpadyate na kutaścid āgacchati nirudhyamāno na kvacit saṃnicayaṃ gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5478: iti hy abhūtvā bhavati bhūtvā ca prativigacchati svabhāvarahitatvāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:5479: evaṃ yat kiñcid asmin kāye vāyur vāyugataṃ laghutvaṃ samudīraṇatvaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5481: tad yathā ūrdhvagamā vāyavo 'dhogamāḥ pārśvāśrayāḥ pṛṣṭhāśrayāḥ kukṣigamāḥ śastrakāḥ kṣurakāḥ sūcakāḥ pippalakā vātāṣṭhīlā vātagulmā āśvāsapraśvāsā aṅgānusāriṇo vāyava ity ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:5482: santi bahirdhā pūrve vāyavo dakṣiṇāḥ paścimā uttarā vāyavaḥ sarajasaḥ arajasaḥ parīttā mahadgatā vāyava iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5483: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yan mahāvāyuskandhaḥ samudāgataḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5487: yaṃ satvāś cīvarakarṇikena vā vidhamanakena vātānuvṛttena vā paryeṣyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:5491: yat kiñcid asmin kāye 'dhyātmaṃ pratyātmam upagatam upāttam ākāśagatam ihābhyantarasaṃkhyābhūtaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5494: yad asmin kāye cakṣuḥ suṣiram iti vā yāvan mukhaṃ vā mukhadvāraṃ vā kaṇṭhaṃ vā kaṇṭhanāḍyā vā yena cābhyavaharati yatra cāvatiṣṭhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5497: evaṃ bāhye 'pi yad asphuṭam aspharaṇīyaṃ rūpagatenāpaliguddhaṃ suṣirabhāvaś chidraṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5499: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yat karmapratyayād āyatanāni prādurbhavanti tāny ākāśadhātuṃ paricārayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5500: tatra saṃkhyā bhavaty ādhyātmika ākāśadhātur iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5502: bhavati samayo yad rūpaṃ bibharti sarvam ākāśībhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5507: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣa utthale deśe udapānaṃ vā kuṭakaṃ vā kūpaṃ vā puṣkariṇīṃ vā khānayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:5508: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja yat tatrākāśaḥ kutas tad āgatam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5512: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja sa puruṣaḥ punar eva tad udapānaṃ vā yāvat puṣkariṇīṃ vā pūrayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:5513: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja yat tad ākāśaṃ kvacid gatam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5517: na hy ākāśadhātur gamane vā āgamane vā pratyupasthitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5529: yāvad iti hi mahārāja yā kācid varṇasaṃsthānaprativijñaptir ayam ucyate cakṣurvijñānadhātuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5531: iti hi yā ṣaḍindriyādhipateyā ṣaḍviṣayārambaṇā viṣayavijñaptir ayam ucyate vijñānadhātuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5532: sa khalu punar ayaṃ mahārāja vijñānadhātur nendriyaniśrito na viṣayebhya āgato na madhye 'ntarasthāyī sa nādhyātma bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇa /
SA11sanssr_pu:5533: sa khalu punar ayaṃ mahārāja vijñānadhātur vastu prativijñapya niruddhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5534: sa utpadyamāno na kutaścid āgacchati nirudhyamāno na kvacid gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5535: tasya khalu punar vijñānadhātor utpādo 'pi śūnyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5538: iti mahārāja vijñānadhātur vijñānadhātutvena śūnyo nopalabhyate 'nyatra vyavahārāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:5539: so 'pi vyavahāro na strī na puruṣaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5543: tad yathā pṛthivīdhātor abdhātos tejodhātor vāyudhātor yāvat /
SA11sanssr_pu:5544: tatra pṛthivīdhātuprasādaś cakṣurāyatanaṃ nābdhātuprasādo na tejodhātuprasādo na vāyudhātuprasādaś cakṣurāyatanaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5546: na hi pṛthivīdhātuprasādaḥ kasyacid dharmāyatanaṃ vā āyatanapratilambhena vā pratyupasthitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5547: evaṃ yāvan na vāyudhātuprasādaḥ kasyacid dharmasyāyatanaṃ vā āyatanapratilambhena vā pratyupasthitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5549: niśceṣṭā hy ete dharmā niṣṭhāpārā nirvāṇasamā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5550: iti hi mahārāja ekaikato dharmān mṛgyamāṇān cakṣurāyatanaṃ nopalabhate 'nyatra vyavahārāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:5554: ye ca dharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyāḥ kas teṣāṃ prasādo vā kṣobho vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5555: yeṣāṃ na prasādo na kṣobha upalabhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5557: iti hy atyantatayā cakṣurāyatanaṃ śūnyaṃ cakṣurāyatanasvabhāvena tat pūrvāntato nopalabhyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:5559: annāgamanatāṃ gamanatāṃ copādāya sthānam apy asya nopalabhyate svabhāvavirahitatvāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:5570: yāvad iti hi mahārāja sarvadharmā vimokṣābhimukhā dharmadhātuniyatā ākāśadhātuparyavasānā aprāptikā avyavahārā annabhilāpyā annabhilapanīyāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5571: yatra mahārāja indriyāṇi pratihanyante te viṣayā ity ucyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:5572: cakṣur hi rūpe pratihanyate tasmād rūpāṇi cakṣurviṣayā ity ucyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:5574: tatra cakṣū rūpe pratihanyata iti nipātaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5576: tathā hi cakṣū rūpeṣu trividhaṃ nipatatīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5581: tae ime viṣayā manogocarā ity ucyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:5585: yad etan mahārāja mano 'pratikūleṣu rūpeṣv anunītaṃ carati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5587: pratikūleṣu rūpeṣu pratihataṃ carati tenāsya dveṣa utpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5590: evaṃ śabdādiṣv api trividham ārambaṇam anubhavati pūrvavat //
SA11sanssr_pu:5593: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇyā striyā sārdhaṃ paricaret /
SA11sanssr_pu:5595: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja saṃvidyate svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇī strī /
SA11sanssr_pu:5599: tat kiṃ manyase mahārājāpi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:5605: atyantatayā hi bhagavan svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇī na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5607: anyatra yāvad eva sa puruṣo vighātasya klamathasya bhāgī syāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:5610: evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaś cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāny abhiniviśet /
SA11sanssr_pu:5613: trividhaṃ kāyena caturvidhaṃ vācā trividhaṃ manasā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5614: tac ca karmābhisaṃskṛtam ādita eva kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5615: na dakṣiṇāṃ na paścimāṃ nottarāṃ nordhvaṃ nādho nānuvidiśaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5619: jīvitendriyanirodhe āyuṣaḥ parikṣayāt tatsabhāgasya karmaṇaḥ kṣīṇatvāc caramavijñānasya nirudhyamānasya manasa ārambaṇībhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5620: tad yathāpi nāma śayitavibuddhasya janapadakalyāṇīti manasa ārambaṇaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5621: iti hi mahārāja caramavijñānenādhipatinā tena ca karmaṇā ārambaṇenaupapattyaṃśikadvayapratyayaṃ prathamavijñānam utpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5622: yadi vā narakeṣu yadi vā tiryagyonau yadi vā yamaloke yadi vā āsure kāye yadi vā manuṣyeṣu yadi vā deveṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:5623: tasya ca prathamavijñānasya aupapattyaṃśikasya samanantaraniruddhasyānnantarasabhāgā cittasaṃtatiḥ pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5625: tatra yaś caramavijñānasya nirodhas tatra cyutir iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5627: iti hi mahārāja na kaścid dharmo 'smāl lokāt paraṃ lokaṃ gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5629: tatra mahārāja caramavijñānam utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati //
SA11sanssr_pu:5633: prathamavijñānam apy utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5642: karmaṇāṃ cābandhyatā prajāyate vipākasya ca pratisaṃvedanā na cātra kaścit kartā na bhoktānyatra nāmasaṃketāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:5643: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntare śatruṇā sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:5646: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja saṃvidyate svapnāntare śatruḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5651: tat kiṃ manyase mahārājāpi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:5657: atyantatayā hi bhagavan svapne śatrur na saṃvidyate kutaḥ punas tena sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5658: anyatra yāvad eva sa puruṣo vighātasya klamathasya ca bhāgī syāt yas tam abhiniviśet /
SA11sanssr_pu:5660: evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaś cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā daurmanasyāsthānīyāny abhiniviśate 'bhiniviṣṭaḥ san pratihanyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5663: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣah suptaḥ svapnāntare piśācena paripātyamāno bhītaḥ saṃoham āpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5664: sa śayitavibuddhas taṃ piśācaṃ taṃ ca saṃmoham anusmaret /
SA11sanssr_pu:5665: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja saṃvidyante svapne piśācaḥ saṃmoho vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5666: yāvad evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaś cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā upekṣāsthānīyāny abhiniviśate 'bhiniviṣṭaḥ san muhyati mūḍho mohajaṃ karmābhisaṃskarotīti pūrvavat /
SA11sanssr_pu:5667: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇyā gāyantyā madhuraṃ gītasvaraṃ madhuraṃ ca tantrīsvaraṃ ca śṛṇuyāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:5669: sa śayitavibuddhas tad eva gītavāditam anusmaret /
SA11sanssr_pu:5670: tat kiṃ manyase mahārājāpi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyaḥ svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇyā gītavāditam abhiniviśet /
SA11sanssr_pu:5675: atyantatayā hi bhagavan svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇī strī na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5677: anyatra yāvad eva sa puruṣo vighātasya klamathasya ca bhāgī syāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:5680: evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śrutvā saumanasyasthānīyāny abhiniviśate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5682: evaṃ gandhādiṣu tridhā tridhā veditavyam // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5684: kim ity ahaṃ sadevakasya lokasya cakṣur bhaveyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5689: mukto mocayeyam āśvasta āśvāsayeyaṃ parinirvṛttaḥ parinirvāpayeyam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5690: pūrvā hi koṭir mahārāja na prajñāyate aiśvaryādhipatyānām anubhūya mānānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5691: iti hi mahārāja māyopamānīndriyāṇy atṛptāny atarṣaṇīyāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:5693: atrānnantayaśaścakravartinaḥ kathā svargāc ca patite tasmin sarājakaiḥ pauraiḥ parivṛta evaṃ paṭhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5694: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja sarpirmaṇḍo vā navanītamaṇḍo vā taptāyāṃ vālukāyām upanikṣipto 'vasīdati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5696: evam eva mahārājānnantayaśā avasīdati na saṃtiṣṭhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5697: atha rājā priyaṃkaro rājānam annantayaśasaṃ tathāvasīdantaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5703_2: hiraṇyavarṣaṃ suvarṇavarṣaṃ sarvopakaraṇavarṣaṃ cānubhūya caturo mahādvīpān adhyāvasitvā
SA11sanssr_pu:5703_3: śakrasyārdhāsanam ākramyātīcchayā na mukto 'tṛpta eva kāmaiḥ kālagata iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5704: evaṃ tvaṃ mahārāja vyākuryā ity evam uktvā ca rājānnantayaśāḥ kālam akārṣīt / pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5705: tasmāt tarhi te mahārāja marīcikāyām udakasvabhāvo nābhūn na bhaviṣyati na caitarhi vidyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5706: evam eva mahārāja rūpavedanāsaṃjñā saṃskāravijñanāṃ svabhāvo nābhūn na bhaviṣyati na caitarhi vidyatae ity ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:5710: tac ca bhagavatā śūnyataḥ sudṛṣṭaṃ suviditaṃ susākṣātkṛtaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5714: annājñeyo 'vijñeyo 'deśito 'prakāśito yāvad akriyo yāvan na lābho nālābho na sukhaṃ na duṣkhaṃ na yaśo nāyaśaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5716: tatra jinena jagasya kṛtena saṃvṛti deśita lokahitāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:5717: yena jagat sugatasya sakāśe saṃjanayīha prasādasukhārthe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5718: saṃvṛti prajñamayī narasiṃhaḥ ṣaḍgatayo bhaṇi satvagaṇānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5719: narakatiraś ca tathaiva ca pretān āsurakāya narāṃś ca marūṃś ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:5720: nīcakulāṃs tatha uccakulāṃś ca āḍhyakulāṃś ca daridrakulāṃś cety ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:5722: katama eṣa dharmo yo bhagavatā vyākṛto 'nnuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
SA11sanssr_pu:5723: kiṃ rūpam uta vedanā āho śvit saṃjñā utāho saṃskārā atha vijñānaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtam annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāv iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5725: na rūpaṃ yāvan na vijñānaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtam annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
SA11sanssr_pu:5730: tad evam annupalabhyamāneṣu sarvadharmeṣu katamo 'tra buddhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5734: śūnyaṃ hi rūpaṃ rūpeṇa yāvad vijñānaṃ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5737: nālam atra paṇḍitair abhiniveśa utpādayitavya iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:5741: sarvadharmā bhūtakoṭir annantakoṭir annāvaraṇakoṭir apratiṣṭhitakoṭir ity ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:5746: aprakṛtikā hi bhagavan bodhir aprakṛtikāni ca pañcānantaryāṇi /
SA11sanssr_pu:5748: tathā vihasyante bhagavan ye kecit parinirvātukāmāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5753: bhūtakoṭir iti bhagavan yad uktaṃ nirmāṇaratibhir devais tatra vayaṃ bhūtam api nopalabhāmahe /
SA11sanssr_pu:5756: yo hi kaścid bhagavan bhūtam upalabhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5757: koṭim api sa tasyopalabhate dvaye cāsau caratīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:5759: supiti yatha naraḥ kṣudhābhibhūtaḥ śatarasabhojanabhuñjino ca tṛptaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5760: na pi ca kṣudha na bhojanaṃ na satvaḥ supina yathaiva nidṛṣṭa sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5761: bhaṇi naru paṭhane manojñavācaṃ priyu bhavatī na ca saṃkramo 'sti vācaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5762: na ca vacana cāsya rakta vācām upalabhase na ca tatra saṃśayo 'sti //
SA11sanssr_pu:5763: śruṇati yatha manojña vīṇaśabdaṃ madhura na cāsti svabhāvataḥ sa śabdaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5764: tatha imi vidu skandha prekṣamāṇo na labhati bhāvu svabhāvataḥ sumedhāḥ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5765: yatha naru iha śaṅkhaśabda śrutvā vimṛśati vidva kuto ya prādubhūtaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5766: na ca labhati svabhāva śūnyabhāvaṃ tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narendra sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5767: yatha naru iha bhojanaṃ praṇītaṃ vimṛśati aṅgaśu siddham asvabhāvam /
SA11sanssr_pu:5768: yatha rasu tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5769: yatha naru iha indrayaṣṭi dṛṣṭvā vimṛśati aṅgaśu niḥsvabhāva śūnyam /
SA11sanssr_pu:5770: vimṛśatu yatha yaṣṭi te 'ṅga śūnyās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5771: puravara yatha aṅgaśo vibhajya nagaru svabhāvatu nāmato na labdham /
SA11sanssr_pu:5772: yatha nagara tathāṅga sarvaśūnyās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narendra sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5773: mudita yatha narāga mukta bherī harṣa janeti svabhāvaśūnyaśabdā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5774: svaru yatha tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvaṃ tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5775: ... ... hanatu yatha narasya tāṃ hi bherīṃ pratighu na vidyati nāpi snehadhātuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5776: vimṛśatu bherīva te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narendra sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5777: hanatu yatha narasya tāṃ hi bherīṃ svaru na sa manyati rāmayāmi lokam /
SA11sanssr_pu:5778: svaru yatha tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvāḥ tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narendra sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5779: hanatu yatha narasya tasya bheryāṃ na pi svaru aṅgaśu nāpi sa svatantraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5780: svaru yatha tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5783: satvaś cāsya vibhāvitaḥ suviditaṃ niḥsatva sarvaṃ jagat /
SA11sanssr_pu:5785: tena tvā sugataṃ vibhāvitamatiṃ pūjema pūjāriham //
SA11sanssr_pu:5786: duṣkhaṃ cā sugatā [doubtful] daśaddiśigataṃ naivaṃ parīdṛśyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5787: satveṣū karuṇā ca nāma bhaṇitā devātideva tvayā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5788: evaṃ bho jinapuṅgavā jinamataṃ ajñāta yathāvataḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5789: tena tvāṃ dvipadottamā naravarāḥ pūjema pūjāriham //
SA11sanssr_pu:5790: satvānaiva na duṣkhaṃ śākyamuninā yasyāpanītaṃ dukhaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5791: jātās te muditāś ca hṛṣṭamanaso 'ratīś ca tair noditāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5793: tasmāt pūjiya tvāṃ narāṇa pravaraṃ prāyema prāptaṃ phalaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5795: naivaṃ te smṛtināyakā na bhaṇitā naiva pramuṣṭā smṛtiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5796: uktaṃ co sugatena bhāvapathimāḥ kāyaṃ gatā bhāvanāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5797: evaṃ buddhanayaṃ viditva sugatā pūjā kṛtā tāyinaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5798: bhāvethaḥ śamathaṃ vipaśyanam ayaṃ mārgaṃ dukhā śāntaye /
SA11sanssr_pu:5799: śāntās te bhagavan savāsanamalā yehī jagat kliṣyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:5800: śamathaś cātha vipaśyanā na ca malā sarve 'ti śūnyā mune /
SA11sanssr_pu:5801: asmin devagaṇā na kāṅkṣa kvacanā pūjentu tvāṃ nāyakaṃ / ity ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:5804: yasya ca dharmasya svabhāvo na vidyate so 'vastukaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5805: yo 'vastukaḥ so 'pariniṣpannaḥ yo 'pariniṣpannaḥ sa notpadyate na nirudhyate / pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5806: yat triṣv apy adhvasu nopalabhyate na tac cakṣur nendriyaṃ kathaṃ tasya vyavahāro jñeyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5808: yāvad eva nāmamātraṃ no tu khalu paramārthato riktam upalabhyate na muṣṭiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5809: evaṃ cakṣuś cendriyaṃ ca rikte muṣṭisadṛśam alīkam asadbhūtaṃ tucchaṃ mṛṣāmoṣadharme bālopalāpanaṃ mūrkhasaṃmohanam yāvad eva nāmamātram //
SA11sanssr_pu:5813: svapne yathā śiraśchedo dṛṣṭas te āsravakṣayaḥ / darśitaḥ sarvavijñānāṃ sarvadarśin namo 'stu te //
SA11sanssr_pu:5814: atraiva ca drumeṇa kinnararājena bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ pratyāha /
SA11sanssr_pu:5817: syād yadi kiṃcid aśūnyaṃ na bhavej jinenāsya vyākaraṇam //
SA11sanssr_pu:5824: yat svabhāvaśūnyam ādarśamaṇḍale supariśuddhe saṃdṛśyate pratibimbam /
SA11sanssr_pu:5826: avikāraṃ dharmadhātum imāṃ ca pūjāṃ drumāṅgaśo vicārayasi /
SA11sanssr_pu:5829: yad api ca nirīhakatvaṃ kriyāṃ ca na jānase mayā proktaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5830: śakaṭāṅga saṃnipātaṃ nirīkṣva śakaṭasya caiva kriyāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5831: karma ca me ākhyātaṃ kartā na vidyate daśasu dikṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:5832: vāteritād iva taror yathā hi nivartate vahniḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5833: na ca māruto na ca taruś cetayati hutāśanaṃ ca yajane /
SA11sanssr_pu:5834: na nivartate vahnis tathaiva karmasya kartāraḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5835: yad api vadase na ca saṃcaya puṇyasya hi vidyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5838: yathā bhaṇasi manuṣyāṇām āyuḥparimāṇaṃ varṣaśataṃ jīvin /
SA11sanssr_pu:5842: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte utpanno dharma utpadyate utānnutpannaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5844: nāham āyuṣman śāriputra utpannasya dharmasyotpattim icchāmi na cānnutpannasyeti //
SA11sanssr_pu:5846: tathatā tathateti kulaputra śūnyatāyā etad adhivacanaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5847: sā ca śūnyatā notpadyate na nirudhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5849: yady evaṃ dharmāḥ śūnyā uktā bhagavatā tasmāt sarvadharmā notpatsyante na nirotsyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:5852: evam eva kulaputra tathā yathābhisaṃbudhyase sarvadharmā notpadyante na nirudhyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:5855: saṃskṛtā dharmā utpadyante nirudhyante cety asya tathāgatabhāṣitasya ko 'bhiprāyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5858: tatra tathāgato mahākāruṇiko lokasyottrāsapadaparihārārthaṃ vyavahāravaśād uktavān utpadyante nirudhyante ceti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5859: na cātra kasyacid dharmasyotpādo na nirodha iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:5861: tatra bhagavaṃś cakṣūrūpeṣu na raṇati śrotraṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5869: yan na saṃsṛjyate tan na raṇati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5871: advitīyāś ca bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ paraḥparaṃ na jānanti na vijānanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5877: na saṃsaranti na parinirvānti naite kasyacit /
SA11sanssr_pu:5879: naite bhagavan dharmā udvijante na saṃkliśyante na vyavadāyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:5880: evam ahaṃ bhagavan jānāmy evam avabudhye /
SA11sanssr_pu:5883: evam ahaṃ jānāmy evam ahaṃ budhyāmīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5885: na ca bhagavann āyatanānām evaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5887: yo hy evaṃ jānāti sa na kenacit sārddhaṃ vivadati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5888: yan na vivadati tac chramaṇadharmam anusaratīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5889: tathā dharmadarśanaṃ buddhadarśanaṃ sarvasatvadarśanaṃ sarvasatvahetupratyayadarśanaṃ śūnyatādarśanaṃ śūnyatādarśanam adarśanaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5890: adarśanaṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ darśanaṃ samyagdarśanam iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:5894: kasya punaḥ śūnyatāvādinaḥ paramārthataḥ sthāṇuḥ siddho yadāśrayāt puruṣabhrāntiḥ syād /
SA11sanssr_pu:5895: amūlā eva ca sarvadharmās tatvato mūlānupapatteḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5906: yan mañjuśrīr apratiṣṭhānaṃ na tasya kiñcin mūlam iti hy apratiṣṭhānamūlapratiṣṭhitāḥ sarvadharmā iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:5917: sukhena na rajyate duṣkhena na virajyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5918: yo hy evaṃ lokadharmair na saṃhriyate sa śūnyatāṃ jānītae iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:5919: tathā śūnyatāvādino na kvacid anurāgo na virāgaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5920: yasmin rajyeta tac chūnyam eva jānīte /
SA11sanssr_pu:5922_0: nāsau śūnyatāṃ jānīte yaḥ kvacid dharme rajyate vā virajyate vā tathā nāsau śūnyatāṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:5922_1: jānīte yaḥ kenacit sārddhaṃ vigrahaṃ vivādaṃ vā kuryāc chūnyam eva jānīte tac chūnyam
SA11sanssr_pu:5925: iha pañcakaṣāyasaṃkliṣṭasya kalyāṇamitrāvasāditasya vā saṃkṣepeṇa tāvat kutra yatnaṃ kṛtvā śīghraṃ cittaśuddhir bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5927: sā caitadabhyāsāt sukaraṃ prahīyatae iti paragauravam ātmāvajñā caivaṃ bhāvanīyā //
SA11sanssr_pu:5928: yadi satvo yadi skandhāḥ kṣamatā sarvathā sthitā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5929: ekasya hi parātmatvaṃ viruddhaṃ saṃbhavet kathaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5930: vinālambanam apy etad ācaranty eva dehinaḥ / annādikalyānābhyāsāt kim abhyāsasya duṣkaram //
SA11sanssr_pu:5931: evam abhyāsavaśyatve tulye kasmāt sukhodayam / paragauravam utsṛjya svasukhāyān yad iṣyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:5932: cintāmaṇir yathoktāś ca santi gauravahetavaḥ / na tu me gauravāt saukhyam ihāpi janadurbhagāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:5933: tasmāt satvāntare yadvad rūkṣamatsaramāninaḥ / ātmasnehavato vṛttir bhāvayet tadviparyayam //
SA11sanssr_pu:5934: ātmano bahumāno 'yaṃ stutinindādisekataḥ / vardhate nārakavaśāt sekān narakavahnivat //
SA11sanssr_pu:5935: śabdas tāvad acittatvān māṃ stautīti na saṃbhavaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5936: paraḥ kila mayi prīta ity ayaṃ me matibhramaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5937: tattuṣṭyaiva mama prītiḥ sāmānye na sadāstu sā / tatsukhena na cet kāryaṃ tena tuṣṭena kiṃ mama //
SA11sanssr_pu:5938: anyatra mayi vā prītyā kiṃ hi me parakīyayā / na me pareṇa tuṣṭena kāye saukhyam ihāṇv api //
SA11sanssr_pu:5939: evaṃ jñātvā prahātavyā kalpanā nirvibandhanā / akīrtinindā satkārā evaṃ jñeyāś ca niṣphalāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5940: na dharmo nāyur ārogyaṃ na balaṃ vandanādibhiḥ / yadvad utprāsyamānasya vikārair anyakāyikaiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5941: hṛṣṭasyātha viṣaṇṇasya lābhālābhau samodayau / vivarjya niṣphalaṃ tasmād bhaveyaṃ śailamānasaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5942: saṃstavatyāgāc ca śīghraṃ cittaviśuddhir bhavati / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:5946: pratighānunayau yasya tasya pāpam avāritam / abhyākhyānāni citrāṇi mātsaryaṃ cerṣyayā saha //
SA11sanssr_pu:5947: lābhādikāmatā nāma ity ādy āvartate bahu / tasmāt sarvaprayatnena saṃstavaṃ praharen muniḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5948: sādṛśyād anyad apy etad vārisrotovad īkṣyate / tad evedam iti bhrāntyā tatve tiṣṭhāmy ato balāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:5949: avastu caitat sādṛśyaṃ duṣkhaṃ ca janayiṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5950: ahaṃ caitac ca sarvaṃ ca na cirān na bhaviṣyati / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:5958: iha gṛhapate gṛhī bodhisatvo dharmeṇa bhogān paryeṣate nādharmeṇa /

SA11sanssr_pu:6327: āśayaśuddhasya bodhisatvasya svamanojalpād eva sarvāvavādānuśāsanyo niścaranti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6329: tad yathā bhagavan yasya pādau tasya gamanaṃ evaṃ bhagavan yasyāśayas tasya buddhadharmāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6330: tad yathā bhagavan yasyottamāṅgaṃ tasya jīvitaṃ evam eva bhagavan yasyāśayas tasya buddhabodhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6331: tad yathā bhagavan yasya jīvitaṃ tasya lābhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6332: evam eva bhagavan yasyāśayas tasya buddhatvalābhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6335: evam eva bhagavann āśaye sati bodhisatvasya sarvabuddhadharmā jvalanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6337: tad yathā bhagavan satsv abhramegheṣu varṣaṃ varṣaty asatsu na varṣati /
SA11sanssr_pu:6338: evam eva bhagavann āśaye sati buddhadharmāḥ pravartante /
SA11sanssr_pu:6339: tad yathā bhagavan yasya vṛkṣasya mūlaṃ vipannaṃ tasya puṣpaphalāni na bhūyaḥ prarohanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6340: evam eva bhagavan yasyāśayo vipannas tasya sarve kuśalā dharmā na bhūyaḥ saṃbhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6341: tasmāt tarhi bhagavan bodhisatvena buddhabodhyarthikena svāśayaḥ sūdgṛhītaḥ svārakṣitaḥ suśodhitaḥ svadhiṣṭhitaḥ kartavya iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6386: tad evaṃ vyavasāyāśayau dṛḍhīkṛtya kāruṇyaṃ puraḥkṛtya yate śubhavṛddhaye //
SA11sanssr_pu:6388: atha khalv avalokiteśvaro bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavantam etad avocat /
SA11sanssr_pu:6390: eko dharmo bhagavan bodhisatvena svārādhitaḥ supratividdhaḥ kartavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6394: mahākaruṇayā bhagavan bodhisatvānāṃ sarvabuddhadharmāḥ karatalagatā bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6395: tad yathā bhagavan yena rājñaś cakravartinaś cakraratnaṃ gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:6397: evam eva bhagavan yena bodhisatvasya mahākaruṇā gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:6399: tad yathā bhagavann āditye udite satvāḥ karmakriyāsu pracurā bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6400: evam eva bhagavan mahākaruṇā yatroditā bhavati tatrānyabodhikarā dharmāḥ kriyāsu pracurā bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6401: tad yathā bhagavan sarveṣām indriyāṇāṃ manasādhiṣṭhitānāṃ svasvaviṣaye grahaṇaprācuryaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:6402: evam eva bhagavan mahākaruṇādhiṣṭhitānām anyeṣāṃ bodhikarāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svasmin svasmin karaṇīye prācuryaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:6403: tad yathā bhagavan jīvitendriye saty anyeṣām indriyāṇāṃ pravṛttir bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:6404: evam eva bhagavan mahākaruṇāyāṃ satyām anyeṣāṃ bodhikarāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pravṛttir bhavatīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6406: tad yathāpi nāma bhadanta sāradvatīputra puruṣasya jīvitendriyasyāśvāsāḥ praśvāsāḥ pūrvaṃgamāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6407: evam eva bhadanta sāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāyānasamudāgatasya mahākaruṇā pūrvaṃgamāḥ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:6408: syād yathāpi nāma śreṣṭhino vā gṛhapater vā ekaputrake guṇavati majjāgataṃ prema /
SA11sanssr_pu:6409: evam eva mahākaruṇāpratilabdhasya bodhisatvasya sarvasatveṣu majjāgataṃ premeti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6411: svakam annekavidhaṃ pūrvānubhūtam anubhūyamānaṃ vā duṣkhaṃ bhayaṃ ca svātmany atyantam anniṣṭaṃ bhāvayitvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:6412: priyādiṣu maitrī maitrīvatā bhāvayitavyā pratyutpannaduṣkhavyādhiṣu mahāduṣkhasāgarānavadhidīrghasaṃsāravyasanānunīteṣu vā //
SA11sanssr_pu:6414: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty āścaryaṃ yāvad ajñānasaṃmūḍhā vateme bālapṛthagjanāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6415: yeṣām asaṃkhyeyā ātmabhāvā niruddhā nirudhyante nirotsyante ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:6416: evaṃ ca kṣīyamāṇā kāye na nirvedam utpādayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6430: apratiśaraṇāḥ tathā saṃvegam āpadyante bahūni duṣkhāni pratyanubhavantaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6432_0: hantāham eṣāṃ satvānāṃ duṣkhārtānām anāthānām atrāṇānām aśaraṇānām alayanānām āparāyaṇānām
SA11sanssr_pu:6433: yathārūpeṇa puṇyajñānasaṃbhāropacayena saṃbhṛtena ime sarvasatvā abhyantaviśuddhim anuprāpnuyur iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6435: saṃsārāṭavīkāntāramārgaprapannā vateme satvā nirayatiryagyoniyamalokaprapātābhimukhāḥ kudṛṣṭiviṣamajālānuprāptāḥ mohagahanasaṃchannā mithyāmārgavitathaprayātā /
SA11sanssr_pu:6446: te 'smābhir mahākuśalamūlabalenoddhṛtya nirupadrave arajasi śivasarvajñatāratnadvīpe pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:6448: te asmābhiḥ sarvatraidhātukaviveke abhayapure sarvaduṣkhopaśame [doubtful] annāvaraṇanirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā ity ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:6449: evam ebhiḥ paraḥparadṛḍhīkṛtyair vyavasāyāśayakāruṇyaiḥ puṇyavṛddhim ārabhet /
SA11sanssr_pu:6450: tatra tāvad bhadrācāryāvidhiḥ kāryā vandanādiḥ sadādarāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:6451: āryogradattaparipṛcchāyāṃ hi trirātre trir divasasya ca śuceḥ śucivastraprāvṛtasya ca triskandhakapravartanam uktaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6462: gāthācatuṣṭayena ca yathāgītaiś ca stotraiḥ / āryabhadracaryādigāthābhir vā pūjanā ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:6464: iha bodhisatvo yānīmāni bhavanti puṣpajātāni vā phalajātāni vā amamāny aparigrahāṇi /
SA11sanssr_pu:6465: tāni triṣkṛtvā rātrau triṣkṛtvā divase buddhabodhisatvebhyo niryātayati // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:6466: sayathīme [doubtful] dhūpavṛkṣā vā gandhavṛkṣā vā ratnavṛkṣā vā kalpavṛkṣā vā amamā aparigrahās tān api triṣkṛtvā rātrau triṣkṛtvā divase buddhabodhisatvebhyo niryātayatīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6470: anayā ca diśā sarvabhaiṣajyāni sarvarasāyanāni sarvasalilāni annavadyāni ammaṇḍalāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:6472: vivṛtteṣu vā lokadhātuṣu ye paramarasasparśasaṃpannā bhūparpaṭakāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6476: pariśuddheṣu ca lokadhātuṣu ye ramaṇīyatarāḥ paribhogāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6569: etac ca bhāvayan sarvatra pariṇāmayāmīti yojyaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6570: āryāvalokiteśvaravimokṣe ca yad uktaṃ tad apy evaṃ yojyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6590: saṃkṣepataḥ punar iyam annuttarā pariṇāmanā yeyam āryabhadracaryāgāthāyāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6591: mañjuśirī yatha jānati śūraḥ so ca samantata bhadra tathaiva /
SA11sanssr_pu:6592: teṣu ahaṃ anuśikṣayamāṇo nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6593: sarvatriyadhva gatebhi jinebhir yā pariṇāmana varṇita agrā /
SA11sanssr_pu:6594: tāya ahaṃ kuśalaṃ imu sarvaṃ nāmayamī varabhadracarīye / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6595: iti śikṣāsamuccaye bhadracaryāvidhiḥ ṣoḍaśamaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6598: ukto vandanādividhiḥ / tena puṇyavṛddhir bhavatīti kuto gamyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:6601: varjayaty akṣaṇāny aṣṭau yae ime deśitā mayā /
SA11sanssr_pu:6603: varṇavān rūpasaṃpanno lakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ sthāmnā balena copeto nāsau kausīdyam ṛcchati [doubtful] //
SA11sanssr_pu:6604: āḍhyo mahādhanaś cāsau adhṛṣyaḥ puṇyavān api / ārāgya lokapradyotaṃ satkaroti punaḥ punaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6605: śreṣṭhīkuleṣu sphīteṣu sa āḍhyeṣūpapadyate / bhaved dānapatiḥ śūro muktatyāgo hy amatsarī //
SA11sanssr_pu:6608: maharddhikaś cakravartī saptaratnasamanvitaḥ / rājye pratiṣṭhito buddhān satkaroti punaḥ punaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6609: ścyuta/ cāsmād gataḥ svargaṃ prasanno jinaśāsane / śakro bhavati devendraḥ īśvaro marumūrddhani //
SA11sanssr_pu:6610: na śakyaṃ bhāṣatā varṇaṃ kṣapayituṃ kalpakoṭibhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6611: ya stūpaṃ lokanāthasya naraḥ kuryāt pradakṣiṇam //
SA11sanssr_pu:6612: na jātu so 'ndhaḥ khañjo vā kalpānām api koṭibhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6613: utpādya bodhicittaṃ yaḥ śāstu stūpaṃ hi vandate //
SA11sanssr_pu:6616: yo buddhakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrān kalpān koṭī ca tuliya satkarayā /
SA11sanssr_pu:6617: yaś ceha kalpe caramaka ghorakāle vandeya stūpaṃ bahutara tasya puṇyam //
SA11sanssr_pu:6618: agro hi buddho 'tuliya dakṣiṇīyo 'grāṃ caritvā cariyaviśeṣa prāptaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6619: tasyeha pūjāṃ karia narariṣabhasya vipāka śreṣṭho bhavati atulyarūpaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6620: itaś cyutvā manuṣyebhyas trāyastriṃśeṣu gacchati / vimānaṃ labhate tatra vicitraṃ ratanām ayam //
SA11sanssr_pu:6621: kūṭāgāraṃ svayaṃ datvā apsarogaṇasevitaḥ / mālāṃ stūpe saṃpradāya trāyastriṃśeṣu jāyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:6622: aṣṭāṅgajalasaṃpūrṇāṃ suvarṇasikatāstritām / vaiḍūryasphaṭikaiś caiva divyāṃ puṣkariṇīṃ labhet //
SA11sanssr_pu:6623: bhuktvā ca tāṃ ratiṃ divyāṃ āyuḥ saṃpūrya paṇḍitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6624: cyutvā ca devalokāt sa manuṣyo bhavati bhogavān //
SA11sanssr_pu:6625: jātikoṭisahasraṇi śatāni niyutāni ca / satkṛtaḥ syāc ca sarvatra caitye mālāṃ pradāya ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:6626: cakravartī ca rājāsau śakraś ca bhavatīśvaraḥ / brahmā ca brahmalokasmin caitye mālāṃ pradāya ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:6627: paṭṭapradāna datvā tu lokanāthasya tāyinaḥ / sarve 'syārthāḥ samṛdhyanti ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6628: tyajed dhīnān akuśalān na sa tatropapadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:6631: priyaḥ sadayitaś cāsau satkṛtaś ca praśaṃsitaḥ / davānām atha nāgānāṃ ye lokesmiṃś ca paṇḍitāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6632: yatrāsau jāyate vīraḥ puṇyatejaḥsudīpitaḥ / te kulāḥ satkṛtā bhonti rāṣṭrāṇi nagarāṇi ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:6633: yaḥ sarṣapāt sūkṣmataraṃ gṛhītvā dhūpeya dhūpaṃ bhagavati caityakeṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:6634: tasyānuśaṃsān śṛṇuta prabhāṣato me prasannacittā jahiya khilāṃ malāṃś ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:6635: sa puṇyavāṃś carati diśaḥ samantād ārogyaprāpto dṛḍhamatir apramattaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6636: vineti śokaṃ vicarati cārikāyāṃ priyo manāpo bhavati mahājanasya //
SA11sanssr_pu:6637: rājyaṃ ca labdhvā jina varu satkarotī mahānubhāvo vidu cakravartī /
SA11sanssr_pu:6638: suvarṇavarṇo vicitralakṣaṇaiḥ sa manojñagandhān labhi sarvaloke //
SA11sanssr_pu:6641: yaś cīvareṇa caityeṣu kuryāt pūjām atulāṃ nāyakānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6642: tasyeha bhotī asadṛśu ātmabhāvo dvātriṃśatībhiḥ kavacita lakṣaṇebhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6643: pāṇītaleṣu suruciru muktahārāḥ prādurbhavantī vividha annantakalpāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6644: siṃhalatāḥ suruciravarṇasūtrā veṭhitva stūpaṃ bhagavata cīvarebhiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6645: datvā patākāṃ bhagavata cetikeṣū chandaṃ janitvā tatha siya buddhaloke /
SA11sanssr_pu:6646: sa pūjanīyo bhavati mahājanasya carantu śreṣṭho jinacārikāye //
SA11sanssr_pu:6647: suvarṇavarṇo bhavati si ātmabhāvo lābhī sa bhotī suruciracīvarāṇāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6648: karpāsikānāṃ susahita kambalānāṃ dukūlakānāṃ tatha varakauśakānāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6649: dhvajaṃ daditvā hataraji satvasāre dhanaṃ prabhūtaṃ pratilabhi na cireṇa /
SA11sanssr_pu:6650: prabhūtakoṣo bhavati annantaprajño paricāru tasya bhavaty adīnacittaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6651: na cittaśūlaṃ janayati so parasya prasādacittaḥ sada apramattaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6652: na tasya agniḥ kramati viṣannaśastraṃ udvīkṣaṇīyo bhavati mahājanasya //
SA11sanssr_pu:6653: adho upādāya ca vibhavāgru yāvat jāmbūnadaṃ tena bhavati buddhakṣetraṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6654: śakyaṃ kṣayetuṃ āyuśriya evarūpā na buddhastūpe dharayata eka dīpam //
SA11sanssr_pu:6655: na tasya kāyo bhavati avarṇitāṅgo dṛḍhāsu bhotī parighabhujo 'chambhī /
SA11sanssr_pu:6656: ālokaprāpto [doubtful] vicarati sarvaloke daditva dīpaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
SA11sanssr_pu:6657: yadi buddhakṣetrā niyutaśatā sahasrā bhaveyu pūrṇā śikhagatasarṣapebhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6658: śakyaṃ gaṇetuṃ tulayitu bhāṣituṃ vā na tathāgateṣū dharayitu ekadīpam //
SA11sanssr_pu:6659: alaṅkaritvā suruciradarśanīyaṃ yo deti chatraṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:6660: tasyeha bhoty asadṛśa ātmabhāvo dvātriṃśatībhiḥ kavacita lakṣaṇebhiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6661: yebhir jinasya pratapata ātmabhāvo rūpaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ yathariva [doubtful] kāñcanasya /
SA11sanssr_pu:6662: jāmbūnado vā suruciradarśanīyā abhikīrṇa ... kusumita lakṣaṇebhiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6664: na bhogahānir bhavati kadācid asya devāna bhoti gurukṛta pūjitaś ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:6665: na kāmabhogau ramati kadāci dhīro viśuddhaśīlaḥ sakuśalabrahmacaryaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6667: na jñānahānir bhavati kadācid asya na bodhicittaṃ vijahati so kathañcit /
SA11sanssr_pu:6668: maitrīvihārī bhavati adīnacitto datveha chattraṃ bhagavatacetikeṣu //
SA11sanssr_pu:6669: vādyena pūjāṃ naravṛṣabhasya kṛtvā na śoka śalyavaśa jātu bhoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6670: manojñaghoṣo bhavati manuṣyaloke svarāṅgu tasyāvikala viśuddha bhoti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6671: viśuddhacakṣur bhavati sa saṃprajanyo viśuddhaśrotro bhavati udagracittaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6672: ghraṇendriyaṃ parama uttapta bhoti vāditva vādyaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
SA11sanssr_pu:6673: jihvāsya bhoti surucira darśanīyā susūkṣma mṛdvī rucira manojña ghoṣā /
SA11sanssr_pu:6674: raktā pravālā yathariva [doubtful] devatānāṃ svarāṅga koṭīvara sṛjate 'prameyāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6675: na jātu bhotī uragu ajihvako vā na khañjakubjo nāpi ca nāmitāṅgaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6676: viśiṣṭa bhotī surucira ātmabhāvo vāditva vādyaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
SA11sanssr_pu:6677: na jātu kaścij janaye prasādaṃ devo ca nāgo manuja mahorago vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:6678: āśvāsaprāpto vicarati sarvaloke vāditva vādyaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
SA11sanssr_pu:6679: kalpāna koṭīniyutaśatā sahasraṃ viśiṣṭakāyo bhavati aninditāṅgaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6680: prāsādiko 'sau kavacita lakṣaṇebhiḥ saṃśodhya stūpaṃ bhagavata nirvṛtasya //
SA11sanssr_pu:6681: vimānaśreṣṭhaṃ labhati manojñagandhaṃ divyaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ suruciracandanasya /
SA11sanssr_pu:6682: na jātu tṛṣṇāṃ janayati so kadācit saṃśodhya stūpaṃ bhagavata nirvṛtasya //
SA11sanssr_pu:6683: pralopakāle jinavaraśāsanasmin na jātu bhotī upagata jambudvīpe /
SA11sanssr_pu:6684: svarge sa bhoti pratiṣṭhita tasmi kāle gandhānulepaṃ dadiya jinasya stūpe //
SA11sanssr_pu:6685: durgandhikāmān aśucijugupsanīyān varjeti nityaṃ pratiṣṭhita śīlaskandhe /
SA11sanssr_pu:6686: carī sa nityam imu vara brahmacaryaṃ gandhānulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe //
SA11sanssr_pu:6687: itaś cyuto 'sau marupati svargaloke arthaṃ sahasrā tulayati no cireṇa /
SA11sanssr_pu:6688: karoti cārthaṃ suvipuladevatānāṃ gandhānulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe //
SA11sanssr_pu:6689: viśiṣṭavākyo bhavati manojñaghoṣaḥ priyo manāpo bahujanasatkṛtaś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:6690: sukhaṃ ca tasya bhavati sadā prasannaṃ gandhānulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe //
SA11sanssr_pu:6691: apāyabhūmiṃ ... vijahāty aśeṣāṃ āsannako bhavati tathāgatānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6692: prasādalabdhaḥ sada sukhi premaṇīyo gandhānulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe //
SA11sanssr_pu:6693: so 'kṣaṇaṃ vai vijahāti sarvaṃ aṣṭa kṣaṇāś cāsya viśiṣṭa bhonti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6694: buddhāna pūjām atuliya so karoti choritva jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
SA11sanssr_pu:6695: śūraś ca bhoti dṛḍhamatir apramatto na kāmabhoge 'bhiratiṃ janeti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6696: naiṣkramyaprāptau ca adīnacittaḥ choritva jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
SA11sanssr_pu:6697: na bodhicittaṃ pramuṣyati tasya jātu akhaṇḍaśīlo 'sti susaṃvṛtaś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:6698: dharmaṃ virāgaṃ labhate viśuddhaṃ upanīya jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
SA11sanssr_pu:6699: durvācatāṃ vijahati sarvakālaṃ prajñābhāvaṃ ca jahāty aśeṣam /
SA11sanssr_pu:6700: viśālaprajño viharati cārikāyāṃ upanīya jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
SA11sanssr_pu:6701: lābhī ca bhotī śucibhojanānāṃ vastrān viśiṣṭān labhate suvarṇān /
SA11sanssr_pu:6706: na tasya rājāpi praduṣṭacittaḥ yo jīrṇapuṣpān apaneya caitye //
SA11sanssr_pu:6707: kumārga sarvaṃ pithita apāyabhūmiḥ sa śīlaskandhe sthita bodhisatvaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6708: avatārayitvā jinacetikebhyaḥ puṣpaṃ ca prāg anyanaraiḥ pradattaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6709: śokāṃś ca doṣān vijahāty amatto rogān aśeṣān vijahāty annekān /
SA11sanssr_pu:6710: āśvāsaprāptaś ca annantakalpān yo jīrṇapuṣpān apaneti caitye //
SA11sanssr_pu:6712: alaṃkṛto bhavati viśuddhakāyaḥ yo jīrṇapuṣpān apaneti caitye //
SA11sanssr_pu:6713: dadyāc ca yaḥ suruciradivya puṣpaṃ māndāravān apy atha pāṭalaṃ vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:6714: nirmālyakaṃ yo 'panayeta caitye vipāka śreṣṭho 'sya bhaved atulyaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6715: yaḥ prāñjaliḥ praṇamati nāthastūpaṃ chandaṃ janitvā ca sabuddhaloke /
SA11sanssr_pu:6716: so bhoti loke gurukṛtu satkṛtaś ca prāsādiko bhavati sudarśanīyaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6717: tasyeha rājyaṃ nipatati sarvaloko devāsurā nāgamanuṣyakāś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:6718: sarvāḥ sahasrāḥ kusumita lokadhātuḥ praśāsti rājño vaśa īśvarāṃś ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:6719: ye tasya rājye sthita bhonti satvāḥ sthāpeya sarvān akaluṣabuddhajñāne /
SA11sanssr_pu:6720: apāyabhūmyas tyaktā bhavanti karoti caiṣāṃ paramasuśreṣṭham artham //
SA11sanssr_pu:6721: paricāro 'sya bhavati manojñaghoṣaḥ puṇyair upetaḥ smṛtimatipūjanīyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6722: āśvāsaprāpto vicarati jīvaloke sadābhiprāyaṃ janayati śreṣṭhaprītiṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6723: paricāra bhoty asya svarāṅga śuddhaḥ jñāyeta satvair madhurapraśāntavākyo /
SA11sanssr_pu:6724: na tasya kaścij janayati ceśvaratvaṃ vilokanīyo bhavati mahājanasya /
SA11sanssr_pu:6726: ākruṣṭaḥ san nājanayeta roṣaṃ yaḥ prāñjaliḥ praṇamati buddhastūpaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6727: devendra bhoty upagatasvargaloke manuṣyako bhavati narasya rājā /
SA11sanssr_pu:6728: na pārihāṇir bhavati kadācid asya yo 'ñjalībhir namatīha stūpaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6729: nāsāv apāye prapateta jātu hīnāṃś ca varjeta sa kāma loke /
SA11sanssr_pu:6730: āḍhyo dhanī bhoti prabhūtakoṣo yo 'ñjalībhir namati buddhastūpam //
SA11sanssr_pu:6731: sūtrāntacaryā na kadācid asya nāsthānakopaṃ kurute nṛloke /
SA11sanssr_pu:6732: satvāś ca tṛptā muditāsya bhonti yaḥ saṃpramuñcī guṇavati ekavācaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6734: sa puṇyavān bhavati manuṣyaloke rākṣe ca sthitvā jina satkaroti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6735: śokā na doṣāḥ khilamala nāsya bhonti atulyatāptaś ca susaṃsthitāṅgaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6736: ālokanīyaś ca mahājanasya vrajeta kāmāna bhayakaravairaghorān / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6738: tiṣṭhatu tāvad ānanda yo māṃ saṃmukhaṃ satkuryāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:6739: tiṣṭhatu me śarīrasya pūjā sarṣapaphalamatreṣu dhātuṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:6740: tiṣṭhatu mām uddiśya kṛteṣu stūpeṣu satkāraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6741: ye kecid ānanda buddham ālambyāntaśa ekapuṣpam apy ākāśe kṣepsyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6742: tasya puṇyaskandhasya yo vipākaḥ saced yāvān annādiḥ saṃsāro yasya pūrvā koṭir na prajñāyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:6743: tāvataḥ kalpān saṃsaratāṃ teṣāṃ śakratvaṃ brahmatvaṃ cakravartitvaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6746: saced antaśaḥ svapnāntaragatā api satvā buddham ālambyākāśe ekapuṣpam api kṣepsyanti tad apy ahaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ nirvāṇaparyavasānaṃ vadāmīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6748: aṣṭābhir bhujagādhipate dharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisatvāḥ satatasamitaṃ buddhasamavadhānaṃ pratilabhante /
SA11sanssr_pu:6755: yatra ca buddhakṣetre tathāgataśravaṃ śṛṇvanti tatra praṇidhānam utpādayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6763: sudṛṣṭo lokapradyotaḥ sarvadharmagatiṃ gataḥ / puṇyatīrthaṃ trailokasya sarvasatvaviśodhanam //
SA11sanssr_pu:6764: mahat puṇyam ayaṃ kṣetraṃ muditaṃ jñānamaṇḍalaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6766: chedano duṣkhajālasya jñānaskandhaviśodhanaḥ / na durgatibhayaṃ teṣāṃ yair ihārāgito jinaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6767: vipulaṃ jāyate cittaṃ paśyatāṃ dvipadottamaṃ / prajñābalam asaṃkhyeyaṃ jāyate ca prabhāsvaraṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6771: pratikartuṃ kathaṃ śakyaṃ buddhānāṃ sarvedehibhiḥ / satvārtheṣv abhiyuktānāṃ kalpakoṭiśatair api //
SA11sanssr_pu:6772: kalpakoṭiṃ varaṃ paktuṃ tryapāye bhṛśadāruṇe / na tv evādarśanaṃ śāstuḥ sarvasarganivartinaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6773: yāvantaḥ sarvalokasminn apāyagatayaḥ pṛthak / varaṃ tatra ciraṃ vāso buddhānām aśrutir na ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:6774: kiṃ kāraṇam apāyeṣu nivāsaś ciram iṣyate / yatkāraṇaṃ jinendrasya darśanaṃ jñānavardhanam //
SA11sanssr_pu:6775: chidyante sarvaduṣkhāṇi dṛṣṭvā lokeśvaraṃ jinaṃ / saṃbhavaty avatāraś ca jñāne saṃbuddhagocare //
SA11sanssr_pu:6776: kṣapayaty āvṛtīḥ sarvā dṛṣṭvā buddhaṃ narottamam /
SA11sanssr_pu:6777: vardhayaty amitaṃ puṇyaṃ yena bodhir avāpyatae / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6778: tad evam asti puṇyavṛddhau buddhasamavadhānena prayojanaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6779: api ca pratimāmātradarśanam api tāvad aparimitaphalaṃ tathāgatānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6782: yaḥ kaścin mañjuśrīḥ kulaputraḥ kuladuhitā vā sarvalokadhāturajopamānāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ dine dine śatarasam āhāraṃ dadyāt divyāni ca vastrāṇi /
SA11sanssr_pu:6784: yaś cānyo mañjuśrīḥ kulaputraḥ kuladuhitā vā citrakarmalikhitaṃ vā pustakakarmakṛtaṃ vā buddhaṃ paśyed /
SA11sanssr_pu:6786: kaḥ punar vādo yo 'ñjalipragrahaṃ vā kuryāt puṣpaṃ vā dadyāt dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā dīpaṃ vā dadyād /
SA11sanssr_pu:6789: yas tathāgatacaityaṃ śodhayati sa catasro 'grāḥ praṇidhānaviśuddhīr anuprāpnoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6796: tathāgatacaityeṣu puṣpāvaropaṇaṃ gandhānulepanaṃ kṛtvāṣṭāv avikalatā anuprāpnoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6803: na śrutavikalo na prajñāvikalo na praṇidhānavikala iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6805: ye tribhavaparyāpannāḥ satvās te sarve pratyekaṃ tathāgatastūpān kārayeyur evaṃrūpān uccaistvena /
SA11sanssr_pu:6807: tāṃś ca gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān pratyekaṃ sarvasatkāraiḥ satkuryuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6809: ayaṃ tasmāt pūrvakāt puṇyaskandhād bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet //
SA11sanssr_pu:6811: ye khalu punas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve mahāyānasaṃprasthitā bhaveyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6812: sarve ca cakravartirājyasamanvāgatā bhaveyur ekaikaś ca rājā cakravartī mahāsamudrapramāṇadīpasthālīṃ kṛtvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:6813: sumerumātrāṃ vartīm ādīpya pratyekam evaṃrūpāṃ dīpapūjāṃ tathāgatacaityeṣu pravartayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:6814: yaś cābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisatvas tailaprakṣiptāṃ vartīṃ kṛtvādīpya tathāgatacaitye dhārayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:6815: asyās tailaprakṣiptāyā varter etat pūrvakaṃ pradīpadānaṃ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6816: yāvad upaniṣadam api na kṣamatae iti / peyālaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6817_0: ye ca khalu punas te rājānaś cakravartino buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ
SA11sanssr_pu:6817_1: satkuryuḥ yaś cābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisatvaḥ piṇḍapātraṃ caritvā pātraparyāpannaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:6818: idaṃ tato bahutaraṃ ca mahārghataraṃ ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:6819: yac ca te rājānaś cakravartinaḥ sumerumātraṃ cīvararāśiṃ buddhapramukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya dadyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6820: yac cābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisatvas tricīvaraṃ bahirdhā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāya buddhapramukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya vā tathāgatacaitye vā dadyād /
SA11sanssr_pu:6821: idaṃ bhikṣoś cīvaradānam etat pūrvakacīvararāśim abhibhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:6822: yac ca te rājānaḥ pratyekaṃ sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ puṣpasaṃstṛtaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatacaitye niryātayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:6823: yac cābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisatvaḥ antaśa ekapuṣpam api tathāgatacaitye āropayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:6824: asya dānasyaitat pūrvakaṃ dānaṃ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6827: catura imān bhadrānuśaṃsān paśyan bodhisatvas tathāgatapūjāyām utsuko bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:6829: agraś ca me dakṣiṇīyaḥ pūjito bhaviṣyati māṃ ca dṛṣṭvānye 'pi tathā śikṣiṣyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6830: tathāgataṃ ca pūjayitvā bodhicittaṃ dṛḍhaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:6831: dvātriṃśatāṃ ca mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānāṃ saṃmukhadarśanena kuśalamūlam upacitaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:6841: daśabhiḥ kulaputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisatvā annanuliptā garbhamalena jāyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:6851: tac ca nirāmiṣeṇa cittena na sāmiṣeṇa /
SA11sanssr_pu:6853: anena kuśalamūlena sarvasatvā nirupaliptā garbhamalena jāyantām iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6857: yaḥ prathamayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ tāṃś cittotpādān anumodate /
SA11sanssr_pu:6858: caratām api bodhisatvacaryāṃ tāṃś cittotpādān anumodate /
SA11sanssr_pu:6859: avinivartanīyām api avinivartanīyadharmatām anumodate bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6860: kiyantaṃ sa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati //
SA11sanssr_pu:6861: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat /
SA11sanssr_pu:6863: syāt khalu punaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasrasya lokadhātoḥ palāgreṇa tulyamānasasya pramāṇam udgrahītuṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6864: na tv eva kauśika bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya teṣām anumodanāsahagatānāṃ cittotpādānāṃ puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītuṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6865: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat /
SA11sanssr_pu:6867: ye bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhānām evam aprameyam anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyam iti na śṛṇvanti na jānanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6872: yaiḥ kauśika kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ceme cittotpādā anumoditā bodhisatvayānikair vā pratyekabuddhayānikair vā śrāvakayānikair vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:6873: te kṣipraṃ tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayiṣyanti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6875_0: evaṃ tair anumodanāsahagataiś cittotpādakuśalamūlair yatra yatropapatsyante tatra
SA11sanssr_pu:6875_1: tatra satkṛtāś ca bhaviṣyanti gurukṛtāś ca mānitāś ca pūjitāś ca arcitāś ca apacāyitāś ca bhaviṣyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6878: evaṃ na gandhān na rasān na spraṣṭavyān sprakṣyanti na ca teṣām apāyeṣūpapattiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā svargopapattis teṣāṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:6880_0: tathā hi taiḥ satvaiḥ sarvasatvasukhāvahanāni asaṃkhyeyānāṃ satvānāṃ kuśalamūlāny
SA11sanssr_pu:6880_1: anumoditāni yāvad annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyāprameyāsaṃkhyeyān satvān
SA11sanssr_pu:6882_0: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālikopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasatvās
SA11sanssr_pu:6882_1: te sarve 'nnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ pratitiṣṭheyur annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ pratiṣṭhāya
SA11sanssr_pu:6882_2: gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān upalambhasaṃjñinaś catvāri dhyānāni samāpadyeran /
SA11sanssr_pu:6883: yaś ca bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca parigṛhītātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6884_1: sarvam ekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣam anumodetāgrayānumodanayā
SA11sanssr_pu:6884_2: jyeṣṭhayā śreṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttarayā niruttarayā uttarottarayā
SA11sanssr_pu:6885_1: bodhisatvānāṃ caturdhyānamayaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti yāvad
SA11sanssr_pu:6887: athavāgrapariṇāmanayā pariṇāmitatvāt sarvapuṇyānām asya buddhatvāya satkṛtapraṇidhibuddhatvam eva syāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:6890: adhyeṣaṇāyās tv anuśaṃsā āryograparipṛcchāyām uktā dharmagrāhyatām upādāyāprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣv āyuḥ parirakṣaṇāyeti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6898: catvāra ime mahārāja dharmā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ viśeṣagāmitāyai saṃvartante 'parihāṇāya ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:6905: yena gauraveṇa subhāṣitaṃ śṛṇoti śuśrūṣate 'virahitaśrotraś ca dharmaṃ śṛṇoti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6907: yayā nirmānatayā āryāṇām abhinamati praṇamati namasyati //
SA11sanssr_pu:6909: yena vīryeṇa kāyalaghutāṃ cittalaghutāṃ ca pratilabhate sarvakāryāṇi cottārayati //
SA11sanssr_pu:6911: eṣāṃ śraddhādīnāṃ sadābhyāsaḥ kāryaḥ / athavānyeṣāṃ śraddhādīnāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6914: śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6920: yad yat karma kariṣyāmi tasya tasya karmaṇaḥ phalavipākaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyāmīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6921: sa jīvitahetor api pāpaṃ karma na karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6925: sarvadṛṣṭikṛtāni ca nānuśete sarvabuddhadharmān balavaiśāradyaprabhṛtīṃś ca śraddadhāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6926: śraddhāya ca vigatakathaṃkathas tān buddhadharmān samudānayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:6929: yān dharmān śraddhendriyeṇa śraddadhāti tān dharmān vīryendriyeṇa samudānayatīdam ucyate vīryendriyaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6931: yān dharmān vīryendriyeṇa samudānayati tān dharmān smṛtīndriyeṇa na vipraṇāśayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:6934: yān dharmān smṛtīndriyeṇa na vipraṇāśayati tān samādhīndriyeṇaikāgrīkarotīdam ucyate samādhīndriyaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6936: yān dharmān samādhīndriyeṇaikāgrīkaroti tān prajñendriyeṇa pratyavekṣate pratividhyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:6937: yad eteṣu dharmeṣu pratyātmajñānam aparapratyayajñānam idam ucyate prajñendriyaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6938: evam imāni pañcendriyāṇi sahitāny anuprabaddhāni sarvabuddhadharmān paripūrayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6943: yad ebhir evendriyair upastabdho 'nnavamardyo bhavati sarvamāraiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6955: yāvanti pūjā bahuvidha aprameyā yā kṣetrakoṭīn ayutabimbareṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:6956: tāṃ pūjakṛtvā puruṣavareṣu nityaṃ saṃkhyākalāpo na bhavati maitracitta / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6960: vandāmi te asamajñānaparā sadṛśo na te 'sti tribhave virajā //
SA11sanssr_pu:6961: mṛdu cāru snigdha śubha keśa nakhā girirājatulya tava coṣṇir iha /
SA11sanssr_pu:6962: noṣnīṣam īkṣitu tavāsti samo vibhrājate bhruvi tavorṇa mune //
SA11sanssr_pu:6964: kṛpayekṣase jagad idaṃ hi yayā vandāmi te vimalanetra jina //
SA11sanssr_pu:6965: jihvā prabhūta tanu tāmranibhā vadanaṃ ca chādayasi yena svakaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6966: dharmaṃ vadan vinayase ca jagat vandāmi te madhurasnigdhagirā //
SA11sanssr_pu:6967: daśanāḥ śubhāḥ sudṛḍha vajranibhāḥ triṃśaddaśāpy aviralāḥ sahitāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6968: kurvan smitaṃ vinayase ca jagat vandāmi te madhurasatyakathā //
SA11sanssr_pu:6969: rūpeṇa cāpratisamo 'si jinaḥ prabhayā ca bhāsayasi kṣetraśatān /
SA11sanssr_pu:6970: brahmendrapālajagato bhagavan jihmībhavanti tava te prabhayā //
SA11sanssr_pu:6972: īkṣan vrajasy api yugaṃ bhagavan saṃkampayan dharaṇiśailataṭān //
SA11sanssr_pu:6973: kāyaś ca lakṣaṇacito bhagavan sūkṣma chavī kanakavarṇanibhā /
SA11sanssr_pu:6974: nekṣañ jagad vrajati tṛptim idaṃ rūpaṃ tavāpratimarūpadhara //
SA11sanssr_pu:6977: tvaṃ dānaśīlanirataḥ satataṃ tvaṃ kṣāntivīryanirataḥ sudṛḍhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6979: tvaṃ vādisūra kugaṇapramathī tvaṃ siṃhavan nadasi parṣadi ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:6980: tvaṃ vaidyarāja trimalāntakaro vandāmi te paramaprītikara //
SA11sanssr_pu:6983: māyopamaṃ jagad imaṃ bhavatā naṭaraṅgasvapnasadṛśaṃ viditaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6984: nātmā na satva na ca jīvagatī dharmā marīcidakacandrasamāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6985: śūnyāś ca śānta annutpādanayaṃ avijānad eva jagad udbhramati /
SA11sanssr_pu:6987: rāgādibhiś ca bahurāgaśataiḥ saṃbhrāmitaṃ satata vīkṣya jagat /
SA11sanssr_pu:6990: satatāturaṃ jagad avekṣya mune parimocayan vicarase kṛpayā //
SA11sanssr_pu:6991: rathacakravad bhramati sarvajagat tiryakṣu pretaniraye sugatau /
SA11sanssr_pu:6992: mūḍhā adeśika anāthagatāḥ tasya pradarśayasi mārgavaraṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6993: ye te babhūvu purimāś ca jināḥ dharmeśvarā jagati cārthakarāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6994: ayam eva taiḥ prakathitāryapatho yad deśayasy api vibho 'pratimaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6995: snigdhaṃ hy akarkaśa manojña varaṃ brahmādhikaṃ paramaprītikaraṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6998: śrutvā hi yāṃ niyutasatvaśatāḥ yānatrayeṇa janayanti śamam //
SA11sanssr_pu:6999: tava pūjayā sukham annekavidham divyaṃ labhanti manujeṣu tathā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7000: āḍhyo mahādhana mahāvibhavo bhavate jagaddhitakaro nṛpatiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7001: balacakravarty api ca dvīpapatiḥ jagad āvṛṇoti daśabhiḥ kuśalaiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7002: ratnāni sapta labhate suśubhā tvayi saṃprasādajanako 'pratimaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7003: brahmāpi śakra api lokapatiḥ bhavate ca saṃtuṣiṭa devapatiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7004: paranirmito 'pi ca sa yāmapatiḥ tvatpūjayā bhavati cāpi jinaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7005: evaṃ hy amogha tava pūjā kṛtā saṃdarśanaṃ śravaṇam apy asamaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7006: bhavate jagad vividhaduḥkhaharaṃ spṛśate padaṃ ca paramaṃ virajaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7007: mārgajña mārgakuśalā bhagavan kupathān nivārayasi lokam imaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7008: kṣeme śive viraji āryapathe pratiṣṭhāpayasi jagad bhagavan //
SA11sanssr_pu:7009: puṇyārthikasya tava puṇyanidhe satatākṣayā bhavati puṇyakriyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7010: bahukalpakoṭiṣu na yāti kṣayaṃ yāvad dhi na spṛśati bodhi varāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7011: pariśuddhakṣetra labhate ruciraṃ parinirmitābha sada prītikaraṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7012: śuddhāś ca kāyavacasā manasā satvā bhavanty api ca kṣetravare //
SA11sanssr_pu:7013: ity evam ādiguṇa naikavidhān labhate jinārcanakṛtān manujaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7014: svargāpavarga manujeṣu sukhaṃ labhate ca puṇyanidhi sarvajage //
SA11sanssr_pu:7015: kīrtiyaśaś ca prasṛtaṃ vipulaṃ tava sarvadikṣu bahukṣetraśatān /
SA11sanssr_pu:7016: saṃkīrtayanti sugatāḥ satataṃ tava varṇamāla pariṣatsu jināḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7018: śāntendriyā śamaratā bhagavan vandāmi te naravarapravara //
SA11sanssr_pu:7019: labdhā abhijña jina pañca mayā gagane sthitena te niśamya giram /
SA11sanssr_pu:7020: bhavitāsmi vīra sugatapratimo vibhajiṣya dharmam amalaṃ jagataḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7022: puṇyaṃ yad arjitam idaṃ vipulaṃ jagad āpnuyād api ca buddhapadam /iti //
