SA11sanssr_pu:7024_2: saṃsāranirvāṇavimuktā yāvat satvānāṃ mātāpitṛkalpāḥ samānamaitracittāḥ / pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:7025_2: dharmapriyā dharmadharā dharmāhārā dharmabhiṣajo dharmeśvarā dharmasvāmino dharmadānapatayo
SA11sanssr_pu:7025_3: nityatyāgābhiratā nityāpramattā nityavivekābhiratāḥ sarvatra tīrthasetubhūtā mahārājamārgaprakhyā
SA11sanssr_pu:7027: evaṃ ca tān anusmṛtya tadguṇapariniṣpattyarthaṃ smṛtim upasthāpayatīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7031: yae ete buddhā bhagavanto 'nnantāparyantaguṇā ete dharmajā dharmapadā dharmanirmitā dharmādhipateyā dharmaprabhā dharmagocarā dharmapratiśaraṇā dharmaniṣpannāḥ / peyālaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7032: yāny api laukikāni lokottarāṇi ca sukhāni santi /
SA11sanssr_pu:7035: dharmagauraveṇa dharmapratiśaraṇena dharmaparāyaṇena dharmasāreṇa dharmānva ... dharmapratipannena /
SA11sanssr_pu:7038: samo hi dharmaḥ samaḥ satveṣu pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:7049: na dharma udāre pravartate hīneṣu na pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:7052: na dharmaḥ śuddheṣu pravartate kṣateṣu na pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:7053: utkarṣāpakarṣāpagato hi dharmas tathā mayā dharmasadṛśacittena bhavitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7054: na dharma āryeṣu pravartate pṛthagjaneṣu na pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:7057: na dharmo divā pravartate rātrau na pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:7058: rātryāṃ vā pravartate divā na pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:7064: na dharmasyonatvaṃ na pūrṇatvam aprameyāsaṃkhyeyo hi dharma ākāśavan na kṣīyate na vardhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:7081: evaṃ bodhisatvo dharmavad dharme smṛtim upasthāpayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7084: saṃgho hi dharmavādī dharmacaraṇo dharmacintako dharmakṣetraṃ dharmadharo dharmapratiśaraṇo dharmapūjako dharmakṛtyakārī dharmagocaro dharmacāritrasaṃpannaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7085: svabhāvarjukaḥ svabhāvaśuddhaḥ sānukrośo dharmānukāruṇikaḥ sadā vivekagocaraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7087: tatra bodhisatvasya saṃgham anusmarataḥ evaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7088: yae ete saṃghasya bhūtā guṇā ete mayātmanaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ ca niṣpādayitavyā iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7089: yathāryavimalakīrtinirdeśe bodhisatvaguṇā uktās tathā saṃghānusmṛtir bhāvyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7090: sarvasatvāna ye rūpā rutaghoṣāś ca īritāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7092: te jīrṇavyādhitā bhonti bodhisatvā mṛtam ātmāna darśayī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7094: kalpoddāhaṃ ca darśenti uddahitvā vasuṃdharām / nityasaṃjñina satvānām anityam iti darśayī //
SA11sanssr_pu:7095: satvaiḥ śatasahasrebhir ekarāṣṭre nimantritāḥ / sarveṣāṃ gṛha bhuñjanti sarvān nāmanti bodhaye //
SA11sanssr_pu:7096: ye kecin mantravidyā vā śilpasthānā bahuvidhāḥ / sarvatra pāramiprāptāḥ sarvasatvasukhāvahāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7097: yāvanto loka pāṣaṇḍāḥ sarvatra pravrajanti te / nānādṛṣṭigataṃ prāptāṃs te satvān paripācati //
SA11sanssr_pu:7098: candrā vā bhonti sūryā vā śakrabrahmaprajeśvarāḥ / bhavanti āpas tejaś ca pṛthivī mārutas tathā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7099: roga antarakalpeṣu bhaiṣajyaṃ bhonti uttamāḥ / yena te satva mucyante sukhī bhonti annāmayāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7100: durbhikṣāntarakalpeṣu bhavantī pānabhojanam /kṣudhāpipāsām apanīya dharmaṃ deśenti prāṇinām //
SA11sanssr_pu:7101: śastra antarakalpeṣu maitrīdhyāyī bhavanti te / avyāpāde niyojenti satvakoṭiśatān bahūn //
SA11sanssr_pu:7102: mahāsaṃgrāmamadhye ca samapakṣā bhavanti te / sandhisāmagri rocenti bodhisatvā mahābalāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7103: ye cāpi nirayāḥ kecid buddhakṣetreṣv acintiṣu / saṃcintya tatra gacchanti satvānāṃ hitakāraṇāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:7104: yāvantyā gatayaḥ kāścit tiryagyonau prakāśitāḥ / sarvatra dharmaṃ deśenti tena ucyanti nāyakāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7105: kāmabhogāṃś ca darśenti dhyānaṃ ca dhyāyināṃ tathā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7106: vidhvasta māraṃ kurvanti avatāraṃ na denti te //
SA11sanssr_pu:7107: agnimadhye yathā padmam abhūtaṃ taṃ vinirdiśet / evaṃ kāmāṃś ca dhyānaṃ ca abhūtaṃ te vidarśayī //
SA11sanssr_pu:7108: saṃcintya gaṇikāṃ bhonti puṃsām ākarṣaṇāya te / rāgāṅku saṃlobhya buddhajñāne sthāpayanti te //
SA11sanssr_pu:7109: grāmikāś ca sadā bhonti sārthavāhāḥ purohitāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7111: daridrāṇāṃ ca satvānāṃ nidhānā bhonti akṣayāḥ / teṣāṃ dānāni datvā ca bodhicittaṃ janenti te //
SA11sanssr_pu:7112: mānastabdheṣu satveṣu mahānagnā bhavanti te / sarvamānasam udghātaṃ bodhiṃ prārthenti uttamām //
SA11sanssr_pu:7113: bhayārditānāṃ satvānāṃ saṃtiṣṭhante 'grataḥ sadā / abhayaṃ teṣu datvā ca paripācenti bodhaye //
SA11sanssr_pu:7114: pañcābhijñāś ca te bhūtvā ṛṣayo brahmacāriṇaḥ / śīle satvān niyojenti kṣāntisauratyasaṃyame //
SA11sanssr_pu:7115: upasthānagurūn satvān paśyantīha viśāradāḥ / ceṭā bhavanti dāsā vā śiṣyatvam upayānti ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:7116: yena yenaiva cāṅgena satvo dharmarato bhavet / darśenti hi kriyāḥ sarvā mahopāyasuśikṣitāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7117: yeṣām annantā śikṣā hi annantaś cāpi gocaraḥ / annantajñānasaṃpannā annantaprāṇimocakāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7119: buddhair api vadadbhis tu guṇāntaḥ suvaco bhaved / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7121: raśmi pramuñciya mālyaviyūhā mālyavataṃsaka mālya vitānāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7124: cūrṇavicitravikīrṇa samantān te jinapūja karonti mahaātmā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7129: raśmi pramuñciya dhvajāgraviyūhā te dhvaja pāṇḍuralohitapītāḥ / nīlam anneka patāka vicitrā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7131: paṭṭa patāka pralambita dāmā kiṅkiṇijāla jinasvaraghoṣān //
SA11sanssr_pu:7132: chatra dharenti tathāgatamūrdhne te yatha ekajinasya karonti /
SA11sanssr_pu:7134: eṣa samādhi vikurva ṛṣīṇāṃ te jagasaṃgrahajñānavikurvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7147: yātuka dharmamukhāḥ pratiyantaḥ te tu samantavimokṣamukhena //
SA11sanssr_pu:7148: satva vinenti yathāśaya loke ye tu samantavimokṣamukhena /
SA11sanssr_pu:7149: satva vinenti yathāśaya loke teṣa nimitta na śakya grahītuṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7150: kenacid eṣa samādhivikurvāḥ tena tivyūhata [doubtful] agrasamādhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7152: cintiya darśayi sarva vinenti yatra durbhikṣa sudurlabha sarvaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7153: ye pariṣkāra sukhāvaha loke tatra ca sarvabhiprāyakriyābhiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7154: dātu dadanti karonti jagārthaṃ te varabhojanapānarasāgraiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7158: rūpa vidarśiya satva vinenti darśana prītipraharṣaratānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7160: rūpadhimukti jagad vinayanti te madhuraiḥ kalaviṅkarutebhī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7162: ye catur eva aśīti sahasrā yebhi jinā jagato 'rtha karonti /
SA11sanssr_pu:7163: tebhita dharmaprabhedamukhebhiḥ satva vinenti yathāśaya loke //
SA11sanssr_pu:7165: sarvakriyāsu sahāya bhavitvā satva vinenti sahāyamukhena //
SA11sanssr_pu:7167: tebhi sahāya sahantiya pīḍāṃ sarvajagasya hitāya sukhāya //
SA11sanssr_pu:7168: yatra na niṣkramaṇaṃ na ca dharmo jñāyati raṇyagato na ca mokṣaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7172: te daśa carya prabhāvayamānā ācari dharma mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7173: sarvam aśeṣata carya ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvayamāna karonti jagārthaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7175: tatra jarārdita vyādhinapṛṣṭā darśayi mṛtyuvaśaṃ avaśātmā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7177: prajvalitaṃ jaravyādhitamṛtyu loka nidarśayi satva vinenti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7179: buddhamahātma tu sūcayamānāḥ buddhaguṇebhi karonti jagārtham //
SA11sanssr_pu:7180: te ca adeśa ṛddhyanuśāstī rūpadhiṣṭhānabalena samantāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:7181: darśayamāna tathāgata ṛddhī ṛddhivikurvita satva vinenti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7182: te vividhehi upāyanayehi lokavicāri karonti jagārthaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7183: loki alipta jale yatha padmaṃ prītiprasādakarā vicaranti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7184: kāvyakarāḥ kavirāja bhavantī te naṭanartaka jhallakamallāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7186: grāmika nāyaka sārathi bhontī sārthika śreṣṭhika gṛhapati bhonti /
SA11sanssr_pu:7188: te aṭavīṣu mahādruma bhontī auṣadha akṣayaratnanidhānāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7189: cintamaṇi druma kāmadadāś ca deśika utpathamārgagatānāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7190: arcciya santu tu loka viditvā karmavidhīṣu ajānaka satvāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7193: vidyabalauṣadhi śāstravicitrāḥ sarva prabhāvita tebhi ṛṣībhiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7194: ye ṛṣiṇāṃ caraṇāḥ paramāgrā yatrādhimukta sadevaku lokaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7195: ye vrataduṣkara ye tapaśreṣṭhāḥ sarvi prabhāvita tebhi vidūbhiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7197: nagna acelaguruśramaṇānāṃ tīrthika ācaryā hi bhavanti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7198: te tu ajīvika dharmacarāṇāṃ uttarikāṇa annuttarikāṇāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7199: dīrghajaṭāna kumāravratānāṃ teṣv api ācaryā hi bhavanti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7201: cārika tīrthya daśa tritayānāṃ teṣv api ācaryā hi bhavanti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7203: mūlaphalāmbucarā api bhūtvā dharma acintiya te paramāgrāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7205: ye muṣaleśaya [doubtful] yuktivihārī teṣv api ācaryā hi bhavanti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7206: yāvata bāhirakāḥ pṛthutīrthyā āśaya teṣv adhimukti samīkṣya /
SA11sanssr_pu:7209: sūkṣmapadebhir upāyana yebhī satyaprakāśana teṣu karonti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7211: keṣu uja .. vyaktapadebhiḥ keṣucid eva rahasyapadebhiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7218: te yathasatya niruktividhijñā evam aśeṣata ye jinadharmā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7219: dharmam acintiya vākyapathajñā deśayi eṣa samādhivikurvā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7221: raśmim acintiyam utsṛjamānā raśmi pramuñciya satva vinenti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7222: raśmi pramuñciya darśayamānā yāvata satva vijānita raśmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:7223: teṣu sudarśana bhoti amogham hetu annuttari jñānavarasya //
SA11sanssr_pu:7224: darśayi buddha vidarśayi dharmaṃ saṃgha nidarśayi mārga narāṇām /
SA11sanssr_pu:7225: darśayi cetika te jinabimbā tena sudarśanaraśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7226: raśmi pramuñci prabhaṃkara nāmā yā prabha jihma karoti marūṇāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7227: sarvarajaṃ ca tamaṃ ca hanitvā so prabha bhāsati lokahitānāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7228: tāya prabhāsaya codita satvās te jinapūjapradīpa dharentī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7229: te jinapūjapradīpa dharitvā lokapradīpakarā jina bhonti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7230: tailapradīpa ghṛtasya pradīpā dāru tṛṇā naḍaveṇu pradīpān /
SA11sanssr_pu:7232: raśmi pramuñciya pratāraṇi nāmā tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7234: dūṣita saṃskṛta varṇita śāntī tena pratāraṇi raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7235: raśmi pipāsavinodani nāmā tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7240: kāma vivarṇita varṇitadhyānā tṛṣṇavinodani tena nivṛttā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7241: prītikarī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7242: prītiphuṭā varabodhinidānaṃ cinta janenti bhaviṣya svayaṃbhū //
SA11sanssr_pu:7244: bhāṣita buddhaguṇāḥ sada kālaṃ prītikarī prabha tena nivṛttā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7245: raśmi pramuñci ratiṃkara nāmā tāya prabhāsaya bodhita satvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7246: buddharatīrata dharmaratīrata saṃgharatīrata te sada bhonti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7248: labdhanupattikakṣānti labhanti codita smārita ye bahu satvā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7249: buddhānusmṛtidharmagaṇārye bodhi ya cittaguṇān vivaritvā / tena ratiṃkara raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7250: puṇyasamuccayaraśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7251: dānu dadanti vicitram annekaṃ prārthayamānu annuttaru bodhiṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7252: āśaya pūritu yācanakānāṃ yajña nirargaḍa tair yajamānaiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7253: sarvabhiprāyata dānu daditvā puṇyasamuccaya raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7254: jñānavatī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7255: eka tu dharma mukhātu annekā dharmamukhān avabuddhi kṣaṇena //
SA11sanssr_pu:7256: dharmaprabheda ... grāhita satvān arthaviniścaya jñāna vibhaktī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7257: dharmapadārthavibhāṣaṇa kṛtvā jñānavatī prabha tena nivṛttā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7258: prajñapradīpaya osari raśmi tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7259: śūnya nisatva ajātavipannān otari dharma abhāvasvabhāvān /
SA11sanssr_pu:7261: dharma asvāmika śūnya nirīhān bhāṣati prajñapradīpa nivṛttā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7262: dharmavikurvaṇi raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7264: dharmadharāṇu parigrahu kṛtvā dhārmikarakṣa karitva ṛṣīṇāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7265: dharma anugraha kṛtva jagasya dharmavikurvaṇi raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7266: tyāgavatī yada raśmi vimuñcī tāya ya matsara codita satvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7267: jñātvā anitya aśāśvatabhogān tyāgaratīrata te sada bhonti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7268: matsaradurdama satva adāntā jñātva dhanaṃ supinābhrasvabhāvaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7269: bṛṃhita tyāga prasannam anena tyāgavatīprabha tena nivṛttā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7270: niṣparidāha ya osari raśmiḥ tāya duḥśīlaya codita satvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7271: śīlaviśuddhi pratiṣṭhita bhūtvā cinta janenti bhaveya svayaṃbhūḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7272: karmapathe kuśale pariśuddhe śīla samādayi yad bahusatvān /
SA11sanssr_pu:7273: bodhayi citta samādayanena raśmi nivṛtta sa niṣparidāhaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7274: kṣāntiviyūha ya osari raśmi tāya ya akṣama codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7275: krodhakhilaṃ adhimāna jahitvā kṣāntiratīrata te sada bhonti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7276: duḥkṛta kṣānti apāyamatīnāṃ citta akṣobhita bodhinidānaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7277: varṇita kṣāntiguṇāḥ sadakālaṃ tena nivṛtta sa kṣāntiviyūhā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7278: raśmi uttaptavatī yada muñcī tāya kuśīdaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7279: yukta prayukta triṣū rataneṣu pūja karonti akhinnaprayogāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7280: yukta prayukta triṣū rataneṣu pūja karitva akhinnaprayogāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7281: te catu mārapathā atikrāntāḥ kṣipra spṛśanti annuttara bodhiṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7282: vīrya samādayi yad bahusatvān pūja karitva triṣū rataneṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:7283: dharma dharitva kṣayaṃgata kāle tena utaptavatī prabha labdhā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7284: śāntikarī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya vibhrāntaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7285: teṣu na rāgu na dveṣa na mohāḥ bodhita bhonti samāhita cittāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7286: pāpa kumitra kiliṣṭa carīye saṃgaṇikāvinivartana kṛtvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7287: varṇita dhyāna praśānta araṇye śāntikarī prabha tena nivṛttā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7288: prajñaviyūha ya osari raśmī tāya duḥprajña saṃcodita satvāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7289: satyapratītya vimokṣanaye asmin nidriya jñānagatiṃ gata bhonti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7290: indriyajñānagatiṃ gata bhūtvā ... / sūryapradīpasamādhi labhitvā prajñaprabhāsakarā jina bhonti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7291: rājyadhanātmapriyaiḥ parityāgaiḥ dharma ya mārgita bodhinidānaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7292: taṃ ca satkṛtya prakāśiya dharmaṃ raśmi nivṛtta sa prajñaviyūhāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7293: buddhavatī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāya saṃcodita satvāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7294: buddha sahasra anneka acintyān paśyiṣu padmavaneṣu niṣaṇṇān //
SA11sanssr_pu:7296: buddhabalāviprabhāvana kṛtvā buddhavatī prabha tena nivṛttā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7297: te 'bhayaṃdada raśmi pramuñcī tāyābhayārdita satva saspṛṣṭāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7299: ye abhayena nimantrita satvāḥ prāṇibadhāt tu nivārita bhonti /
SA11sanssr_pu:7300: trāyita yaccharaṇāgata bhītās tena bhayaṃdada raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7301: sarvasukhāvaha osari raśmī tāya gilānaya ātura spṛṣṭāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7303: rogavinodani mūla phaloṣadha ratna rasāyana gandhanulepān /
SA11sanssr_pu:7304: phāṇita kṣīra madhū ghṛta telān bhojana pāna daditvaya labdhā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7305: buddhanidarśani raśmi pramuñcī tāya sacodita āyu kṣayānte /
SA11sanssr_pu:7306: buddha anusmari paśyiṣu buddham te cyuta gacchi sabuddhakkṣetraṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7307: kāla karonti ca smārita buddhā darśitaprītakarā jinabimbān /
SA11sanssr_pu:7308: buddhagatāḥ śaraṇaṃ maraṇānte bhāsiya buddhanidarśani labdhā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7309: dharmaprabhāvani raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāya saṃcodita satvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7310: dharma paṭhanti śṛṇvanti likhantī dharmaratī rata te sada bhonti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7312: chanda janitva prayujyatha dharme bhāṣata dharmaprabhāvani labdhā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7313: ghoṣavatī yada raśmi pramuñcī buddhasutā paricodanatāyāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7314: yātuka śabdapracāru triloke sarva tathāgataghoṣa śṛṇvanti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7317: te 'mṛtaṃdada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7318: sarva pramāda ciraṃ prajahitvā sarvaguṇaiḥ pratipadyati yogaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7319: duṣkha anneka upadravapūrṇaṃ bhāṣita saṃskṛta nityam akṣemaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7320: śāntinirodhasukhaṃ sada kṣemaṃ bhāṣayatā amṛtaṃdada labdhā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7321: raśmi viśeṣavatī yada muñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7323: śīlata agra samādhita agro prajñata agra mahāmunirājā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7324: ya stuta varṇita bodhinidānaṃ tena viśeṣavatī prabha labdhā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7325: ratnaviyūha ya osari raśmi tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7326: akṣara ratnanidhāna labhitvā pūjayi ratnavarebhi maharṣīn //
SA11sanssr_pu:7327: ratnavisarga jine jinastūpe saṃgrahi kṛtsnajanaṃ ratanebhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7328: ratnapradāna karitva jinānāṃ raśmi nivṛtta ya ratnaviyūhāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7329: gandhaprabhāsa ya osari raśmī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7330: ghrātvā amānuṣa gandha manojñān buddhaguṇe niyutāni bhavanti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7337: raśmi prasādakarī yada muñcī pāṇitalopama saṃsthihi bhūmiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7338: śodhayato ṛṣi āśramastūpān tena prasādakarī prabha labdhā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7339: muñcati meghavatī yada raśmiṃ saṃsthihi gandha pravarṣati meghaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7341: bhūṣaṇavyūha pramuñcatu raśmīn nagna acela subhūṣaṇa bhontī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7343: raśmi rasāgravatī yada muñcī bhukṣita bhojya rasāgra labhantī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7344: bhojana pāna vicitra rasāgrān datva rasāgravatī prabha labdhā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7345: arthanidarśani muñcati raśmīn ratnanidhāna labhanti daridrāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7346: akṣayaratnanidhiṃ tribhi ratnair dānata arthanidarśani labdhā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7347: cakṣuviśodhani muñcati raśmīn andha tadā dṛśi rūpa vicitram /
SA11sanssr_pu:7348: dīpapradāna jine jinastūpe cakṣuviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7349: śrotraviśodhani muñcati raśmīn śrotravihīna śruṇī pṛthuśabdān /
SA11sanssr_pu:7351: ghrāṇaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn ghrāyi aghrāyitapūrva sugandhān /
SA11sanssr_pu:7352: gandhapradāna jine jinastūpe ghrāṇaviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7353: jihvaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn snigdhamanojñarutai stuti buddhān /
SA11sanssr_pu:7354: vāca durukta vivarjita rukṣā ślakṣṇa udīrita raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7355: kāyaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn indriyahīna svindriya bhonti /
SA11sanssr_pu:7356: kāyapraṇāma jine jinastūpe kurvata kāyaviśodhani labdhvā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7357: cittaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn unmatu sarva sacita bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:7358: citta samādhivaśānuga kṛtvā cittaviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7359: rūpaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn paśyiya cintiya rūpanarendrān /
SA11sanssr_pu:7361: śabdaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn śabda aśabdata śūnya vijānī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7362: pratyaya jāta pratiśrutatulyaṃ śabdaprakāśana raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7363: gandhaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn sarva dugandha sugandha bhavantī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7364: gandhavarāgra janair jinastūpān snāpanabodhidruma prabha eṣā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7365: te rasaśodhani muñcati raśmīn sadviṣa nirviṣa bhonti rasāgrāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7367: sparśaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn kakkhaṭa sparśa mṛdū sukha bhontī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7368: śaktitriśūlāsi [doubtful] tomaravarṣā mālya mṛdū padumotpala bhontī //
SA11sanssr_pu:7369: duṣya anneka mṛdū sukhasparśā saṃstari mārgi vrajanti jinānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7371: dharmaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn sarvata romata cintiya dharmān /
SA11sanssr_pu:7373: pratyaya jāta ajāta svabhāvā dharmaśarīra ajātaśarīrāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7374: dharmata nityasthitā gaganasthā sūcata dharmaviśodhani labdhā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7375: raśmi sukhāpramukhā iti kṛtvā ekatu romamukhāt tu ṛṣīṇāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7377: te yatha ekata romamukhāto osari gaṅgarajopama raśmī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7378: evam aśeṣata sarvatu romā deśa samādhivikurva ṛṣīṇāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7379: yena guṇena ya raśmi nivṛttā tasmi guṇeṣu sahāyaka pūrve /
SA11sanssr_pu:7380: teṣu tam eva pramuñcati raśmiṃ jñānavikurvaṇa eṣa ṛṣīṇāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7381: teṣa ya puṇya sahāyaka pūrve yair anumodita yācita yebhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7382: yebhi ca dṛṣṭa śubhopacitaṃ vā te ima raśmi prajānati teṣāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7383: ye ca śubhopacitāḥ kṛtapuṇyāḥ pūjita yebhi punaḥ punaḥ buddhāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7384: arthika chandika buddhaguṇebhiḥ codana teṣa karotiya raśmiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7385: sūrya yathā jātyandha na paśyī no ca sa nāsti udeti sa loke /
SA11sanssr_pu:7386: cakṣusameta udāgamu jñātvā sarva prayujya svaka svaka dharme //
SA11sanssr_pu:7387: evata raśmi mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ asti ca te itare ca na paśyī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7388: mithyahatā adhimuktivihīnāḥ durlabha te ca udāramatīnāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7389: ābharaṇāni nipāna vimānāḥ ratna rasāyana gandhanulepāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7390: te pi tu asti mahātmajanasya te ca sudurlabha kṛcchragatānāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7391: evata raśmi mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ asti ca te itare ca na paśyī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7392: mithyahatā adhimuktivihīnāḥ durlabha te ca udāramatīnāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7393: yasy imu [doubtful] raśmiprabheda śruṇitvā bheṣyanti śraddadhimukti [doubtful] prasādaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7394: tena na kāṅkṣa na saṃśaya kāryo nāṅga na bheṣyi mahāguṇaketuḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7399: te daśakṣetrarajopama anye padmam adhiṣṭhihi saṃparivāraṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7400: sarva parīvṛta buddhasutebhī ye ca samādhyasamādhivihārī //
SA11sanssr_pu:7401: ye paripācita tena ṛṣīṇāṃ satva niṣpadita buddhaguṇeṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:7402: te parivāri ataṃ mahapadmaṃ sarva udikṣiṣu prāñjalibhūtāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7403: te ca samāhita bālaśarīre vyutthihi yauvanavegasthitebhyaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7404: yauvanavegasthiteṣu samāhita vyutthihi jīrṇaka vṛddha śarīrāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7410: pratyaya buddha śarīri samāhita vyutthihi buddhavarāgraśarīrā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7416: ekatu romamukhasmi samāhita vyutthihi sarvata romamukheṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:7417: sarviṣu romamukheṣu samāhita vyutthihi ekatu vālapathātaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7418: ekatu vālapathasmi samāhita vyutthihi sarvata vālapathebhyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7419: sarviṣu vālapatheṣu samāhita vyutthihi te paramāṇurajātaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7420: ekarajasmi samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi sarvarajebhya aśeṣam /
SA11sanssr_pu:7423: vṛkṣaphaleṣu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi raśmimukhebhi jinānāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7427: vāyupathe tu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi bhūmitalānu mahātmā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7428: bhūmitale tu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi sarvatu devavimānāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:7429: sarvi tu devabalāna samāhita vyutthihi te gaganānusmṛtīmān //
SA11sanssr_pu:7430: eti samādhi vimokṣa acintyās teṣa acintyaguṇopacitānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7431: kalpa acintya prabhāṣiyamāṇāḥ sarvajinebhi na śakya kṣayītum //
SA11sanssr_pu:7432: sarvajinebhi ca bhāṣita ete karmavipāku jagasya acintyo /
SA11sanssr_pu:7433: nāgavikurvita buddhavikurvā dhyāyina dhyāna acintya vikurvā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7434: te ca vaśe sthita aṣṭa vimokṣāḥ śrāvaka eka bhavībahu bhontī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7435: bhūtva bahuḥ puna eka bhavitvā dhyāyati prajvalate gaganasmin //
SA11sanssr_pu:7436: te hi mahākaruṇāya vihīnā bodhi annarthiku loka upekṣī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7437: darśayi kāyavikurva acintyā kasya na darśayi loka hitaiṣī //
SA11sanssr_pu:7438: candra sa sūrya nabhe vicarantau darśayi sarvadiśi pratibhāsaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7440: evam acintiya darśiyi rūpaṃ sarvadaśaddiśi te naravīrāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7442: sāgaradeva rutāvatināmā yāvat satva samudry utpannā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7443: teṣu svarāṅgaruteṣu vidhijñā toṣayi sarvarutān svarutena //
SA11sanssr_pu:7444: sā hi sarāga sadoṣa rutāvati sarvarute pratighoṣa vidhijñā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7445: dhāraṇidharmabalaṃ vaśiprāptā kaḥ sa na toṣi sadevakalokam //
SA11sanssr_pu:7446: māyakaro yatha vidyavidhijño darśayi rūpa vicitra annantān /
SA11sanssr_pu:7448: māyakaro hi sarāgu sadoṣo toṣayi māyavikurvita lokaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7449: dhyāna abhijña vimokṣasuśikṣita kasya na toṣayi caryavidhijñaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7450: rāhu yatheṣa ya nirmaṇi kāyaṃ kurvati vajra pade talabandhaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7451: darśana sāgaru nābhipramāṇaṃ bhoti sumerutale sama śīrṣaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7452: so 'pi sarāgu sadoṣa samoho rāhu nidarśayi īdṛśa ṛddhī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7453: mārapramardana lokapradīpa kasya na darśayi ṛddhi annantā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7455: yātuka bimbarannekasurāṇāṃ tātuka nirmaṇi śakru svakāyān //
SA11sanssr_pu:7456: sarvasurendrasurāś ca vijānī śakrama ... purato gata svāyum /
SA11sanssr_pu:7457: eṣa gṛhyeta vajradharāṇāṃ saṃbhramu gacchisu sarvasurendrāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7458: netra sahasra bhayaṅkara darśī jvālapramuñcana vajra gṛhītaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7459: varmita kāya durāsada teja śakram udīkṣya palātv asurendrāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7460: so hita itvarapuṇyabalenā śakra vikurvati devajayārthī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7461: sarvajagasya aśeṣata trāṇāṃ akṣayapuṇya kuto na vikurvī //
SA11sanssr_pu:7462: ... vāyuta saṃbhuta meghapravarṣī vāyuta megha punaḥ prasamentī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7463: vāyuta sasya virohati loke vāyu sukhāvaha sarvajagasya //
SA11sanssr_pu:7464: so hi aśikṣita pāramitāsu buddhaguṇeṣu aśikṣita vāyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7465: darśayi lokavipāka acintyā kasya na darśayi te varalabdhā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7469: anyo 'pi puṇyavṛddhaye hetuḥ kāryaḥ / yo 'yaṃ sarvāvasthāsu satvārthaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7471: sa tathāgatacaitye vā tathāgatavigrahe vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā dadat sarvasatvānāṃ dauḥśīlyadaurgandhyamalāpanayanāya tathāgataśīlapratilambhāya ca pariṇāmayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7474: sa puṣpacchatram āropayan sarvasatvānāṃ sarvakleśaparidāhavigamāya pariṇāmayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7475: sa vihāraṃ praviśann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7479: sa labhanadvāram udghāṭayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7485: sa dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7487: sa tato vyuttiṣṭhann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7489: sa śarīragatyā gacchann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7493: sa śaucaṃ kurvann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7495: sa hastau prakṣālayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7497: sa pādau prakṣālayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati sarvasatvānām annekaprakārāṇi kleśarajāṃsy apanayeyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7500: sa dantakāṣṭhaṃ bhakṣayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7506: punar aparaṃ śāriputra vyāḍakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nottrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyam na saṃtrāsam āpattavyam /
SA11sanssr_pu:7508: tathā hi tena sarvaṃ parityaktaṃ sarvasatvānām arthāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:7510: sacen māṃ vyāḍā bhakṣayeyus tebhya eva tad dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu /
SA11sanssr_pu:7513: tathā ca kariṣyāmi yathā me 'nnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisambuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre tiryagyonigatāḥ satvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante //
SA11sanssr_pu:7514: corakāntāramadhyagatena śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nottrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7516: sarvasvaparityāgakuśalā hi te bodhisatvā mahāsatvā utsṛṣṭakāyenāpi ca bodhisatvena bhavitavyaṃ parityaktapariṣkāropakaraṇena ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:7518: te cen me satvāḥ pariṣkāropakaraṇāni haranti tebhya evaitad dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu /
SA11sanssr_pu:7519: sacen māṃ kecij jīvitād vyaparopayeyuḥ tatra mayā na dveṣo na krodha utpādayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7520: teṣām api mayā na kāyena na vacasā na manasāparāddhavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7521: evaṃ ca me tasmin samaye dānapāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca paripūriṃ gamiṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7522: annuttarā ca me samyaksaṃbodhir abhyāsannā bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7523: tathā ca kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye yathā me 'nnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre /
SA11sanssr_pu:7524: ete cānye ca doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante //
SA11sanssr_pu:7525: pānīyakāntāramadhyagatena śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nottrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7532: api tu khalu punaḥ satvānām antike mahākaruṇācittam utpādayiṣyāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:7533: aho vatālpapuṇyā amī satvā yad eteṣāṃ loke evaṃrūpāṇi pānīyakāntārāṇi prajñāyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:7534_0: tathā punar ahaṃ kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye yathā me 'nnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
SA11sanssr_pu:7534_1: abhisaṃbuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ pānīyakāntārāṇi na prajñāsyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:7535: tathā ca sarvasatvān puṇyaiḥ saṃyojayiṣyāmi yathāṣṭāṅgopetapānīyalābhino bhaviṣyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:7536: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārapsye sarvasatvānāṃ kṛtaśo yathā vīryapāramitā tasmin samaye paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7537: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bubhukṣākāntāramadhyagatena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nottrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7539_0: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārapsye tathā ca svaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyāmi yathā me
SA11sanssr_pu:7539_1: 'nnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:7539_2: sarvathā sarvaṃ evaṃrūpāṇi bubhukṣākāntārāṇi na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:7540: sukhitā eva te satvā bhaviṣyanti sukhasamaṅginaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7541: sarvasukhasamarpitās tathā ca kariṣyāmi yathā teṣāṃ satvānāṃ yo ya evābhiprāyo bhaviṣyati yad yad evākāṅkṣiṣyanti manasā tat tad eva prādurbhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7542: tad yathāpi nāma devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ manasā sarvaṃ prādurbhavati manasā sarvam utpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:7543: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārapsye yathā teṣāṃ satvānāṃ dhārmikā abhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:7544: avaikalyaṃ ca jīvitapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasatvānāṃ bhaviṣyati sarveṣāṃ sarvataḥ sarvadeti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7547: kiṃ ca / ... dharmadānaṃ nirāmiṣaṃ / puṇyavṛddhinimittaṃ bhavati //
SA11sanssr_pu:7553: smṛtimāṃś ca bhavati matimāṃś ca bhavati buddhimāṃś ca bhavati gatimāṃś ca bhavati dhṛtimāṃś ca bhavati prajñāvāṃś ca bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7569: sacet tvam ānanda śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ śrāvakabhūmau dharmaṃ deśeyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7570: tasyāṃ ca dharmadeśanāyāṃ ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve 'rhatvaṃ sākṣāt kuryus tad adyāpi tvayā me śrāvakeṇa śrāvakakṛtyaṃ na kṛtaṃ syāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:7571: sacet punaḥ tvam ānanda bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyaikam api prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ padaṃ deśayeḥ prakāśayer evam ahaṃ tvayā śrāvakeṇārādhitaḥ syāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7572_0: tayā ca pūrvikayā dharmadeśanayā ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve
SA11sanssr_pu:7572_1: 'rhatvaṃ prāpnuyus teṣāṃ cārhatāṃ yad dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu śīlamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu
SA11sanssr_pu:7573: tat kiṃ manyase ānandāpi tu sa bahu puṇyaskandhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7577: ataḥ sa ānanda śrāvakayānikapudgalo bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati yo bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7578: ato 'py ānanda bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati yo bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'parasya bodhisatvasya prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7585: idam ānanda tasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dharmadānaṃ sarvaśrāvakayānikānām api sarvapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānāṃ kuśalamūlam abhibhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7587: evaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ samanvāharann asthānam ānandānnavakāśo yat sa bodhisatvo mahāsatvo vivartetānnuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7591: kālena co cintayamānu paṇḍitaḥ praviśya layanaṃ tatha ghaṭṭayitvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7592: vipaśya dharmaṃ imi sarva yoniśo utthāya deśeta alīnacittaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7593: sukhasthito bhoti sadā vicakṣaṇo sukhaṃ niṣaṇṇas tatha dharma bhāsate /
SA11sanssr_pu:7594: udāraprajñapta karitva āsanaṃ caukṣe manojñe pṛthivīpradeśe //
SA11sanssr_pu:7595: caukṣaṃ ca so cīvara prāvaritvā suraktaraṅgaṃ ca prasannaraṅgaiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7596: āsevakaṃ kṛṣṇa tathā daditvā mahāpramāṇaṃ ca nivāsayitvā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7598: sudhautapādaś ca upāruhitvā snigdhena śīrṣeṇa mukhena cāpi //
SA11sanssr_pu:7599: dharmāsane tatra niṣīdiyānaḥ ekāgra satveṣu samaṃ vipaśyan /
SA11sanssr_pu:7600: upasaṃharec citrakathā bahūś ca bhikṣūnaś co bhikṣunikās tathaiva //
SA11sanssr_pu:7601: kilāsitāś cāpi vivarjayīta na cāpi utpādayi khedasaṃjñāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7602: aratiṃ ca sarvāṃ vijahīta paṇḍitaḥ maitrībalaṃ parṣadi bhāvayec ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:7603: bhāṣec ca rātriṃdivam agradharmān dṛṣṭāntakoṭīniyutaiḥ sa paṇḍitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7604: saṃharṣayet tāṃ ca tathaiva toṣayet na cāpi kiñcit tatra jātu prārthayet //
SA11sanssr_pu:7605: khādyaṃ ca bhojyaṃ ca tathānnapānaṃ vastrāṇi śayyāsanacīvarāṇi /
SA11sanssr_pu:7606: gilānabhaiṣajya na cintayet saḥ na vijñapet parṣadi kiñcid anyat //
SA11sanssr_pu:7607: anyatra cinteya sadā vicakṣaṇaḥ bhaveya buddho 'ham ime ca satvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7608: etac ca me sarvasukhopadhānaṃ yaṃ dharma śrāvemi hitāya loke //
SA11sanssr_pu:7610: na kasyacid antaśo dharmapremṇāpy adhikataram anugrahaṃ karoti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7612: adhyeṣayeyur yadi tvāṃ te dharmadānasya kāraṇāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:7614: evaṃ tvaṃ vāca bhāṣeyā yuṣme vā vijñapaṇḍitāḥ / kathaṃ mahātmanāṃ śakyaṃ purato bhāṣituṃ mayā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7615: sahasaiṣāṃ na jalpeta tulayitvā tu bhājanaṃ / yadi bhājanaṃ vijānīyāḥ annadhīṣṭo 'pi deśayeḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7616: yadi duḥśīlān paśyesi pariṣāyāṃ bahūn sthitān /
SA11sanssr_pu:7617: saṃlekhaṃ mā prabhāṣe tvaṃ varṇaṃ dānasya kīrtayeḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7618: bhaveyur yadi cālpecchāḥ śuddhāḥ śīle pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7619: maitraṃ cittaṃ janitvā tvaṃ kuryāḥ saṃlekhikīṃ kathām //
SA11sanssr_pu:7621: labdhapakṣas tadā bhūtvā varṇaṃ śīlasya kīrtayeḥ / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7647: imāni sāgaramate mantrapadāni dharmabhāṇakena supravṛttāni kṛtvā dharmāsanakena supravṛttāni kṛtvā dharmāsananiṣaṇṇena sarvāṃ parṣadaṃ bodhyākārābhinirhṛtayā maitryā spharitvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7648_0: ātmani vaidyasaṃjñām utpādya dharme bhaiṣajyasaṃjñāṃ dharmaśravaṇikeṣv āturasaṃjñāṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:7648_1: tathāgate satpuruṣasaṃjñāṃ dharmanetryāṃ cirasthitikasaṃjñām utpādyemāni mantrapadāny
SA11sanssr_pu:7649: tasya samantād yo janaśate na māro na mārakāyikā vā devatā upasaṃkramayiṣyanti vicakṣuḥkaraṇe /
SA11sanssr_pu:7650: ye 'py enam upasaṃkramiṣyanti te 'py asya na śakṣyanty antarāyaṃ kartum iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7651: atraivāha / dharmabhāṇakena caukṣeṇa śucisamudācāreṇa susnātena śucinivāsitena bhavitavyam iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7655: tad yathāpi nāma mañjuśrīr nānāgandhavṛkṣāś ca caturdhātusaṃgṛhītā vivardhante /
SA11sanssr_pu:7656: evam eva mañjuśrīr nānāsaṃbhāropacitaṃ bodhisatvasya kuśalamūlaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7658: eṣādikā ādikarmikāṇāṃ sahasā bodhisatvaśikṣā smaraṇārtham upadarśitā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7663: tatrānnutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām annutpādāyaiva chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchati vīryam ārabhate cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti samyakpraṇidadhātīty anena rakṣā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7664: utpannānāṃ ca prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayatīty anena śuddhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7665: annutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādāya chandaṃ janayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7666: yāvad utpannānāṃ ca sthitaye bhūyobhāvāya chandaṃ janayatīty ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:7668: etāni ca nityam apramādādhiṣṭhitāni kāryāṇi sarvakuśalamūlānāṃ tanmūlatvāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:7670: yāvanta dharmāḥ kuśalāḥ prakīrtitāḥ śīlaśrutaṃ tyāgu tathaiva kṣāntiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7671: sarveṣu mūlaṃ hy ayam apramādo nidhānalambhaḥ sugatena deśita / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7674: tad yathā tīvrakopaprasādasya rājño bhaiṣajyatailaparipūrṇabhājanaṃ gṛhītvā picchilasaṃkrameṇa bhṛtyasya gacchataḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7678: sa cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7680: evaṃ yāvan manasā dharmān vijñāya na nimittagrāhī bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7682: sarvadharmeṣv āsvādaṃ cādīnavaṃ ca niḥśaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:7684: punar aparam apramādo yat svacittasya damanaṃ paracittasyārakṣā kleśarater aparikarmaṇā dharmarater anuvartanaṃ yāvad ayam ucyate 'pramādaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7685: yasya guhyakādhipate śraddhā cāpramādaś ca tasyānulomikena vīryeṇa kāryaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7686: yena tān apramādakāraṇān śraddhākāraṇāṃś ca dharmān samudānayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7687: yasya guhyakādhipate śraddhā cāpramādaś ca vīryaṃ ca tena smṛtisaṃprajanye yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7688: yena smṛtisaṃprajanyena sarvān bodhipakṣān dharmān na vipraṇāśayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7689: yasya guhyakādhipate śraddhā cāpramādaś ca vīryaṃ ca smṛtisaṃprajanyaṃ ca tena yoniśaḥ prayoge yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7690: yoniśaḥ prayukto hi guhyakādhipate bodhisatvo yad asti tad astīti prajānāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:7692: yāvad asti saṃvṛtyā cakṣur ity ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:7694: sadāpramādo hy amṛtasya mūlaṃ satvārthayuktasya ca bodhicittaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7695: yad yoniśaś caiva vivekacittam aparigrahaḥ sarvasukhasya mūlam iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7699: tatkūlaṃ na svataḥ pāraṃ kim apekṣyāstv apāratā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7700: ātmatvaṃ na svataḥ siddhaṃ kim apekṣya paro bhavet //
SA11sanssr_pu:7701: tadduṣkhena na me bādhety ato yadi na rakṣasi / nāgāmikāyaduṣkhāt te bādhā tat kena rakṣasi //
SA11sanssr_pu:7702: aham eva tadāpīti mithyeyaṃ parikalpanā / anya eva mṛto yasmād anyas tatra prajāyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:7703: anyaś cej jāyate tatra kiṃ puṇyena prayojanaṃ / yūnaḥ kiṃ vṛddhakāyasya sukhāya dhanasaṃcayaiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7704: mṛte garbhagate tāvad anyo bālaḥ prajāyate / mṛte bālye kumāratvaṃ tannāśāyāgato yuvā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7705: tannāśāc cāgato vṛddhaḥ / ekaḥ kāyaḥ kathaṃ mataḥ / evaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ cānyaḥ kāyaḥ keśanakhādivat //
SA11sanssr_pu:7708: kāyaś cet pratimākāraḥ pesībhasmasu nāsti saḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7709: sūkṣmabhāvena cet tatra sthaulyaṃ tyaktvā vyavasthitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7712: tatra cintaiva me nāsti dṛśyakāyas tu nāśavān / avasthābhiś ca saṃbandhaḥ saṃvṛtyā caiva dṛśyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:7713: āgamāc ca tad astitvaṃ yuktyāgamanivāritam / na guṇavyatirekeṇa pradhānaṃ vidyate yataḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7714: na ca trīṇi pradhānāni tathā sattā guṇā api /
SA11sanssr_pu:7715: pratyekaṃ tryātmakās te 'pi śeṣaṃ naikavidhaṃ jagat //
SA11sanssr_pu:7717: sukhāder na paṭṭotpattiḥ paṭṭādes tu sukhādayaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7721: svasaṃtāne ca dṛṣṭo 'sau nityeṣu ca kathaṃ yathā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7723: dīpatailaṃ kṣayaṃ yāti kṣīyamānaṃ na lakṣyate / evaṃ bhāvā na lakṣyante kṣīyamānāḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7724: saṃtānaḥ samudāyaś ca paṅktisenādivan mṛṣā / tatrābhyāsād ahaṃkāraḥ parasmin kiṃ na jāyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:7725: tasmād evaṃ jagat jñeyaṃ yathāyatanasaṃcayaḥ / aprāptam eva tad duṣkhaṃ pratikāryaṃ parātmanoḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7726: ayuktam api ced etat svātmany astītaratra na /
SA11sanssr_pu:7727: yad ayuktaṃ nivartyaṃ tat svam anyad vā yathābalaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7728: kṛpayā bahu duṣkhaṃ cet kasmād utpādyate balāt / jagadduṣkhaṃ nirūpyedaṃ kṛpāduṣkhaṃ kathaṃ bahu //
SA11sanssr_pu:7729: evaṃ bhāvitasaṃtānāḥ paraduṣkhasamapriyāḥ / avīcīm avagāhante haṃsāḥ padmavanaṃ yathā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7730: satveṣu mucyamāneṣu ye te prāmodyasāgarāḥ / tair eva nanu paryāptaṃ mokṣeṇāpy arasena kim //
SA11sanssr_pu:7731: evaṃ parārthaṃ kṛtvāpi na mado na ca vismayaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7733: daśadiksatvasaṃpattir ātmīyāsya na saṃśayaḥ / nāsty erṣyāvakāśo 'pi parasaukhye svasaṃjñayā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7734: pareṣām ātmano vāpi sāmānyā pāpadeśanā / puṇyānumodanā caivaṃ buddhādhyeṣaṇayācanaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7735: pariṇāmanam apy evaṃ nirviśeṣaṃ pravartate / puṇyaṃ pravartate tasmād annantaṃ satvadhātuvat //
SA11sanssr_pu:7736: ayaṃ sa mārgapravaraḥ kṣemānantasukhotsavaḥ / bodhisatvamahāsārtha kalilaprītivardhanaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7737: pālyamānaś ca satataṃ vajrapāṇyātiyāntrikaiḥ / māragulmikasaṃtrāsajananair buddhakiṃkaraiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7738: saṃbuddharājatanayā bodhicittarathasthitāḥ / vahante tena mārgeṇa stūyamānāḥ surādibhiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7739: tasmād ātmatvam āropya satveṣv abhyāsayogataḥ / parātmaduṣkhaśāntyartham ātmādīn sarvathotsṛjet //
SA11sanssr_pu:7740: tṛṣṇā parigraho yasya tasya duṣkhaṃ na śāmyati / pariṇāmavināśitvāt sa duṣkhajanako yataḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7741: loke duṣkhāgnitapte ca kā ratiḥ susukhe bhavet / samantād dahyamānasya nakhādāhe 'pi kiṃ sukham //
SA11sanssr_pu:7742: ātmatṛṣṇā ca sarveṣāṃ duṣkhāṇāṃ mūlam uttamaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7743: tasmān nihanmi tām eva satvebhyaḥ svārtham utsṛjan //
SA11sanssr_pu:7744: tad agradūtī jñātecchā jetavyā sarvayatnataḥ / ātmatatvasmṛtiṃ kṛtvā pratītyotpādacintayā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7745: yad bhayān notsṛjāmy etat tad evādadato bhayaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7746: pratikṣaṇaṃ hi yāty eva kāyaś cittaṃ ca me yataḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7747: yadi nityāpy anityena nirmalā malavāhinā / bodhiḥ kāyena labhyeta nanu labdhā mayaiva sā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7748: evam ātmānam utsṛjya sarvasatvārtham ācaret / bhaiṣajyapratimākalpo lokadharmeṣv acintakaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7749: sarvasatvārthamantritve svaprajñāṃ viniyojayet / yuktyā saṃrakṣya tu dravyaṃ satveṣu vopayojayet //
SA11sanssr_pu:7750: svakāye parakāye vā yad duṣkhaṃ neha duṣkhakṛt /
SA11sanssr_pu:7753: puṇyakṣetram idaṃ śuddhaṃ saṃpatsasyamahāphalaṃ / sukhadurbhikṣasaṃtaptaṃ jagat saṃtarpayiṣyati //
SA11sanssr_pu:7755: kopaḥ kasyārtham adyāpi mṛṣā vā tan mayoditam //
SA11sanssr_pu:7756: svārthaghneṣu yadi dveṣaḥ kṛpā kutra bhaviṣyati / nirdayasyāpi kaḥ kopaḥ parārtho yadi naśyati //
SA11sanssr_pu:7757: ākrośādikṣamāḥ satyam ikṣukas tūrikādayaḥ / svāmyasanena durnyastā nopabhogyā bhavanti te //
SA11sanssr_pu:7758: cintayati pratīkāraṃ na ca svāmihitecchayā / nāpi saṃcodayaty enaṃ bhogārthaṃ nopayāti ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:7762: dhātavaḥ pañca bhūvāritejo 'nilakhasaṃjñitāḥ / yāvat satvāḥ sthitās tāvat sarveṣām arthakāriṇaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7763: sarvaduścaritenaiṣāṃ satvārthād vinivartanaṃ / evam etān karomy eṣa dhātūn ṣaḍ api nirvyathān //
SA11sanssr_pu:7764: yāvad ākāśaniṣṭasya niṣṭhā lokasya saṃbhavet / tāvat sthāsyāmi lokārthaṃ kurvan jñānapuraḥsaraḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7765: ātmācāryo 'nuśiyaṣyād dhi sadātmānaṃ suśiṣyavat / apṛṣṭvā cātmanātmānaṃ balenārakṣitakriyaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7766: ka eva mama duṣkhena duṣkhī syān me bhayād bhayī / taddoṣānuśayajño vā yathātmagurur ātmanaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7767: avirāgy apalāyī ca karuṇāviṣayo 'pi vā / nityasaṃnihitaś cāpi śiṣya ātmasamaḥ kutaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7768: kleśonmatto 'tha mohāndhaḥ prapātabahule pathi / skhalan pade pade śocyaḥ para ātmā ca sarvadā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7770: na yuktaṃ yujyate tv atra guṇān dṛṣṭvādbhutaṃ mahat //
SA11sanssr_pu:7771: naikena śakyam ādātuṃ mayā doṣamahodadhiḥ / kṛtyam anyair mamaivātra ko 'nyadoṣeṣu mekṣaṇaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7772: paracodanadakṣāṇām annadhīṣṭopakāriṇāṃ / vākyaṃ mūrdhnā pratīcchāmi sarvaśiṣyo bhavāmy ahaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7773: saṃgrāmo hi mamaikasya bahubhiḥ kleśaśatrubhiḥ / tatraikena raṇāsaktam anye nighnanti māṃ sukham //
SA11sanssr_pu:7774: tatra yaḥ pṛṣṭhato bhītiṃ śrāvayed anyato 'pi vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7775: pradviṣṭo vā prasanno vā same prāṇapradaḥ suhṛt //
SA11sanssr_pu:7780: mañjuśrī saṃjñakaṃ yat tat piṇḍībhūtaṃ jagaddhitaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7784: vismayodgataromāñcair bodhisatvaśataiḥ stutam / mañjuśriyaṃ namasyāmi praṇāmair uttarottaraiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7785: niḥśeṣaduṣkhavaidyāya sukhasattrapradāyine / sarvākāropajīvyāya mañjughoṣāya te namaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7786: iti jinatanayānāṃ sarvathātyadbhutānāṃ caritam upanibdhyopārjitaṃ yac chubhaṃ me /
SA11sanssr_pu:7787: bhavatu sukham annantaṃ dehināṃ tena yāvat sugatapadam annantavyomasīmādhipatyaṃ //
